label: 边崖警探 Agents of Edgewatch

Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.name: 酸性毒云陷阱 Acidic Poison Cloud Trap
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hp: 以摧毁一个喷嘴；毒气罐硬度：20；毒气罐HP： 100（BT50）以损毁毒气罐，阻止它喷出气体
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:35|name:Block One Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device]（专家）以阻塞一个喷嘴或@Check[thievery|dc:40|name:Shut Off the Tank|traits:action:disable-a-device]（大师）以关上毒气罐。在5轮后，毒气罐排空，陷阱失效。
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazarddescription: 隐藏在公寓天花板上的五个喷嘴将藏在墙后的毒气罐中的赌气喷出，形成浓重的酸性毒云。
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.routine: （1动作）当它被触发时，陷阱有五个激活的喷嘴，但在每一轮它的回合结束时，一个随机的喷嘴失效。在陷阱的回合中，还激活的喷嘴会喷出一团酸性毒气，扩张到整个公寓中。毒云对房间中的每个生物和物体造成@Damage[1d6[acid]]伤害和@Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:33|basic|name:Spew Cloud|traits:poison]豁免）。无人看管的物体会在针对伤害的豁免中自动失败。

Spew Cloud.name: 喷出毒云 Spew Cloud
Spew Cloud.description:
触发 公寓门打开后12秒

效果 陷阱骰先攻。

Agent of the Gray Queen.name: Agent of the Gray Queen
Agent of the Gray Queen.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description:
An astradaemon bends light, appearing shifted from its true position, though still in the same space.

Creatures targeting the astradaemon must attempt a @Check[flat|dc:11] check, as if the astradaemon were hidden, even though it remains observed.

Effects such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{Blind-Fight} feat and halfling's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.y1EmCv2cEb5hXBwx]{Keen Eyes} that apply on the flat check against hidden creatures also apply against a displaced astradaemon.

Soul Siphon.name: Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description:
30 feet. An astradaemon draws power from the souls of the recently slain. If a Small or larger living creature dies within its aura, the astradaemon gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 round, unless the creature was slain by an astradaemon's Devour Soul ability.

Incorporeal undead and living spirits traveling outside the body take @Damage[1d8[force]] damage each round within the daemon's aura from the spiritual pressure as the astradaemon pulls in fragments of their soul.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.SjrM6XVTLySToS12]{Effect: Soul Siphon}

Essence Drain.name: Essence Drain
Essence Drain.description:
When an astradaemon hits with its claw, jaws, or tail, it drains the target's spiritual and vital essences.

The target takes @Damage[2d10[void]] damage and the astradaemon regains an equal number of Hit Points. The target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

If the target was already drained or doomed, it instead increases both conditions' value by 1, to a maximum of 4.

Mortal Shell.name: Mortal Shell
Mortal Shell.description:
Requirements The astradaemon has killed a Large or smaller creature with Overtake Soul within the past 24 hours and that creature is within the daemon's reach

Effect The astradaemon takes over and wears the body of their victim. This automatically creates a disguise to allow the astradaemon to Impersonate the target creature. The body has a number of Hit Points equal to 3 times the level of the creature. Any damage targeting the astradaemon damages the body first. Once the body is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it's destroyed and forces the astradaemon out, back to the daemon's normal form. If the astradaemon takes any spirit damage while wearing the body, the damage is dealt to the astradaemon directly and it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] check or be forced out of the body. Additionally, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} can force the astradaemon out of the body with a successful counteract check against DC 41.

While wearing the disguise, the astradaemon's attacks use the reach of the body it inhabits, and its size changes to match that of the creature whose soul it consumed. Additionally, the astradaemon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} while wearing the disguise. (These penalties haven't been incorporated into this stat block.)

Overtake Soul.name: Overtake Soul
Overtake Soul.description:
Requirements The astradaemon hasn't used an action with the attack trait yet this turn.

Effect The astradaemon draws out and consumes the soul of a living creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. The creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save or instantly die. If it dies, the astradaemon gains 10 temporary Hit Points.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.xiOi7btey4AS6jhe]{Effect: Overtake Soul}

Agradaemon.name: Agradaemon

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: Smoke doesn't impair an agradaemon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Choking Smog.name: Choking Smog
Choking Smog.description: 100 feet. The agradaemon is surrounded by ashy smoke. Creatures within the aura are concealed, and creatures outside of it are concealed to creatures within it. Non-daemon creatures can't breathe in the aura and must hold their breath or suffocate.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Daemonic Pledge.name: Daemonic Pledge
Daemonic Pledge.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The agradaemon designates a single willing mortal as a pledged fanatic. That creature gains resistance to fire equal to its level, immunity to the agradaemon's choking smog aura, and smoke vision.

The agradaemon can have up to 10 pledged fanatics at one time and can remove the status from any number of pledged fanatics as a free action with the concentrate trait. The status can also be removed with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual.

Proven Devotion.name: Proven Devotion
Proven Devotion.description:
The agradaemon regains @Damage[15[untyped]] Hit Points, and a pledged fanatic of the agradaemon's choice that it can see loses 15 Hit Points (no effects apply that would decrease this Hit Point loss).

A pledged creature that dies in this way explodes and deals @Damage[9d10[fire]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (@Check[reflex|dc:41|basic|options:area-effect] save).

Agradaemon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Alchemical Torrent.name: Alchemical Torrent
Alchemical Torrent.description:
The alchemical horror spews a torrent of alchemical fluids in a @Template[cone|distance:30] that deals @Damage[20d6[acid]|options:area-damage] damage to creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:43|basic|options:area-effect] save).

The alchemical horror can't use this ability again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Alchemical Torrent]]{1d4 rounds}.

Alchemical Reaction.name: Alchemical Reaction
Alchemical Reaction.description:
Trigger The alchemical horror takes damage from an alchemical bomb

Effect The volatile substances that compose the alchemical horror froth outward as they react with the bomb. The bomb's full effects affect creatures in every space within 15 feet of the alchemical horror, and splash damage affects creatures 5 feet beyond that.

equipment-+1 Studded Leather Armor.name: +1 Studded Leather Armor
equipment-+1 Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Alchemist Goggles.name: Alchemist Goggles
equipment-Alchemist Goggles.description:
These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.

equipment-Alchemist's Tools.name: Alchemist's Tools
equipment-Alchemist's Tools.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Infused Items.name: Infused Items
Infused Items.description: Japu carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused moderate acid flasks (2), infused moderate alchemist's fires (2), moderate elixirs of life (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate tanglefoot bags (2).

Alchemical Formulas (10th).name: Alchemical Formulas (10th)
Alchemical Formulas (10th).description: moderate acid flask, moderate alchemist's fire, greater antidote, moderate bravo's brew, moderate elixir of life, moderate tanglefoot bag, wyvern poison

equipment-Formula Book.name: Formula Book
equipment-Formula Book.description:
A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Contains formulas for the following:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Acid Flask (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antidote (Greater)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{Elixir of Life (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WL4O32qFifxnMj0H]{Wyvern Poison}

Expanded Splash.name: Expanded Splash
Expanded Splash.description: Japu's bombs that have the splash trait deal 5 splash damage and splash to 10 feet.

Quick Alchemy.name: Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect Japu creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.

Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: Japu Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

Almiraj.name: 阿尔米拉吉 Almiraj
Almiraj.allSaves: 对抗异能法术时全豁免-2状态加值

Magic Susceptibility.name: 魔法易感 Magic Susceptibility
Magic Susceptibility.description:
阿尔米拉吉对抗异能法术时-2状态加值。

任何增益的持续时间为1轮或更长的异能法术，对它的持续时间翻倍。

Magic Horn.name: 魔法之角 Magic Horn
Magic Horn.description:
任何被阿尔米拉吉以角抵打击至濒死的生物都会立即@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]，无豁免。

被切断的阿尔米拉吉之角保留了一缕以前的魔法；在战斗中，圆角可以被用作+1@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]，如果固定在杆上，也可以用作+1@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]。

equipment-Light Mace.name: Light Mace
equipment-Light Mace.description: A light mace has a short wooden or metal shaft ending with a dense metal head. Used much like a club, it delivers heavy bludgeoning blows, but with extra power derived from the head's metal ridges or spikes.

Infused Items.name: Infused Items
Infused Items.description: The chemist carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time the amateur chemist makes their daily preparations: infused moderate bottled lightning (4), infused moderate frost vials (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate silvertongue mutagens (2).

Alchemical Formulas (5th).name: Alchemical Formulas (5th)
Alchemical Formulas (5th).description: lesser antidote, moderate bottled lightning, moderate frost vial, graveroot, hunting spider venom, moderate quicksilver mutagen, moderate silvertongue mutagen

Calculated Splash.name: Calculated Splash
Calculated Splash.description: The chemist's bombs that have the splash trait deal 4 splash damage.

Quick Alchemy.name: Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect The chemist creates a single alchemical item from their formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the start of their next turn.

Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: The chemist Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment-Alchemist's Tools.name: Alchemist's Tools
equipment-Alchemist's Tools.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

equipment-Formula Book (Blank).name: Formula Book (Blank)
equipment-Formula Book (Blank).description: A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Arcane Feedback Trap.name: Arcane Feedback Trap
Arcane Feedback Trap.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:33|name:Quell Rippling Stone] (master) to quell the rippling stone or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th rank, counteract DC 31) to dispel the magical feedback.
Arcane Feedback Trap.hazarddescription: A spike of stone bursts from the south wall and quickly retracts.

Stone Spike.name: Stone Spike
Stone Spike.description:
Trigger A creature in area E1 casts an arcane spell or uses an arcane ability

Effect The trap makes a stone spike attack against the triggering creature. For the next 1 minute thereafter, the ripples are stronger, giving the trap a +2 circumstance bonus on stone spike Strikes during this time.

Prickly Defense.name: 多刺防御 Prickly Defense
Prickly Defense.description:
海胆精缩进自己的尖刺保护之中，呈现出防御性的、被尖刺包围的外表。它的尖刺打击的攻击骰和AC获得+2环境加值。任何相邻生物试图对海胆精进行近战打击时，无论是否命中，每次都会受到1d6穿刺伤害。

多刺防御一直会持续到海胆精使用移动动作或使用尖刺以外的任何武器进行打击为止。

Rolling Assault.name: 滚动突击 Rolling Assault
Rolling Assault.description:
海胆精缩成一个球并快速滚动，从它的尖刺刺穿敌人。海胆精行走两次，在其移动过程中的任何一点进行两次尖刺打击，每次攻击针对触及范围内的不同目标。

这些攻击计入海胆精的多重攻击减值，但多重攻击减值直到所有攻击都完成后才会增加。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 海胆精对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成额外2d6精准伤害。

Avsheros the Betrayer.name: Avsheros the Betrayer

Blasphemous Arms.name: Blasphemous Arms
Blasphemous Arms.description: Any weapon gains the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy} property rune while Avsheros wields it.

Wail of the Betrayed.name: Wail of the Betrayed
Wail of the Betrayed.description:
Avsheros lets out an agonized wail that invokes grief and a feeling of betrayal in those who hear it.

All creatures within 120 feet must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. A creature frightened in this way can't willingly accept aid of any kind from an ally until the frightened condition is removed.

On a successful save, the creature is immune to Avsheros's Wail of the Betrayed for 24 hours.

Hateful Gaze.name: Hateful Gaze
Hateful Gaze.description:
60 feet. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:45] save. If the creature fails, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Avsheros can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

No matter the result of the save, a creature can't be affected by Avsheros's hateful gaze again for 1 minute.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Avsheros the Betrayer.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Baatamidar.name: Baatamidar
Baatamidar.publicNotes: Baatamidars are drawn to destroy planar communities on the fringes where the Outer Planes touch the chaos of the Maelstrom. They resemble floating blobs of undulating, prismatic ooze with four quivering tentacles and dribbles of oily slime that always drip upwards.

Mind-Numbing Grasp.name: Mind-Numbing Grasp
Mind-Numbing Grasp.description:
The baatamidar's tentacles leech away thought. A creature that starts its turn grabbed by the baatamidar must attempt a @Check[will|dc:41|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation,mental] save.

Critical Success Unaffected.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for an unlimited duration.

Writhing Arms.name: Writhing Arms
Writhing Arms.description:
The baatamidar makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for the baatamidar's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until the baatamidar has made all the attacks.

If the baatamidar subsequently uses the Improved Grab action, it can Grab any number of creatures it hit with Writhing Arms.

Unrelativity Field.name: Unrelativity Field
Unrelativity Field.description:
1 mile. Creatures who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:48|traits:incapacitation] save or become unable to understand any communication (including telepathy), distinguish social rank or authority, or differentiate the relative value of objects or services. This persists for as long as the creature is in the aura.

Creatures who succeed at the save are temporarily immune for 1 hour (24 hours on a critical success). Proteans are immune to the unrelativity field.

The baatamidar can suppress this aura or activate it again as a free action.

Tear Flesh.name: 撕扯血肉 Tear Flesh
Tear Flesh.description:
触发 一个生物被食尸鬼擒抱，并且在逃脱检定时大失败

效果 藤壶食尸鬼对触发的生物进行一次爪抓打击。

Consume Flesh.name: 吞食尸体 Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description:
需求 食尸鬼与刚死亡一小时内的生物尸体相邻。

效果 食尸鬼吞食一大块尸体并恢复@Damage[5d6[healing]]生命值。

食尸鬼从每具尸体上只能获取一次生命值恢复。

Fill Lungs.name: 肺部充水 Fill Lungs
Fill Lungs.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:26]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}（1轮）

阶段4 溺水，并且无法减少至阶段4 以下，除非肺部的水被清空；清空肺里的水需要一次成功的@Check[medicine|dc:26|name:Purge Water|traits:manipulate,action:administer-first-aid]检定进@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]（这能阻止生物溺水并将状态值减少到阶段3；大成功减少为阶段2），或者可以移除诅咒或恶心状态的魔法效果（能让生物停止溺水并解除诅咒）。

如果生物溺亡，则下一次午夜时分将复活为一只新的藤壶食尸鬼。

Nimble Swim.name: 轻巧游泳 Nimble Swim
Nimble Swim.description: 藤壶食尸鬼游泳最多20尺。这不会触发反应动作。

Paralysis.name: 麻痹 Paralysis
Paralysis.description:
任意活着的、非精灵生物在受到食尸鬼的攻击时必须成功通过@Check[fortitude|dc:26]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]。

被麻痹的生物可以在自己的每个回合结束时尝试一次新的豁免，每次此豁免的DC都会递减1点。

Poison Ink.name: Poison Ink
Poison Ink.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round).

Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.
Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Wind-Up.name: Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a [[/act disable-device dc=33]]{DC 31 Thievery} check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.

Rapid Repair.name: Rapid Repair
Rapid Repair.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

Smoke Bomb Launcher.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher
Smoke Bomb Launcher.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Battle Leader Rekarek.name: 战争领袖蕾卡蕾克 Battle Leader Rekarek

Haphazard Hack.name: 胡乱劈砍 Haphazard Hack
Haphazard Hack.description:
需求 蕾卡蕾克相邻两个或两个以上的敌人

效果 蕾卡蕾克进行三次近战武器攻击，其中两次必须针对不同的敌人。

这些攻击计入多次攻击惩罚，但只在所有三次攻击都完成后。

在使用这个行动后，直到她的下一个回合开始她陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Delay Condition.name: 状态延迟 Delay Condition
Delay Condition.description: 双体幽灵的双重灵魂需要更长时间才能被不利效果影响。当双体幽灵即将受到以下效果影响时，这些效果自动被抑制，直到双体幽灵的下一个回合结束。这些效果包括：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]。

Agonizing Wail.name: 痛苦哀嚎 Agonizing Wail
Agonizing Wail.description:
双体幽灵释放出一阵悲苦的哭声，让其他人陷入极度的悲伤中。30尺内的所有生物必须尝试@Check[will|dc:17]检定。

大成功 目标不受影响且1分钟之内对痛苦哀嚎效果免疫。

成功 目标在1轮内无法使用反应动作。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}并且目标开始哭泣，在1分钟内无法使用反应动作。它每轮结束时可以尝试一次新的意志检定来结束这个效果。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标无法进行豁免来结束这个效果。

Dual Assault.name: 双体攻击 Dual Assault
Dual Assault.description:
双体幽灵进行四次打击，对同一目标不能超过两次。

这些攻击计入双体幽灵的多重攻击减值，但是在全部打击都完成之后才生效。

No Escape.name: No Escape
No Escape.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.

Clobber.name: Clobber
Clobber.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:33|options:inflicts:stunned] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Hammering Flurry.name: Hammering Flurry
Hammering Flurry.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.

Shatter Defenses.name: Shatter Defenses
Shatter Defenses.description:
Requirements A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} as long as it's frightened. If the target is already off-guard, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.

equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.
equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows

equipment-Shortbow.name: Shortbow
equipment-Shortbow.description: This smaller bow is made of a single piece of wood and favored by skirmishers and cavalry.

equipment-Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
equipment-Chain Mail.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

Blackfinger's Prayer.name: Blackfinger's Prayer
Blackfinger's Prayer.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:50|name:Gum Up Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to gum up the trapdoor's porous metal surface, @Check[crafting|dc:45|name:Render Toxin Inert] (master) to render the toxin inert, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 45) to counteract the trap's magic
Blackfinger's Prayer.hazarddescription: The trapdoor's metal is infused with a deadly toxin that seeps out when the trap is triggered.

Blackfinger's Prayer.name: Blackfinger's Prayer
Blackfinger's Prayer.description:
Trigger A creature opens the door without first whispering the name Blackfingers

Effect The metal trapdoor emits toxic vapors. Each creature within 30 feet must save against a potent strain of Blackfinger Blight.

Blackfinger Blight.name: Blackfinger Blight
Blackfinger Blight.description:
Each round, at the beginning of their turn, a creature affected by blackfinger blight must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] check or drop one random item they're holding

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:40]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[10d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)

Cast Down.name: Cast Down
Cast Down.description: When the acolyte casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to damage one creature, that creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} if it takes any damage from the spell. If the creature critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The acolyte deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

equipment-+1 Striking Club.description: This is a piece of stout wood shaped or repurposed to bludgeon an enemy. Clubs can be intricately carved pieces of martial art or as simple as a tree branch or piece of wood.
equipment-+1 Striking Club.name: +1 Striking Club

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-+1 Leather Armor.name: +1 Leather Armor
equipment-+1 Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

Brutish Shove.name: Brutish Shove
Brutish Shove.description:
Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit your opponent hard enough to make it stumble back. Make a Strike with a two-handed melee weapon. If you hit a target that is your size or smaller, that creature is off-guard until the end of your current turn, and you can automatically Shove it, with the same benefits as the Shove action (including the critical success effect, if your Strike was a critical hit). If you move to follow the target, your movement doesn't trigger reactions. This Strike has the following failure effect.

Failure The target becomes off-guard until the end of your current turn.

Sneak Attack.description: The goon deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.
Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack

Thunk 'n' Slice.name: Thunk 'n' Slice
Thunk 'n' Slice.description: The Bloody Barber goon makes one dagger Strike and one club Strike, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after the second Strike. Each Strike deals an additional 1d8 slashing or piercing damage (for the dagger) or bludgeoning damage (for the club).

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Concussive Beatdown.name: 震荡猛击 Concussive Beatdown
Concussive Beatdown.description:
需求伯勒斯刚用他的铲子摔绊了一个生物

效果 伯勒斯残忍地用铲子铲向倒下的敌人，进行铲子打击。如果命中，打击正常造成伤害，同时目标必须进行一次@Check[fortitude|dc:30]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

大失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，持续1分钟。

Decapitate.name: 斩首 Decapitate
Decapitate.description:
伯勒斯的铲子像铲煤炭一样刺穿一个生物的脖子。

他用铲子打击邻近的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]的生物。如果命中，生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{受伤 Wounded 2}（这可能导致@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]）。

Final Blow.name: 最后一击 Final Blow
Final Blow.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 伯勒斯的HP减少到0

效果 伯勒斯在濒死前最后用铲子打击一次。

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Blune deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Illusory Copies.name: Illusory Copies
Illusory Copies.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Blune calls into existence [[/r 1d4+2 #illusory copies]] illusory copies of himself, which dance around him and copy his every movement, making it almost impossible to pinpoint the true Blune.

Any attack that would hit Blune has a random chance of hitting an illusory copy instead. This effect lasts for up to 1 minute or until all the copies are destroyed or Blune is incapacitated.

Once a copy is hit, it's destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit Blune's AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys a copy but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit a copy, the copy is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against Blune.

Once all the copies are destroyed, this ability ends.

Ferocious Devotion.name: Ferocious Devotion
Ferocious Devotion.description:
When an illusory toady is destroyed, it dissolves into a puddle of cerulean quintessence before reforming to quasi-life once more. One round after it is destroyed, the toady starts re-forming. One round after that, the toady is completely healed and begins to fight once more.

If damaged while it is re-forming but before the process is complete, the toady is destroyed but splits into two cerulean puddles that begin re-forming into two identical toadies 1 round later, each with half the maximum HP of the original toady (this is similar to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]{Ochre Jelly's} Split ability); the toadies begin re-forming 1 round later.

The toadies are permanently destroyed only by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} or if @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.agents-of-edgewatch-bestiary.Actor.sUrJ7jxzBiJTbwVo]{Blune} falls unconscious.

Amplify Spell.name: Amplify Spell
Amplify Spell.description:
The toady wills itself to become a conduit for Blune's next spell, empowering the spell.

The toady becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until the beginning of its next turn.

If Blune Bandersworth is within 30 feet and Casts a Spell before the toady's next turn, the spell travels through the toady before redirecting toward its intended target.

The spell is heightened by 1 rank, to a maximum of 10th rank. The toady is then destroyed.

Boiling Fountains.name: 沸腾的喷泉 Boiling Fountains
Boiling Fountains.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以解除每个压力板，@Check[thievery|dc:16|name:Jam Fountain|traits:action:disable-a-device]以堵塞每个喷泉，@Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Deflect Fountain's Spray|traits:action:disable-a-device]以偏转喷泉的喷头
Boiling Fountains.hazarddescription: 地板下的四个压力板会激活房间两侧的龙头喷泉，使它们向中间的区域喷洒沸水。
Boiling Fountains.reset: 压力板激活后，必须手动复位。

Scalding Spray.name: 喷洒沸水 Scalding Spray
Scalding Spray.description:
触发 重物被放置在地图上标有“T”的任意方块上，触发压力板；

效果 喷泉将沸水喷到自己的方格即它们之间的10 尺的区域（虚线标记），对该区域内的任意生物造成@Damage[(4d6+4)[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。

Boiling Tub Trap.name: 沸腾的铁缸 Boiling Tub Trap
Boiling Tub Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Remove Trip Wire|traits:action:disable-a-device]（大师）以安全地在炸弹边上移除绊线。
Boiling Tub Trap.hazarddescription: 一根绊线突然绷断，引爆了炼金炸弹，炸毁了铁缸的一部分，沸水洒在了陷阱的受害者身上。

Overflowing Boiling Water.name: 溢出的沸水 Overflowing Boiling Water
Overflowing Boiling Water.description:
触发 绊线被拉动或绷断了

效果 强酸瓶爆裂开来，酸液溅射到周围的生物身上，并导致沸水缸向相同的方向裂开。

所有位于被触发的沸水缸东向的@Template[cone|distance:5]内的敌人受到@Damage[3d6[persistent,acid],(3[splash])[acid],(8d6+20)[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic|traits:acid,fire]豁免）。

Bolar Of Stonemoor.name: 博拉尔·栓岩 Bolar Of Stonemoor

Rage.name: 狂暴 Rage
Rage.description:
需求 博拉尔未疲乏或狂暴

效果 博拉尔获得了3临时HP，一直持续到狂暴结束。在狂暴中，他的近战攻击造成2额外伤害，AC受到-1减值。狂暴持续1分钟，直到博拉尔无法察觉到任何敌人，或者失去知觉。

一旦狂暴结束，博拉尔在1分钟内就不能再狂暴了。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]

Bone Skipper Swarm.name: 跳骨蝇群 Bone Skipper Swarm
Bone Skipper Swarm.senses: 骸骨感知（模糊） 30 尺, 黑暗视觉

Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: 骸骨感知（模糊） 30 尺
Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: 跳骨蝇群能感知到范围内的骨头和具有骨骼系统的生物。

Marrow Rot.name: 骨髓热疫 Marrow Rot
Marrow Rot.description:
骨髓热疫只能影响具有骨骼系统的生物；

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:24]

潜伏期 1天

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1天）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1天）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1天）

Swarming Bites.name: 虫群噬咬 Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: 虫群占据空间内的每个生物受到@Damage[3d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic]豁免）外加骨髓热疫。

Partial Amphibian.name: 半两栖 Partial Amphibian
Partial Amphibian.description: 渔灾兽能在空气中呼吸最多10分钟时间，或者在它皮肤保持湿润的情况下最多能呼吸1小时。

Capsize.name: 倾覆 Capsize
Capsize.description: 渔灾兽试图倾覆一艘与它相邻且体型不超过它的船只。它必须成功进行一次DC35的运动检定（目标船只的体型每比渔灾兽小一级，该DC 减少5）或对抗驾驶者的航海学识DC，二者以较高的为准。

Tug.name: 拖拽 Tug
Tug.description:
渔灾兽拖拽一个它触及范围内的生物，或抓着某种在它触及范围内的物品的生物（例如水中的鱼线）。

渔灾兽尝试一次@Check[athletics|defense:fortitude]检定，对抗生物的强韧DC。如果成功，它能将生物拉至与之相邻的空间。如果大成功，渔灾兽还能对被拉至相邻空间内的生物进行一次啃咬打击。

Burning Chandelier Trap.name: Burning Chandelier Trap
Burning Chandelier Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:36|name:Disable a Chandelier|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable a chandelier or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th rank; counteract DC 33) to permanently drain the magic from a chandelier. Any amount of cold damage that overcomes a chandelier's cold resistance extinguishes its flames and removes its persistent fire damage and flame dart attack. @Check[thievery|dc:41|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to disable the entire trap from the hidden control panel in the southeast corner of the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.hazarddescription: Four large flaming chandeliers swing wildly around the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.reset: The trap deactivates and resets 1 minute after there are no living creatures remaining in the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.routine: (4 actions) For every chandelier disabled, the trap's actions are reduced by 1. For each of the trap's actions, a different chandelier attacks a random creature in the room. A chandelier uses its swinging chandelier attack if it can, but it can't make melee attacks against creatures in the cage, the closet, or the gap between the two double doors leading into the vault. Against a creature it can't reach with a melee attack, it uses a flame dart attack instead. The trap doesn't take multiple attack penalties.
Burning Chandelier Trap.stealthdetails: (master) or @Check[perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek] (master) to spot the trap's control panel

Extending Chandeliers.name: Extending Chandeliers
Extending Chandeliers.description:
Trigger A creature touches the cage door, the closet door, or any wooden stand

Effect Both double doors leading out of the room shut and lock; while the trap is active, the key doesn't work to open these doors (although their locks can be picked normally). The chandeliers drop several feet on elongated chains, allowing them to swing around the room. The closest chandelier to the triggering creature makes a swinging chandelier Strike against it. The trap then rolls initiative.

equipment-Bolts.name: Bolts
equipment-Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Diabolic Certitude.name: Diabolic Certitude
Diabolic Certitude.description: When making a Recall Knowledge check about a devil she's observing, whenever Calennia rolls a critical failure, she gets a failure instead.

Flog Mercilessly.name: Flog Mercilessly
Flog Mercilessly.description: Calennia Strikes with her scourge. On a hit, she rolls damage three times. This damage is combined (for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance, for example).

equipment-+1 Striking Heavy Crossbow.name: +1 Striking Heavy Crossbow
equipment-+1 Striking Heavy Crossbow.description: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.

equipment-+2 Greater Striking axiomatic.name: +2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge
equipment-+2 Greater Striking axiomatic.description: A scourge-also known as a cat-o'-nine-tails-is a set of several knotted cords made from cotton or leather and attached to a handle. While most scourges are more suitable for torture than combat, the weapons used by the Order of the Scourge have metal barbs woven in to pierce clothing and armor. The scourge is a martial melee weapon.

equipment-+2 Resilient Hellknight Plate.name: +2 Resilient Hellknight Plate
equipment-+2 Resilient Hellknight Plate.description: Few armors in the Inner Sea region are as memorable as the iconic Hellknight plate. While each order has its own flourishes, Hellknight plate is instantly recognizable to any who know of the Hellknights. Hellknights go to extreme measures to punish non-Hellknights who get their hands on Hellknight plate, and the reward is not usually worth the risk, since for non-Hellknights, the armor is functionally similar to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}.

Terrible Justice.name: Terrible Justice
Terrible Justice.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Calennia targets the creature with a death knell spell (DC 34). If the target dies, all of Calennia's enemies within 60 feet are targeted by a fear spell (DC 34). A creature that succeeds at either save is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Exile.name: Exile
Exile.description:
The camarach shunts one creature within its body through an inner portal to send it away.

The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:38] save.

Critical Success The creature is teleported to an open space it chooses within 30 feet of the camarach.

Success The creature isn't teleported.

Failure The creature is teleported to a random open space 1 mile from the camarach.

Critical Failure The creature is teleported to a random other plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Interplanar Teleport}.

Disgorge Portal.name: Disgorge Portal
Disgorge Portal.description:
The camarach vomits a spray of coruscating light. This has the effect of a DC 42 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}, except that each creature is affected by one violet beam and one other beam (roll 1d6 instead of 1d8 to determine which other beam).

The camarach can't Disgorge a Portal again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Disgorge a Portal]]{1d4 rounds}.

Fast Swallow.name: Fast Swallow
Fast Swallow.description:
Trigger The camarach Grabs a creature

Effect The camarach uses Swallow Whole.

Project False Image.name: Project False Image
Project False Image.description: When the camarach casts project image, its illusory image can be another creature of its size or a structure of its size that features a large portal (such as a freestanding archway or a large hut with an open doorway).

Canopy Drop.name: 天顶坠落 Canopy Drop
Canopy Drop.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:23|name:Jam Trapdoor Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device]（专家）以堵塞机械机构、防止活板门打开、或者找到隐藏在房间外楼梯立管下的开关
Canopy Drop.hazarddescription: 一个与地板的传感器连接的活板门在地图上标记的地板处打开，周围的地板突然倾斜45度角，墙上的喷泉开始因高压洒水使得瓷砖很滑并将生物推向打开的斜槽。

Flush.name: 冲下 Flush
Flush.description:
触发 两个或两个以上的生物站陷阱空间上

效果 在陷阱被触发一轮后，房间里的所有生物都从竖井坠落40尺到达E36区，坠落造成@Damage[20[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage]伤害，加上降落到尖刺坑中的@Damage[2d6[piercing]]伤害。

这些生物可以尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]，以抓住吊床或一个悬挂的储藏箱来避免坠落。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]或抓住边缘的DC是20。

Carvey.name: 卡维 Carvey
Carvey.publicNotes: 由皮肤和血肉碎块拼成的血肉魔像是对生命的怪诞模仿。虽然它没有头脑，但当它受到伤害时却会狂怒，这让它给人留下了存在微弱情感的错觉。血肉魔像通常守卫着塑肉师（fleshwarpers）与死灵法师们的实验室，这些家伙不会因为亵渎尸体而感到内疚。第一个被创造出的血肉魔像是由简单的基本素材组成的，被认为是一种错误尝试的产物，这些怪物真正的人类还差得远。在某些情况下，如果一个血肉魔像的大脑拥有特别强大的人格，那么它可能会出现该人格的回响，谢天谢地，这样不幸的例子是极其罕见的。

Suicidal Obedience.name: 自杀性顺从 Suicidal Obedience
Suicidal Obedience.description:
卡维始终忠于锯皮邪教，尤其是莫巴娜。当卡维狂暴时，她不会攻击最近的生物或物体，而是会向靠近阳台边缘的生物移动（或者当战斗发生在其他地方，有类似的坠落危险的地方），并试图将将该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]下悬崖边缘。

当卡维只有40或更少的HP时，她的推撞距离翻倍（因此，如果成功推动生物10尺，如果大成功推动生物20尺），她必须与被推动的生物以移动相同的方向和距离。

如果被推的生物掉下悬崖，卡维也会一同掉下。

Berserk.name: 狂暴 Berserk
Berserk.description:
严重损坏的血肉魔像可能会狂暴。

每当它开始回合时，如果生命值小于等于40点，血肉魔像必须通过@Check[flat|dc:5]检定，否则狂暴。狂暴的血肉魔像会胡乱攻击最近的活物，如果附近没有生物时则会攻击附近的物体。

Electric Reflexes.name: 电击反射 Electric Reflexes
Electric Reflexes.description:
触发 魔像受到电击伤害并且一个生物与之相邻。

效果 魔像猛击并试图擒抱相邻的生物。魔像尝试一次运动检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]相邻的生物，如果魔像成功，该生物还要受到@Damage[3d6[electricity]]伤害；如果魔像大成功，则该生物受到@Damage[6d6[electricity]]伤害。

Golem Antimagic.name: 魔像抗魔 Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
被伤害：火焰（@Damage[5d8[untyped]]，区域效果或可持续伤害则为@Damage[3d4[untyped]]）；被治疗：电击（区域效果@Damage[2d4[healing]]生命值）；被减速：寒冷

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

Vulnerable to Flesh to Stone.name: 法术弱点-石化术 Vulnerable to Flesh to Stone
Vulnerable to Flesh to Stone.description: 对血肉魔像施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]可以正常产生效果。

Berserk Slam.name: 狂暴猛击 Berserk Slam
Berserk Slam.description:
需求 血肉魔像陷入狂暴状态。

效果 血肉魔像以-1环境减值进行一次拳击打击，造成额外1d6伤害并且击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Escort from the Premises.name: 押送离场 Escort from the Premises
Escort from the Premises.description:
需求 赌场保镖擒抱了一个中型或更小的目标，另一只手持握着一件非致命武器；

效果 赌场保镖用非致命武器对擒抱目标进行一次打击。如果打击命中，会如常造成伤害，且赌场保镖移动目标5尺（这是强迫移动），并进入目标刚刚占据的空间。

Intimidating Stare.name: 威慑凝视 Intimidating Stare
Intimidating Stare.description:
赌场保镖用目光对一个生物[[/act demoralize]]。赌场保镖不会因为目标不会说相同语言而在威吓检定上获得减值。

如果保镖骰出大成功，目标在[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内不能减少其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]的状态值。

Chalky.name: 查尔奇 Chalky
Chalky.publicNotes: 炼金魔像是行走的炼金术噩梦，能够造成各种各样的痛苦创伤。它漂浮在头顶的圆型容器的大脑赋予了它听从命令的能力。在极其罕见的情况下，在创建炼金魔像过程中所使用的大脑可能会保留一些记忆碎片，甚至拥有部分智力，从而产生一个具有自己性格和计划的个体。

Alchemical Chambers.name: 炼金容器 Alchemical Chambers
Alchemical Chambers.description:
查尔奇的身躯里有六个存放不同物质的炼金容器。当炼金魔像使用能力时会产生随机的炼金术效果，投掷1d6来并查阅下表（如果投出的结果是已经破损的炼金容器，则无效果）：

[[/gmr 1d6 #Alchemical Effect]] 炼金效果
1

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]
2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.T4ouD4mVFHA3EHs6]
3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]
4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bQPRKEpnLakJBAAh]
5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AqLxu3ir4UGzdOaz]
6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TMtQnY6yvIRCpK9v]

Alchemical Rupture.name: 炼金破裂 Alchemical Rupture
Alchemical Rupture.description:
当炼金魔像受到重击伤害或受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]魔法影响时，身上的一个玻璃容器会碎裂，对@Template[emanation|distance:5]范围喷出炼金液体。

投1d6并查阅炼金容器表来决定碎裂的是哪个容器，魔像周围@Template[emanation|distance:5]内所有生物都被该随机容器内的物质影响，如果希望的话，他们必须投掷反射豁免来抵抗炼金物质的效果。

Golem Antimagic.name: 魔像抗魔 Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
被伤害：音波（@Damage[5d8[untyped]]，区域效果或可持续伤害则为@Damage[2d6[untyped]]）；被治疗：酸蚀（区域效果@Damage[2d4[healing]]生命值）；被减速：寒冷

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

Vulnerable to Shatter.name: 法术弱点-粉碎音波 Vulnerable to Shatter
Vulnerable to Shatter.description: 对炼金魔像施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]能正常产生效果，而且有机会导致容器破裂

Alchemical Injection.name: 炼金注射 Alchemical Injection
Alchemical Injection.description:
当炼金魔像以注射器打击击中一个生物，投1d6并查阅炼金容器表来决定额外效果。

当其的注射器打击命中一个友军时，友军不收到伤害并不需要对投出的效果进行豁免。

Adamantine Strikes.description: Chaos Gulgamodh's body—including the appendages it uses to make melee Strikes—is made of adamantine.
Adamantine Strikes.name: Adamantine Strikes

Cannon Fusillade.name: Cannon Fusillade
Cannon Fusillade.description:
Chaos Gulgamodh unleashes a salvo of explosive blasts in a @Template[cone|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(10d10+20)[fire]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:43|basic|options:area-effect] save).

On a failed save, a creature is subjected to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave} effect. On a critically failed save, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Chaos Gulgamodh can't use Cannon Fusillade again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Cannon Fusillade]]{1d4 rounds}.

equipment-+1 Striking Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.
equipment-+1 Striking Shortsword.name: +1 Striking Shortsword

Split.name: Split
Split.description: When a child of venom is hit by an attack that would deal slashing or piercing damage and the child of venom has at least 20 HP, the creature splits into two identical children of venom with half the original's HP. One child of venom is in the same space as the original, and the other appears in an adjacent unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, they automatically push creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space.

Suction.name: Suction
Suction.description: The child of venom can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces, though such surfaces are difficult terrain for them.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The child of venom deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Efficient Winding.name: Efficient Winding
Efficient Winding.description:
For the clockwork amalgam to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 7 days, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.

The amalgam can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt a [[/act disable-device dc=33]]{DC 33 Thievery} check to Disable a Device to wind the amalgam down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the amalgam is in standby mode.

Recalibrate.name: Recalibrate
Recalibrate.description: The clockwork amalgam can recalibrate its internal structure to shed damaged components and replace them with new ones, restoring 125 HP to the construct. Each time it uses this ability, the clockwork amalgam permanently deactivates one of its five melee attacks as the components from that arm reassemble within the core of the machine.

Whirring Doom.name: Whirring Doom
Whirring Doom.description:
Frequency once per round

The clockwork amalgam becomes a blur of spinning weaponry. It makes up to five melee Strikes (one for each active melee attack it has available), taking a -4 penalty to the attack roll for each attack, but ignoring the multiple attack penalty until it has made all of its attacks. It can use each melee attack only once and it can target each creature in reach only once. If the clockwork amalgam used Whirring Doom in the previous round, it can use it again this round using only 1 action instead of 3. The amalgam's movement Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Clockwork Arms.name: Clockwork Arms
Clockwork Arms.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:43|name:Deactivate One Arm|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to jam and deactivate one of the arms or @Check[athletics|dc:46|name:Tear Arm Off Machine] (legendary) to tear an arm off the machine.
Clockwork Arms.hazarddescription: Four claw-tipped clockwork arms suspended from the ceiling pick up and deposit creatures into a nearby hatch.
Clockwork Arms.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per arm destroyed or disabled. On its turn, the trap makes claw Strikes against creatures other than the Rumormonger or the Inkmaster. If an arm already has a creature grabbed, the trap spends 2 actions to use its Open Hatch ability.

Arm Activation.name: Arm Activation
Arm Activation.description:
Trigger The Rumormonger or the Inkmaster enters the room

Effect The trap rolls initiative.

Open Hatch.name: Open Hatch
Open Hatch.description: The metal hatch opens and the arms deposit a grabbed Medium or smaller creature into the hole. The creature becomes caught in the gears (see Caught in Gears) for 1 round before emerging in area K5. Reset Rewinding the gears for [[/gmr 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes} resets the trap.

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Wind-Up.name: Wind-Up
Wind-Up.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a [[/act disable-device dc=31]]{DC 31 Thievery} check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Rapid Repair.name: Rapid Repair
Rapid Repair.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Smoke Bomb Launcher.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher
Smoke Bomb Launcher.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Whirlwind Strike.name: Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind Strike.description: The chopper makes a melee Strike against each enemy within melee reach. Its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Clockwork Poison Bomb.name: 发条毒素爆弹 Clockwork Poison Bomb
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hp: 以毁坏喷嘴（这使得它难以被关闭，因此唯一的处理爆弹的方式使毁灭它全部的气罐）；气罐硬度 15; 气罐HP 80（BT40）以摧毁一个气罐（必须摧毁所有的气罐才能处理爆弹）
Clockwork Poison Bomb.disable: 三次[[/act disable-device dc=31]]{DC31贼活}（专家）以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]，打开喷嘴处的锁闩；接着一次[[/act disable-device dc=35]]{DC35贼活}（大师）检定以解除装置，关闭喷嘴；如果奥格乌姆陷入禁足、麻痹、失去意识或死亡，则DC会降低2
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazarddescription: 发条爆弹释放出一股股有毒的烟雾。烟雾会从一个连接着两个加压毒气罐的喷嘴中喷出。
Clockwork Poison Bomb.reset: 陷阱会一直释放烟云，直到3分钟后气罐干涸。必须更换气罐才能重新激活爆弹。
Clockwork Poison Bomb.routine: （1动作）在它的回合内，爆弹继续喷发出一阵@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WvDbdESFJY6Be2u1]的烟云。烟云重新填满20尺半径，或当只有一个气罐完好时，填满10尺半径。如果爆弹已经位于黑指枯烟云的中心，那么取而代之，这片烟云的半径就会增加20 尺(或当只有一个气罐完好时，增加10尺半径）。
Clockwork Poison Bomb.stealthdetails: 爆弹使用奥格乌姆的先攻骰作为其隐秘骰。

Poisonous Cloud.name: 毒云喷发 Poisonous Cloud
Poisonous Cloud.description:
触发 有人启动了炸弹，这需要3个动作

效果 爆弹在20尺半径内释放出一阵@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WvDbdESFJY6Be2u1]的烟云。处在烟云中的生物对其他生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]。

任何在烟云内开始它的回合的生物必须骰@Check[fortitude|dc:32|name:Blackfinger Blight|traits:contact,virulent]，以对抗黑指枯毒素。

烟云持续存在1分钟，或直到被强风吹散。

26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.name: 精确震颤感知40 尺
26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.description:
石螨的震颤感知在40尺范围内为精确感官，在80尺范围内为模糊感官。石螨无法感知到超出震颤感知范围之外的生物。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Tremorsense]

Clutching Cobbles.name: 乱石 Clutching Cobbles
Clutching Cobbles.description: 石螨群占据的空间为困难地形。

Grasping Bites.name: 束缚噬咬 Grasping Bites
Grasping Bites.description:
石螨群尝试一次@Check[athletics]检定，并和占据空间内所有生物的强韧DC相比较。

大成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]并且受到@Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，并被石螨群@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]，直到石螨群的下回合结束。

成功 生物陷入倒地，并被石螨群@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]，直到石螨群的下回合结束。

Pummeling Assault.name: 持续攻击 Pummeling Assault
Pummeling Assault.description: 每个位于石螨群占据空间内的敌人受到@Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:17|basic]豁免）。

Precise Tremorsense 40 feet.description:
The cobbleswarm's tremorsense is a precise sense out to 40 feet and an imprecise sense out to 80 feet. The cobbleswarm can't sense anything beyond the range of its tremorsense.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Tremorsense]
Precise Tremorsense 40 feet.name: Precise Tremorsense 40 feet

Copper Hand Illusionist.name: 铜手帮幻术师 Copper Hand Illusionist

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 幻术师对陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

Copper Hand Rogue.name: 铜手帮流氓 Copper Hand Rogue

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧闪避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 流氓是近战或远程攻击的目标，且流氓可以看见攻击者

效果 流氓对触发条件的攻击，在AC上获得+2环境加值。

Poison Weapon.name: 上毒武器 Poison Weapon
Poison Weapon.description: 流氓对他的武器使用黑蝰毒。如果他们在下一个回合结束前用该武器进行的下次攻击命中并造成伤害，目标就会被毒药感染。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 流氓对陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的敌人额外造成1d6精准伤害。

Combustible.name: Combustible
Combustible.description: The first time each round that the Daemonic Infector takes fire damage, his fumes combust, dealing @Damage[30[fire]] damage to all other creatures within the area of his toxic fumes aura.

Toxic Fumes.name: Toxic Fumes
Toxic Fumes.description:
10 feet. A creature that enters or begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:44] save.

On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and on a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute. In addition, creatures within the aura attempting a flat check to remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} must roll twice and take the lower result.

Breathe Death.name: Breathe Death
Breathe Death.description:
The Daemonic Infector exhales a @Template[line|distance:30] of concentrated fumes.

Each creature in the area takes @Damage[12d10[poison]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:44|basic|options:area-effect,inflicts:drained] save; on a critical failure the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}).

The Infector can't Breathe Death again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breathe Death]]{1d4 rounds}.

Infector.name: Infector
Infector.description: The Daemonic targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt the Daemonic Infector's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

Black Ink Delirium.name: Black Ink Delirium
Black Ink Delirium.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)

Breath of Lies.name: Breath of Lies
Breath of Lies.description:
The Daemonic Rumormonger breathes a torrent of acidic sand and poisoned ink in an @Template[line|distance:80], dealing @Damage[6d12[acid],6d12[poison]|options:area-damage]{6d12 acid damage and 6d12 poison damage} and exposing victims to his black ink delirium.

He can't use Breath of Lies again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath of Lies]]{1d4 rounds}.

Whirling Slashes.name: Whirling Slashes
Whirling Slashes.description: The Daemonic Rumormonger Strides up to his Speed. He can make up to three claw Strikes, each against a different target, at any points during this Stride. His multiple attack penalty applies as usual.

Opportune Dodge.name: Opportune Dodge
Opportune Dodge.description:
Trigger A creature critically fails a Strike against the Daemonic Rumormonger

Effect The Rumormonger dodges out of the way and uses his momentum to attack and move out of reach. He Strides up to 20 feet and can Strike at any point during this movement; this Strike counts toward the multiple attack penalty on his next turn.

Spell Choke.name: Spell Choke
Spell Choke.description:
Trigger A creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} within 30 feet of the Daemonic Skinner Casts a Spell with a verbal component or speaks

Effect The Skinner wills the triggering creature's blood to gush from their mouth and constrict their throat. The target's spell is disrupted.

The target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Transfusion Aura.name: Transfusion Aura
Transfusion Aura.description:
30 feet. Any time a creature in the aura takes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, the Daemonic Skinner regains the same number of Hit Points as the damage dealt.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.

Bloody Sneak Attack.name: Bloody Sneak Attack
Bloody Sneak Attack.description: Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Daemonic Skinner's attacks. When attacking an off-guard creature, the Skinner deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.

Hook and Flay.name: Hook and Flay
Hook and Flay.description:
Requirements The Daemonic Skinner has a creature grabbed with her blood chain or a creature is affected by her bloody chain aura

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

Bloody Chain Aura.name: Bloody Chain Aura
Bloody Chain Aura.description:
20 feet. Chains of blood bind a bleeding creature to the Daemonic Skinner.

Creatures in range that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} can't move out of the aura.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.

Dart Barrage.name: 飞镖 Dart Barrage
Dart Barrage.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以解除压力板，或四次@Check[thievery|dc:18|name:Plug Dart Launcher|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以堵住飞镖发射孔
Dart Barrage.hazarddescription: 隐藏在斜对角墙面上的四根飞镖管道连接到房间中心黄铜印章下的压力板。
Dart Barrage.reset: 在4轮发射后，飞镖会耗尽，必须通过拆除墙壁手动给发射孔装填。在任何时刻，若不超过两个生物站在印章上，陷阱会停止发射，但仍然保持待击发，随时准备再次发射剩余的飞镖。
Dart Barrage.routine: （4动作）对于每个失效的发射孔失去1个动作。在陷阱的每一次行动中，它都会向房间中央的一个生物发射一个飞镖。
Dart Barrage.stealthdetails: （受训）或@Check[perception|dc:23|traits:action:seek]（受训）以注意到音乐管周围的划痕和轻微翘起的印章。

Dart Volley.name: 飞镖射击 Dart Volley
Dart Volley.description:
触发 超过两个小型或更大的生物踩在黄铜印章上。

效果 陷阱使用最多四次飞镖攻击站在印章上的生物，然后骰先攻。

No MAP.name: No MAP
No MAP.description: Darts are unaffected by Multiple Attack Penalty

Diobel Sweeper Chemist.name: 迪奥贝尔清道夫炼金师 Diobel Sweeper Chemist

strike-Moderate Acid Flask.name: 中等强酸瓶 Moderate Acid Flask
strike-Moderate Acid Flask.description:
[[/r (2d6)[persistent,acid]]] 持续酸蚀伤害

[[/r (2)[splash,acid]]]{2酸蚀溅射伤害}

strike-Moderate Alchemist's Fire.name: 中等炽火胶 Moderate Alchemist's Fire
strike-Moderate Alchemist's Fire.description:
[[/r (2)[persistent,fire]]] 持续火焰伤害

[[/r (2)[fire]]]{2火焰溅射伤害}

Dirty Bomb.name: 脏弹 Dirty Bomb
Dirty Bomb.description:
需求 炼金师至少携带一枚炸弹

效果 炼金师草率地在炸弹中混入了有害物质，并用其进行一次远程打击。如果命中并造成伤害，目标必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:27]豁免，否则在[[/gmr 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮}中获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}；如果豁免大失败，则增加为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3}。在接下来的24小时内，目标对抗同一个炼金师的脏弹而进行的额外强韧豁免时，获得-2的环境减值（大失败时则为-3）。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.5ZK22sNW7o26aST0]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ryY6fdqpC5Ztnagd]

Quick Brew.name: 快速混合 Quick Brew
Quick Brew.description:
需求 炼金师拥有炼金工具、公式书和一只空手

效果 炼金师制造了一剂@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]，他们必须在他们的下回合结束前使用，否则它将失效。

Diobel Sweeper Tough.name: 迪奥贝尔清道夫暴徒 Diobel Sweeper Tough

Bullyrag Beatdown.name: 威吓猛击 Bullyrag Beatdown
Bullyrag Beatdown.description: 每当帮派暴徒对一个惊惧的生物进行了一次成功的近战打击，打击额外造成一个武器伤害骰的伤害。

Frightening Critical.name: 恐惧重击 Frightening Critical
Frightening Critical.description: 每当帮派暴徒使用一个钝击武器达成重击并造成伤害，目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

Quick Bomber.name: 快速投弹 Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: 迪奥贝尔清道夫暴徒使用交互动作取出一个炸弹，然后用它进行打击。

Dreadsong Dancer.name: 颂惧舞者 Dreadsong Dancer
Dreadsong Dancer.allSaves: 对抗组曲法术时全豁免+2状态加值

+2 status to all saves vs. composition s.name: 对抗组曲法术时全豁免+2状态加值

Jealous Musician.name: 记恨乐手 Jealous Musician
Jealous Musician.description:
触发 颂惧舞者20尺内的一个弹奏乐器的生物，正尝试施展法术或施展组曲法术

效果 颂惧舞者行走最多20尺，并用歌之刃打击触发目标。如果打击命中，则法术被打断。

Performance Anxiety.name: 演出焦虑 Performance Anxiety
Performance Anxiety.description:
如果颂惧舞者听见或看见一个生物表演检定大成功，或一个生物对抗它的恐惧之歌能力时大成功，则颂惧舞者陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

如果颂惧舞者听见或看见一个生物在表演检定中大失败，或一个生物对抗它恐惧之歌能力时大失败，则颂惧舞者获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened 1}，持续1轮。

它只能将额外动作用于行走或打击。

Dreadsong.name: 恐惧之歌 Dreadsong
Dreadsong.description:
颂惧舞者旋转着挥舞它全身骇人的歌之刃，以幻术包裹全身。@Template[emanation|distance:30]范围内的每个非魔族生物都必须尝试@Check[will|dc:29]检定。

大成功 生物不受影响，并且对此能力临时免疫24小时。颂惧舞者受到演出焦虑效果影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}，并且颂惧舞者对该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]，持续1分钟。生物无法搜索颂惧舞者。

大失败 同失败，但是生物在1分钟之内无法将惊惧状态值减少到2以下。此外，颂惧舞者受到演出焦虑效果影响。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Composition S.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Composition Spells

Arrogant Taunts.name: 傲慢的嘲弄 Arrogant Taunts
Arrogant Taunts.description:
燧石兽发出粗鲁的侮辱和威胁的咆哮。30尺内的每个生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:27]豁免。

之后生物将临时免疫10分钟。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。

大失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}并且麻痹[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Incendiary Spit.name: 易燃唾液 Incendiary Spit
Incendiary Spit.description:
被燧石兽唾液击中的生物，表面会被一层光滑的易燃油脂覆盖。

该生物必须成功通过@Check[reflex|dc:27]豁免，否则在易燃唾液覆盖时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}。

受到火焰伤害的生物会着火，受到@Damage[3d6[persistent,fire]]伤害。一旦持续性火焰伤害结束，唾液就燃尽了。唾液也会在一个小时后自动消失，或者用肥皂、水并花费1分钟时间来擦洗。

Trail of Flame.name: 火焰轨迹 Trail of Flame
Trail of Flame.description:
燧石兽行走两次，在它移动的时候，身后留下一道魔法火焰的痕迹。燧石兽经过的方格会燃起火焰，创造出5尺高的火墙，燃烧1轮。火墙会隐蔽另一侧的生物和物体。

任何进入或在火墙范围内开始回合的生物将受到@Damage[6d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic]豁免）。

Vein Walker.name: 血管行者 Vein Walker
Vein Walker.description: 剥皮尸通过数百条跳动的血管四处移动，这些血管从它身体里伸展成几十个紧密的、绳状的束，把它固定在地面上。除魔法手段外，它无法被摔绊、推撞或其他强迫移动效果，并且它能无视困难地形（但不能无视高等困难地形）。

Bloody Handprint.name: 血手印 Bloody Handprint
Bloody Handprint.description: 剥皮尸在目标身上打上一个魔法血手印，作为他们的死亡标记。剥皮尸对相邻生物进行一次拳击打击；这次打击不计算剥皮尸的多重攻击减值。一旦击中，攻击不造成伤害，但是范围60尺内的所有剥皮尸都能观察到目标所在的位置，即便剥皮尸的视线被墙或其他地形阻碍。该效果会持续直到手印被洗掉。完全擦掉血手印需要水并且花费3个动作。

Vital Transfusion.name: 输血 Vital Transfusion
Vital Transfusion.description:
需求 剥皮尸至少拥有70点生命值

效果 剥皮尸牺牲自己，将生命能量注入30尺内一个自愿生物的体内。它会被立即摧毁，目标生物获得等同于它当前生命值一半的治疗。

目标的身体需要适应新注入的血液和生命能量，因此陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}；并且目标生物在1分钟之内也能看到其他剥皮尸造成的血手印。

Vomit Blood.name: 吐血 Vomit Blood
Vomit Blood.description: 剥皮尸喷出一大口血淋满被擒抱的生物全身。被擒抱的生物必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:25]检定否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

Vital Transfusion.name: Vital Transfusion
Vital Transfusion.description:
Requirements The excorion has at least 200 Hit Points

Effect The excorion sacrifices itself and transfers its bloody, vital energy to a willing living creature within 30 feet. The excorion is immediately destroyed, and the targeted living creature heals a number of HP equal to half the excorion's remaining HP at the time that it used this ability.

The living creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} during its next turn as its body adjusts to the newly transfused blood and vital energy.

Vein Walker.name: Vein Walker
Vein Walker.description:
The excorion moves about by way of hundreds of pulsating blood vessels, which stretch from its body in dozens of tight, ropy bundles and anchor it to the ground.

An excorion can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Tripped}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoved}, or otherwise forcibly moved except by magic, and the excorion ignores difficult terrain (but not greater difficult terrain).

Blinding Bile.name: Blinding Bile
Blinding Bile.description:
The excorion paragon projects a mist of burning blood in a @Template[cone|distance:10].

Creatures in the area take @Damage[10d8[acid], 5d8[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]{10d8 acid damage and 5d8 bludgeoning damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic|options:area-effect] save).

On a failed save, an affected creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

The excorion can't use Blinding Bile again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Blinding Bile]]{1d4 rounds}.

Vomit Blood.name: Vomit Blood
Vomit Blood.description:
The excorion spews necrotic blood all over a foe it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

The grabbed creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:39] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Exploding Statue.name: 爆炸雕像 Exploding Statue
Exploding Statue.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Safely Cut Wire|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以安全地切断引线
Exploding Statue.hazarddescription: 一个装满炸药的中空雕像连接在沿着相邻门运行的引线上。

Explosion.name: 爆炸 Explosion
Explosion.description:
触发 一个生物打开北门，但没有先解除引线

效果 雕像爆炸，以一个@Template[cone|distance:5]向西喷射弹片，对受影响地区的所有生物造成@Damage[(1d10+7)[piercing],1d10[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:18|basic]豁免）。

Explosive Barrels.name: 爆炸桶 Explosive Barrels
Explosive Barrels.disable: @Check[survival|dc:20|name:Smother the Flames]在不使其破裂的情况下扑灭火焰。
Explosive Barrels.hazarddescription: 标有油滴符号的木桶着火就会爆炸。

Explode.name: 爆炸 Explode
Explode.description:
触发 警探们到达后经过4轮无人处理

效果 油桶爆炸了，对20英尺半径内造成@Damage[(3d6+8)[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic|traits:fire]豁免）。

Eyeball Tank.name: Eyeball Tank
Eyeball Tank.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:38|name:Acidify Slime|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) or @Check[crafting|dc:34|name:Acidify Slime] (expert) to acidify the slime inside the tank, destroying the eyeballs
Eyeball Tank.hazarddescription: A vat of thick glass stands 10 feet high and is filled with green slime and fist-sized eyeballs.
Eyeball Tank.routine: (3 actions) Each round, the vat uses all three of its actions to shoot random eye rays at any living creatures (except Ixusoth) in range.

Eye-Opener.name: Eye-Opener
Eye-Opener.description:
Trigger Three or more living creatures remain within 20 feet of the trap for 1 round

Effect The trap rolls initiative.

Spill Eyeballs.name: Spill Eyeballs
Spill Eyeballs.description:
Trigger The tank reaches its Broken Threshold

Effect The glass shatters, spilling eyeballs onto the floor in a @Template[emanation|distance:15]{15-foot radius} and casting grease (DC 33) on the affected area. The eyeball tank is permanently destroyed and can't be reset.Reset The trap can be reset by adding 100 new eyeballs to the tank and allowing them to grow in the slime for 1 week.

False Door Trap.name: False Door Trap
False Door Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:32|name:Jam Needle in Housing|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to jam the needle in its housing or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (6th rank, counteract DC 30) to dispel the magical poison.
False Door Trap.hazarddescription: A hidden needle delivers a magical poison to anyone trying to open the door.

Purple Worm Sting.name: Purple Worm Sting
Purple Worm Sting.description:
Trigger A creature touches the door

Effect The creature is targeted by purple worm sting (@Check[fortitude|dc:32] save).

equipment-Purple Worm Venom.name: Purple Worm Venom
equipment-Purple Worm Venom.description:
Venom from enormous purple worms leaves a victim weakened.

Activate 2 Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 32 Fortitude

n

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

n

Stage 1 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

n

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Purple Worm Venom.name: Purple Worm Venom
Purple Worm Venom.description:
Venom from enormous purple worms leaves a victim weakened.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:32|traits:alchemical,injury,poison]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Fayati Alummur.name: 法亚蒂·阿卢穆尔 Fayati Alummur

equipment-Jade Bauble (affixed to Main-G.name: 翡翠雕饰 Jade Bauble (附着于格挡匕首)
equipment-Jade Bauble (affixed to Main-G.description:
用法 附着到一件近战武器

启动 A 命令

需求 你在附着的武器上达到大师

这块翡翠通常被雕刻成一个决斗者的形状，有时也会雕刻成一个多武装的生物。当你启动这块雕饰，它魔法般地吸引了对手的注意力。直到你下一回合开始，在护符附着的武器的触及范围内的敌人陷入措手不及。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧闪避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 法亚蒂是近战或远程攻击的目标，且法亚蒂可以看见攻击者

效果 法亚蒂对触发条件的攻击，在AC上获得+2环境加值。

Opportune Backstab.name: 借机背刺 Opportune Backstab
Opportune Backstab.description:
触发 法亚蒂触及内的一个生物被她的一个盟友近战命中

效果 法亚蒂对触发的生物进行一次打击。

Deepen the Wound.name: 深化伤口 Deepen the Wound
Deepen the Wound.description:
需求 法亚蒂的上一次攻击是使用细剑的成功近战打击

效果 法亚蒂对刚才命中的同一个生物使用格挡匕首打击。这次打击造成额外4d6精准伤害。

Guildmaster's Lead.name: 行会首领的领导 Guildmaster's Lead
Guildmaster's Lead.description:
每当法亚蒂打击一个生物大成功时，直到她的下一个回合开始，铜手帮的其他成员第一次在他们的回合中对该生物造成的伤害，会额外造成1d6精准伤害。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dVVc5MYx4G3QPHoa]

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 法亚蒂对陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

Field Of Opposition.name: Field Of Opposition
Field Of Opposition.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:42|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to permanently disable the planar distortion (DC increases by 2 for each duplicate still extant), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (10th rank; counteract DC 42) to destroy the planar distortion
Field Of Opposition.hazarddescription: A distortion in space spawns an aggressive, malevolent shadow duplicate of any characters who pass between Terimor's faces.

Spawn Mirror Duplicate.name: Spawn Mirror Duplicate
Spawn Mirror Duplicate.description:
Trigger A creature moves between the two glass faces of Olansa Terimor

Effect The planar rift disgorges an evil mirror duplicate of the creature, and the duplicate rolls initiative.

The field of opposition can use this reaction once per round but can't spawn a duplicate of a creature that already has a mirror duplicate in existence.

Mirror Duplicate.name: Mirror Duplicate
Mirror Duplicate.description:
A mirror duplicate rolls initiative with a +45 modifier. It uses the same statistics as the original creature, but with a +2 status bonus to AC, attacks, and saving throws. The duplicate is evil, and any abilities reliant on alignment change accordingly. The duplicate is also aggressive, attacking and taking other hostile actions available to it against anyone other than mirror duplicates.

It has three actions and one reaction and can use any of the original creature's abilities. Any limited-use abilities (such as spell slots) are based on what the original had when duplicated and are used up separately from the original creature's.
