The duplicate also has duplicates of the creature's worn and held items, but not consumables.

A duplicate is destroyed when reduced to 0 HP, when the trap is disabled or destroyed, or when the duplicate leaves area E2. Its duplicated items disappear when they leave its grip, though they last long enough for ranged Strikes.

Flying Guillotine.name: 飞行断头台 Flying Guillotine
Flying Guillotine.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Erase Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以抹除浮雕（如果刀片已经激活，则需要先进行成功的非武装攻击动作）；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（3环级；反制DC20）以反制浮雕。这个陷阱有一个只有蕾瑟和普拉切特知道的秘密诀窍：只要断头台侦测到房间里的一个生物用空着的手合拢拇指和小指，它就会处于休眠。
Flying Guillotine.hazarddescription: 断头台刀片上一个看不见的魔法浮雕会检测房间里的生物，使刀片从铰链上飞出并发动攻击。
Flying Guillotine.reset: 1分钟后，陷阱关闭，但门仍然锁着。陷阱会在每天的黎明时重新准备好。
Flying Guillotine.routine: （1动作）刀片@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]至多20尺，打击任何经过的格子上的生物。它每一轮不能瞄准同一生物超过一次。刀片无法被擒抱，也不会受到多次攻击的减值。

Flying Blade.name: 飞行刀片 Flying Blade
Flying Blade.description:
触发 一个活着的生物进入房间

效果 在一个生物进入房间后，房间的门突然关上并锁起来（两次[[/act pick-a-lock dc=20]]{贼活}检定以开锁），断头台的刀片分离，开始随着陷阱的先攻在房间里飞行。

Franca Laurentz.name: 弗兰卡·劳伦茨 Franca Laurentz
Franca Laurentz.allSaves: 对抗毒素时全豁免+2环境加值

+2 circumstance bonus on saves vs. poiso.name: 对抗毒素时全豁免+2环境加值

Deflective Dodge.name: 偏移闪避 Deflective Dodge
Deflective Dodge.description:
触发 某个生物以弗兰卡为目标进行打击，结果失败或大失败

效果 弗兰卡可以选择进行一次快步，或者把攻击偏转到攻击者触及范围内的的另一个和弗兰卡相邻目标身上。

攻击者必须对新目标重新进行一次打击，重骰这次攻击的攻击检定。

Bloody Rebel.name: 血腥反叛 Bloody Rebel
Bloody Rebel.description:
弗兰卡快速猛击附近的敌人，试图让对手残废甚至倒下。她最多进行三次近战打击，每次针对不同的目标。

这三次打击都计算弗兰卡的多重攻击减值，但在所有打击都完成后才增加。

如果命中，此打击造成@Damage[3[bleed]]伤害，而非原来的伤害。

如果重击，生物直到弗兰卡的下回合开始前陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]，或者他们可以花费一个动作来移除措手不及状态，二者以先发生的情况为准。

Hamstring.name: 断筋 Hamstring
Hamstring.description:
需求 弗兰卡的上一个动作是一近战打击，并且对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成了偷袭伤害

效果 弗兰卡对目标生物造成@Damage[6[bleed]]伤害，并且目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 弗兰卡对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成3d6精准伤害。

Splash Poison.name: 泼洒毒药 Splash Poison
Splash Poison.description:
弗兰卡对流血的敌人泼洒毒药。

她从携带物中取出毒药，然后泼向一个10尺内的正在遭受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}的生物。

该生物必须通过@Check[reflex|dc:32]豁免，否则将暴露于毒素的影响下。

+2 Circumstance Bonus on Saves vs. Poiso.name: +2 Circumstance Bonus on Saves vs. Poison

Freezing Alarm.name: Freezing Alarm
Freezing Alarm.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:53|name:Disable Arcana] (legendary) to draw a fiery counteracting glyph over each snowflake, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank, counteract DC 48)
Freezing Alarm.hazarddescription: Miniature snowflake-shaped glyphs on the ground cause a layer of ice to ripple over the floor of the room and sound a silent alarm.

Freeze Floor.name: Freeze Floor
Freeze Floor.description:
Trigger A creature enters one of the three squares marked with a T on the map

Effect The floor of the entire 10-foot-by-15-foot antechamber freezes over, sending deadly magical frost creeping up the legs of the intruders. Any creatures standing in the room must roll a @Check[reflex|dc:45] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(3d10+5)[cold]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(6d10+10)[cold]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(12d10+20)[cold]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Additionally, the golems in area B10 become aware of the intruders. The golems activate and come to this room to attack, if they haven't been destroyed already.

equipment-Alietta (+1 Striking Bastard S.name: 阿丽埃塔(+1强击变种剑) Alietta
equipment-Alietta (+1 Striking Bastard S.description: 这种宽刃剑，有时被称为半手剑，有较长的握柄，因此可以一手握住或双手使用，以提供额外的刺穿或切割力。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
当弗雷弗斯被摧毁时，他的身体和物品在朦胧的影子中化为虚无，骑士会在D12区的尸瓮内经过[[/gmr 1d4 #days]]{1d4天}后重新形成，完全愈合。

只有把@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6MIBHKMJmD8uQVam]（D34区）带到尸瓮（D12区），才能困住弗雷弗斯，在这种情况下，弗雷弗斯的身体将消散，把他的物品留在他最后被杀死的地方。

Head Hunter.name: 猎头者 Head Hunter
Head Hunter.description:
弗雷弗斯持有的任何挥砍武器都获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]符文效果，任何短柄斧都获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]符文效果。

如弗雷弗斯以挥砍武器的重击杀死一个敌人，则目标被斩首，效果就如同弗雷弗斯对目标使用了收割技能一般。

这些效果只有当弗雷弗斯持握武器的时候才生效。

Impaler.name: 刺穿 Impaler
Impaler.description:
每当弗雷弗斯以远程穿刺武器的重击伤害一个生物时，武器会刺入受害者的体内。

当受害者被刺穿时，受害者始终获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}；刺入的武器可以被受害者或邻近的盟友以一个具有操纵特征的2动作行动取出。

Reap.name: 收割 Reap
Reap.description:
弗雷弗斯砍掉触及内一个死亡生物的头颅。

弗雷弗斯的恐怖威压灵光范围内的所有生物必须立即进行一次新的豁免，即使他们当前对恐怖威压临时免疫。

Summon Steed.name: 召唤战马 Summon Steed
Summon Steed.description:
与一般的无头骑士不同，弗雷弗斯能召唤@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.qRUqoezeEnQ2KdyT]（这已经被计入了弗雷弗斯的等级和这次遭遇的难度）。

此坐骑持续存在，直到它被杀死、弗雷弗斯@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]它，或弗雷弗斯召唤另一个坐骑为止。

Charming Liar.name: 富有魅力的骗子 Charming Liar
Charming Liar.description:
当盖奇进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.VTg4t8kYTvXcHROq]动作时取得大成功的结果后，目标对他的态度会同时提升一个级别，就如同他成功使用交涉技能进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]。

这在每次会话中只能生效一次，如果他使用相同的结果对抗多个目标，则只能选择其中一个生物改善其态度。

为了使用此能力，盖奇还必须通过撒谎来传递看似重要的信息，吹嘘自己的地位，而微不足道或无关紧要的谎言是无法达成这样的效果的。

Smooth Operator.name: 万人迷 Smooth Operator
Smooth Operator.description:
当盖奇会见不超过5人的一小群人时，他能立即尝试一次交涉检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.1Sj2Pz3VI2SFWqZw]，将其检定结果和所有人的意志DC进行比较。

他在此检定中有-3减值，并且每个目标单独计算成功度。如果他对其中某个目标失败或大失败，他可以进行一分钟的会话来补救，并在时间结束后立即对目标尝试一次新的检定，取代之前的检定结果。

Bullyrag Beatdown.name: 威吓猛击 Bullyrag Beatdown
Bullyrag Beatdown.description: 每当帮派暴徒对一个惊惧的生物进行了一次成功的近战打击，打击额外造成一个武器伤害骰的伤害。

Frightening Critical.name: 恐惧重击 Frightening Critical
Frightening Critical.description: 每当帮派暴徒使用一个钝击武器达成重击并造成伤害，目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

equipment-+2 Striking Crossbow.name: +2 Striking Crossbow
equipment-+2 Striking Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

equipment-+2 Striking Dagger.name: +2 Striking Dagger
equipment-+2 Striking Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor
equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Bolts.name: Bolts
equipment-Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Sidestep.name: Sidestep
Sidestep.description:
Trigger The attack roll for a Strike targeting the assassin fails or critically fails

Effect The assassin deftly steps out of the way of the attack. If there's another creature adjacent to the assassin and within reach of the triggering attack, the assassin redirects the attack to that adjacent creature. The attacker then rerolls the Strike's attack roll against the new target.

Point Blank.name: Point Blank
Point Blank.description: The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against an adjacent enemy; unlike most ranged Strikes, this Strike doesn't provoke reactions. If successful, the attack deals an additional 4d8 precision damage.

Running Reload.name: Running Reload
Running Reload.description: The master assassin Strides, Steps, or Sneaks, then Interacts to reload her crossbow.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The master assassin deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Study Target.name: Study Target
Study Target.description: The master assassin observes a single target she can see, allowing her to use her Vorpal Garrote during the next round.

Vorpal Garrote.name: Vorpal Garrote
Vorpal Garrote.description:
Requirements The master assassin used Study Target during the previous round and must have a garrote bolt

Effect The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against the target she previously studied. If she rolls a success on her attack roll, she gets a critical success instead. The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:36|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect.

Failure The target takes an additional 3d12 precision damage.

Critical Failure The target is decapitated and instantly dies unless it doesn't require a head to live.

Gas Trap.name: 毒气陷阱 Gas Trap
Gas Trap.disable: Four @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Block Gas Vents|traits:action:disable-a-device] checks to block the gas vents, or a @Check[thievery|dc:26|name:Unlock Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] check to unlock the door and escape
Gas Trap.hazarddescription: 在四个隐藏的气体通风口开始向房间注入毒气之前，房间的门突然关上并上锁。
Gas Trap.reset: 必须通过疏浚通风口或更换E30区域的毒气箱以手动重新启用陷阱。
Gas Trap.routine:
（1动作）每一轮到它的回合，陷阱都会向房间注入更多的毒气。

房间里的任何在呼吸的生物都会受到@Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害（成功通过@Check[fortitude|dc:22|traits:poison,damaging-effect]豁免以减半伤害）。如果在第一轮，一个生物在陷阱的回合之前行动，它可以选择屏住呼吸来推迟受到陷阱的伤害——在陷阱第一次行动后屏住呼吸将没有效果，因为该生物肺部的空气已经受到了污染。找到并阻塞其中一个隐藏的气体出口可以减少1d6的毒素伤害——如果所有的四个出口都被阻塞了，陷阱将被解除，尽管门仍然是锁着的。否则，陷阱将运行1分钟，然后所有气体耗尽，房间中的生物停止受到伤害，之后陷阱再打开房间1分钟。
Gas Trap.stealthdetails: （受训）以闻到毒气或听到嘶嘶声

Toxic Gas.name: 毒气 Toxic Gas
Toxic Gas.description:
触发 一个生物打开了其中的一个抽屉

效果 房间的门突然关上并上锁，陷阱骰先攻。（陷阱也可以手动触发或从E30区域解除。）

Light Form.name: Light Form
Light Form.description:
A ghaele's body is partially corporeal and partially composed of light, with a color corresponding to the elemental energy currently residing in its blade (see Choose Weakness).

It can move through solid objects but can't end its action within a solid object.

Choose Weakness.name: Choose Weakness
Choose Weakness.description:
A ghaele attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about a foe they are facing.

If successful, they can change the elemental damage dealt by their greatsword and light ray to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic, usually to match the foe's weakness.

They can also change their energy resistance to any of these energy types (this can be a different type than for their attacks).

The choices remain until they next use Choose Weakness.

Ghaele's Gaze.name: Ghaele's Gaze
Ghaele's Gaze.description:
When a ghaele fixes their gaze upon a non-good creature, the creature is subjected to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sX2o0HH4RjJDAZ8C]{Divine Decree} (@Check[will|dc:20|name:Divine Decree|traits:damaging-effect] save).

If it survives, the creature is temporarily immune to for 1 minute.

Greater Holy Blade.name: Greater Holy Blade
Greater Holy Blade.description: Any weapon becomes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rvItjGQaYT7Luwtm]{+3} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.KCQRFvUgbyclvOGi]{Greater Striking} weapon while the ghaele wields it.

Free Blade.name: Free Blade
Free Blade.description:
Trigger The ghaele ends its turn while unable to act or attempts a greatsword Strike that would take a circumstance or status penalty.

Effect A ghaele's blade is implacable in the pursuit of freedom, and its energies can overpower any effect that would interfere with its swordplay.

The ghaele attempts to counteract each effect that prevents it from making a greatsword Strike, gives it a penalty to its greatsword Strike, or prevents it from acting.

The ghaele can use this ability even if it's otherwise unable to act.

Giant Bone Skipper.name: 巨跳骨蝇 Giant Bone Skipper
Giant Bone Skipper.senses: 骸骨感知（模糊） 30 尺, 黑暗视觉

Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: 骸骨感知（模糊）30尺
Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: 巨跳骨蝇能感知到范围内的骨头和具有骨骼系统的生物。

Leaping Charge.name: 跳跃冲锋 Leaping Charge
Leaping Charge.description: 巨跳骨蝇@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]最多20尺。然后进行一次虫颚打击，此次攻击检定获得+1环境加值。

Marrow Rot.name: 骨髓热疫 Marrow Rot
Marrow Rot.description:
骨髓热疫只能影响具有骨骼系统的生物。

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:25|traits:disease]

潜伏期 1天

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1天）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1天）

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1天）

Hypnotic Glow.name: Hypnotic Glow
Hypnotic Glow.description: 30 feet. Similar to other will-o'-wisps, a gloaming will-o'-wisp is naturally invisible, but glows with a faint colored light. They cast dim light in the aura, which makes them visible. In addition, any non-aberration creature that ends their turn in the aura and can see the gloaming will-o'-wisp is distracted by the gloaming will-o'-wisp's glow and must attempt a @Check[will|dc:31] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round and takes @Damage[3d6[mental]] damage.

Magic Immunity.name: Magic Immunity
Magic Immunity.description: A will-o'-wisp is immune to all spells except @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Revealing Light}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Quandary}.

Feed on Fear.name: Feed on Fear
Feed on Fear.description:
Requirement An enemy is under a fear effect or dying within 15 feet of the will-o'-wisp

Effect The will-o'-wisp feeds on the creature's terror. They regains 4d8 Hit Points, and if they've Gone Dark, their glow reignites. A will-o'-wisp can take this action only once per round.

Go Dark.name: Go Dark
Go Dark.description: The gloaming will-o'-wisp extinguishes their hypnotic glow, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. They can end this effect with another use of this action. If they use their shock attack while invisible, the arc of electricity lets any observer determine their location, making the will-o'-wisp only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to observers until they move.

Grabble Forden.name: Grabble Forden
Grabble Forden.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency 7 times per day

Requirements Grabble hasn't acted yet on this turn

Effect Grabble can cast one prepared spell he has already cast today without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements. He can do this once per day for each of the spell ranks he can cast.

Poison Conversion.name: Poison Conversion
Poison Conversion.description:
Frequency 3 times per day

Effect If Grabble's next action is to cast a cantrip or a spell that is 6th rank or lower and deals acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, the spell deals poison damage rather than its normal damage type and gains the poison trait.

Planar Coven.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.
Planar Coven.name: Planar Coven

Sea Hag's Bargain.name: Sea Hag's Bargain
Sea Hag's Bargain.description: The sea hag can make a bargain with a willing creature, who must be of sound mind. The creature gives away a special or cherished quality-such as its courage, its beauty, or its voice-in exchange for a boon or a promise from the sea hag. As long as the sea hag keeps her end of the bargain, the only way to restore the lost quality is to defeat the sea hag or make another bargain for its return.

Dread Gaze.name: Dread Gaze
Dread Gaze.description:
The hag gazes upon a creature, afflicting it with intense distress and a gnawing sense of impending doom, with a result depending on its @Check[will|dc:37] save. The target does not need to be able to see the sea hag.

Critical Success No effect.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure Frightened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the target was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:37] save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and slowed 1 for 1 minute. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Pull Under.name: Pull Under
Pull Under.description:
Requirements A creature within 60 feet of Graem or Grinlowe is in contact with the waters of Stormholt

Effect The hag casts maze (DC 37) on the creature, magically pulling the creature beneath the water (regardless of its actual depth) into an extradimensional underwater maze of shipwrecks. Between the two of them, Graem and Grinlowe can have only one creature trapped in the maze, but either hag can use the Sustain a Spell action to sustain the effect.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
When a graveknight is destroyed, its armor rebuilds its body over the course of [[/gmr 1d10 #days]] days-or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts.

A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating its armor (such as with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}), transporting it to the Forge of Creation, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

Sacrilegious Aura.name: Sacrilegious Aura
Sacrilegious Aura.description: 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a vitality spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a +27 counteract modifier.

Devastating Blast.name: Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description:
The graveknight unleashes a @Template[cone|distance:30] of energy.

Creatures in the area take @Damage[10d12[fire]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic|options:area-effect] save).

The graveknight can't use this ability again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]]{1d4 rounds}.

Graveknight's Curse.name: Graveknight's Curse
Graveknight's Curse.description:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour

Saving Throw @Check[will|dc:43|traits:curse] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and can't remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, hampered 10, and can't remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight

Kharnas's Blessing.name: Kharnas's Blessing
Kharnas's Blessing.description:
The graveknight carves the sigil of Kharnas onto an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} creature.

As long as the creature bears the sigil of Kharnas, it takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against the abilities of any creature that previously served Kharnas, but it can also freely pass through any hazards that can be bypassed by those bearing the sigil of Kharnas, such as Kharnas's glyphs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.St2QzqQvKN0IaXxG]{Effect: Kharna's Blessing}

Weapon Master.name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.

Greater Planar Rift.name: Greater Planar Rift
Greater Planar Rift.disable: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 46) to seal the rift
Greater Planar Rift.hazarddescription: A ragged planar rift drags things into its depths and hurls creatures through from its terminal end.

Greater Planar Rift.name: Greater Planar Rift
Greater Planar Rift.description:
Trigger A creature moves within 5 feet of the rift

Effect The creature must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:44] save or be drawn into the rift. A creature so drawn in becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} and immediately teleports to a different random area in Kharnas's ruins.

Cheek Pouches.name: 颊囊 Cheek Pouches
Cheek Pouches.description: 鼠族生有带弹性的颊囊，可以储存至多1立方尺的物体（或者不超过4个轻量物品）。鼠族能够通过交互动作从中取出或存储1 件物品。只要颊囊内有至少一件物品，鼠族说的话就会变得难以理解。

Katar Specialist.name: 拳刃专家 Katar Specialist
Katar Specialist.description: 走私者对拳刃进行了广泛的训练。他们使用的任何拳刃获得娴熟特征。

Quick Stow.name: 快速存储 Quick Stow
Quick Stow.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 鼠族将一件手持的物品存入颊囊，该物品的负载需要为轻量或者忽略不计。

Swarming.name: 成群结队 Swarming
Swarming.description:
鼠族在结束移动时，可以与同样具有该能力的盟友共享相同的方格。

只有2名此类生物可以共享相同的空间。

Unbalancing Blow.name: 失衡冲击 Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: 受到穴居攫怪重击的生物在穴居攫怪的下回合结束前对它的攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Vermicular Movement.name: 蠕行 Vermicular Movement
Vermicular Movement.description: 当穴居攫怪以半速行走时不会触发反应动作。

equipment-Bolts.name: Bolts
equipment-Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Dueling Parry.name: Dueling Parry
Dueling Parry.description: As long as he has one free hand, Grimwold can parry attacks against him with his longsword. He gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of his next turn as long as his other hand remains free.

Studied Strike.name: Studied Strike
Studied Strike.description: Grimwold studies his foe for weaknesses to exploit. His next successful Strike against that target deals an additional 4d6 precision damage.

equipment-+2 Greater Striking Longsword.name: +2 Greater Striking Longsword
equipment-+2 Greater Striking Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

equipment-Crossbow.name: Crossbow
equipment-Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

equipment-Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
equipment-Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

equipment-Disguise Kit (Elite).name: Disguise Kit (Elite)
equipment-Disguise Kit (Elite).description: This small wooden box contains cosmetics, false facial hair, spirit gum, and a few simple wigs. You usually need a disguise kit to set up a disguise in order to Impersonate someone using the Deception skill. An elite disguise kit adds a +1 item bonus to relevant checks. If you've crafted a large number of disguises, you can replenish your cosmetics supply with replacement cosmetics suitable for the type of your disguise kit.

Sea Hag's Bargain.name: Sea Hag's Bargain
Sea Hag's Bargain.description: The sea hag can make a bargain with a willing creature, who must be of sound mind. The creature gives away a special or cherished quality-such as its courage, its beauty, or its voice-in exchange for a boon or a promise from the sea hag. As long as the sea hag keeps her end of the bargain, the only way to restore the lost quality is to defeat the sea hag or make another bargain for its return.

Dread Gaze.name: Dread Gaze
Dread Gaze.description:
The hag gazes upon a creature, afflicting it with intense distress and a gnawing sense of impending doom, with a result depending on its @Check[will|dc:37] save. The target does not need to be able to see the sea hag.

Critical Success No effect.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure Frightened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the target was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:37] save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and slowed 1 for 1 minute. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Pull Under.name: Pull Under
Pull Under.description:
Requirements A creature within 60 feet of Graem or Grinlowe is in contact with the waters of Stormholt

Effect The hag casts maze (DC 37) on the creature, magically pulling the creature beneath the water (regardless of its actual depth) into an extradimensional underwater maze of shipwrecks. Between the two of them, Graem and Grinlowe can have only one creature trapped in the maze, but either hag can use the Sustain a Spell action to sustain the effect.

Planar Coven.name: Planar Coven
Planar Coven.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.

Grospek Lavarsus.name: 葛罗佩克·拉瓦苏斯 Grospek Lavarsus

equipment-Lawkeeper (+1 Striking Pacifyi.name: 法律维护者(+1强击安抚棍棒) Lawkeeper

Furious Pacifier.name: 暴力安抚 Furious Pacifier
Furious Pacifier.description: 拉瓦苏斯使用任何钝击武器进行非致命近战打击时，应用2倍的力量调整值。

Nonlethal Training.name: 非致命训练 Nonlethal Training
Nonlethal Training.description:
拉瓦苏斯接受过制服嫌犯但不杀死他们的训练。

他可以使用任何钝击武器进行非致命攻击，而不会受到通常的攻击惩罚。

Grunka.name: 格伦卡 Grunka
Grunka.publicNotes:
牠们是哥布林部落的前线战士，偏好大团队作战，最好是人数可以超过敌人的三倍之多。

这些小型的类人生物有着绿或灰色的皮肤，大大的头颅与招风耳。虽然有些哥布林有教养，工作勤奋被类人社群承认为优秀的一员，但大部分的哥布林是冲动又邪恶的生物，为了愉悦而发洩破坏欲。这些哥布林为了刹那间的愉悦去屠宰家畜、偷小孩或烧房子没什么问题。牠们热衷对高大的人类生物(牠们称这些人为「长脚」)恶劣的恶作剧。

哥布林十分迷信，对魔法有强烈的畏怯，对火十分着迷；能掌握魔法或火焰的哥布林，会得到族类的尊敬。其他类人生物很难理解哥布林的想法：牠们很讨厌犬科动物，但又很喜欢把巢穴与牠们称之为「地精犬」的生物共享，牠们无惧比牠们大的生物的攻击，却非常害怕马，牠们讨厌蔬菜却觉得泡菜超棒。当然，对哥布林来说，这些全都是聪明哥布林的完美选择。

strike-Lesser Alchemist's Fire.name: 次等炽火胶 Lesser Alchemist's Fire
strike-Lesser Alchemist's Fire.description:
[[/r (1)[persistent,fire]]] 持续火焰伤害

[[/r (1)[splash,fire]]]{1火焰溅射伤害}

Goblin Scuttle.name: 哥布林快跑 Goblin Scuttle
Goblin Scuttle.description:
触发 一个哥布林盟友在格伦卡旁结束一个移动动作。

效果 格伦卡@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]。

Hands Of The Forgotten.name: 被遗忘者之手 Hands Of The Forgotten
Hands Of The Forgotten.disable: @Check[religion|dc:30|name:Exorcise Spirits]（大师）以驱除灵魂或@Check[intimidation|dc:32|name:Scare Away the Hands|traits:action:demoralize]（专家）以吓跑这些手
Hands Of The Forgotten.hazarddescription: 灵体的手从墙壁和地板上伸出来，试图抓住附近的生物。

Waylay.name: 拦路 Waylay
Waylay.description:
触发 一个生物进入地图上标记的地区

效果 雾蓝色的手从走廊的石砖里伸出来，抓住触发的生物，它必须尝试@Check[reflex|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，以避免被灵体的手阻碍或伤害。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}持续1轮。

失败 目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}持续1轮，受到@Damage[(2d10+10)[void]]伤害。

大失败 目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}持续1轮，受到@Damage[(4d10+15)[void]]伤害。

Hegessik.name: Hegessik

Leaching Glare.name: Leaching Glare
Leaching Glare.description:
The hegessik briefly opens its third eye.

Non-protean creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30] must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:38] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} on a critical failure).

Warpwave Strike.name: Warpwave Strike
Warpwave Strike.description: Any creature struck and damaged by a hegessik's jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save or be subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description:
A hegessik can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the hegessik the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The hegessik's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Veil of Privacy} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

+1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Divine Magi.name: +1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Divine Magic

Maddening Whispers.name: Maddening Whispers
Maddening Whispers.description:
30 feet. A susurrus of distracting whispers and dilations in reality surround a hegessik.

When a non-protean ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[will|dc:33] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Protean Anatomy 20.name: Protean Anatomy 20
Protean Anatomy 20.description:
A hegessik's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the hegessik takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The hegessik is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the hegessik automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{Effect: Protean Anatomy}

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The hegessik takes the appearance of any Large or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Telekinetic Reach.name: Telekinetic Reach
Telekinetic Reach.description:
The hegessik manifests psychic versions of its natural attacks and makes a Strike with each of its jaws, claw, and tail, in any order. These Strikes have a reach of 60 feet.

These attacks count toward the hegessik's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all the attacks.

Hegessik.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. divine magic

Hendrid Pratchett.name: 亨德瑞德·普拉切特 Hendrid Pratchett

equipment-Reaper's Lancet (Bonded Item).name: 死神手术刀(绑定物品) Reaper's Lancet
equipment-Reaper's Lancet (Bonded Item).description:
普拉切特自己设计了这把定制了骷髅头的+1强击剑杖，并镀以高品质的黄金。它的第一个受害者正是普拉切特所委托制造武器的铁匠，所以它的结构只有普拉切特自己清楚。死神手术刀的魔力同时作用于刃和鞘，这使得它们都成为+1强击武器，但只有当两者由同一生物持有时才生效——如果刃和杖由两个生物持有，则只有剑刃保留符文的魔力。

死神手术刀在前端的颅骨里有一个隐藏的储液囊，它可以在主人成功命中消耗掉之前的毒药之后自动将新的毒药注入刃中。储液囊必须人工填满（需要持续1分钟），储液囊的大小足够储存3剂毒药。任何伤口生效的毒药都能装填进去，但是3剂毒药的种类必须相同。武器价值不含其中装填的毒药价值。

启动 R 交互

触发 你用死神手术刀对一个敌人造成伤害；

效果 你将当前储液囊中的毒药施加给受害者使之中毒。

equipment-Hunting Spider Venom (in Reape.name: 猎蛛毒(死神手术刀中) Hunting Spider Venom
equipment-Hunting Spider Venom (in Reape.description:
这种毒液能够腐蚀受害者的防御，以便蜘蛛捕食猎物。

启动 D Interact (Injury)

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:21|name:Hunting Spider Venom]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}（1轮）

阶段2 [[/r (1d12)[poison]]]{1d12毒素伤害}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}和措手不及（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和措手不及（1轮）

strike-Reaper's Lancet Blade.name: 死神手术刀 Reaper's Lancet Blade

strike-Reaper's Lancet Sheath.name: 死神手术刀刀鞘 Reaper's Lancet Sheath

Sword Cane Duelist.name: 剑杖决斗 Sword Cane Duelist
Sword Cane Duelist.description: 每轮一次，普拉切特能用剑杖的两部分分别进行一次打击，并且不计算多重攻击减值。随后的攻击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Hestriviniaas.name: Hestriviniaas
Hestriviniaas.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Protean Anatomy 25.name: Protean Anatomy 25
Protean Anatomy 25.description:
Hestriviniaas' vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the Hestriviniaas takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type.

This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first. The keketar is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target.

If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the keketar automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{Effect: Protean Anatomy}

Spatial Riptide.name: Spatial Riptide
Spatial Riptide.description:
30 feet. A creature using a teleportation ability within the aura or arriving in it via teleportation must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:45] save or wink out of existence for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} before completing the teleport. The creature can't act, sense anything, or be targeted. On a successful save, the creature completes the teleport normally but is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Keketars are immune to this effect.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Hestriviniaas can take the appearance of any Gargantuan or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Warpwave Strike.name: Warpwave Strike
Warpwave Strike.description: A creature struck by Hestriviniaas' jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:45] save or be subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description:
Hestriviniaas can anticipate the most likely presence of a creature through a supernatural insight into chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants it the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

A creature under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Veil of Privacy} or that is otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions cannot be noticed via entropy sense.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Reshape Reality.name: Reshape Reality
Reshape Reality.description: When Hestriviniaas casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage}, it infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance. Creatures that do not disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on.

Hidden Chute.name: 隐藏的陷坑 Hidden Chute
Hidden Chute.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:20|name:Remove Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以拆下活板门或使用隐藏在房间门框内的卡具将其锁在适当位置
Hidden Chute.hazarddescription: 地板上的一个活板门隐藏了一个石质滑槽。

Pitfall.name: 陷坑 Pitfall
Pitfall.description:
触发 一个生物走到活板门上

效果 触发的生物从竖井向下坠落30尺到E33区，造成@Damage[15[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage]伤害，坠落在赭冻怪的坑里@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。生物可以尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]以避免掉落。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]墙壁或抓住边缘动作的DC是22。

Hundun Chaos Mage.name: Hundun Chaos Mage
Hundun Chaos Mage.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Activate Attractor.name: Activate Attractor
Activate Attractor.description:
The hundun releases its staff-like attractor, which hovers in place. The hundun can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to move the attractor up to 60 feet, to a maximum of 300 feet from the hundun. It can also use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to recall the attractor, which flies to the hundun and immediately deactivates.

Creatures within 40 feet of the attractor must attempt a @Check[will|dc:40|name:Attractor] save if they're within the area when the attractor is activated or as soon as they enter the area while it's active. Once a creature has attempted the save, it uses the same result for the rest of that activation of the attractor.

Any restrictions on a creature's movement apply only if it voluntarily moves away from the attractor. For example, if the attractor moves closer to a creature, the creature doesn't then need to move away.

Chaotic creatures are immune to the effects of the attractor.

The attractor can't be harmed by physical attacks but is destroyed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction}, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.HuGZspUvJqR09Y8u]{Rod of Cancellation}, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.B4DnQNcGl6nFVKHl]{Sphere of Annihilation}, and other similarly powerful effects.

The attractor has an AC of 40 and a counteract DC of 37. A hundun can rebuild a destroyed attractor after [[/gmr 1d8 #hours]]{1d8 hours} of uninterrupted meditation. If the hundun is slain, its attractor disappears.

Critical Success The creature's movement isn't restricted.

Success The creature treats each square in the area as difficult terrain when moving away from the attractor.

Failure The creature can't move away from the attractor within the area.

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: The hundun makes two Strikes with its fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

Motion Sense 100 feet.name: Motion Sense 100 feet
Motion Sense 100 feet.description: A hundun chaos mage can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

Entropic Feedback.name: Entropic Feedback
Entropic Feedback.description:
Trigger A creature attempts to target the hundun with a mental effect

Effect The triggering creature is subject to the utter chaos of the hundun's mind and must attempt a @Check[will|dc:40|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[10d6[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[10d6[mental]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description:
Il'setya can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants Il'setya the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The Il'setya's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Veil of Privacy} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

Protean Anatomy 10.name: Protean Anatomy 10
Protean Anatomy 10.description:
Il'setya's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after Il'setya takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, she gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time she takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

Il'setya is immune to polymorph effects unless she is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, Il'setya automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{Effect: Protean Anatomy}

Dimensional Slide.name: Dimensional Slide
Dimensional Slide.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect Il'setsya steps through a transient hole in space, instantly teleporting to a space within 60 feet that she can see.

Warpwave Spell.name: Warpwave Spell
Warpwave Spell.description:
Il'setsya infuses her next spell with roiling currents of chaos.

If Il'setsya Casts a Spell before her turn is over and the spell affects a creature, that creature is also subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

If she doesn't Cast a Spell before the beginning of her next turn, this action is wasted.

Prehensile Tail.name: Prehensile Tail
Prehensile Tail.description: Il'setsya's prehensile tail can hold and manipulate objects of Light Bulk or less, though it cannot be used to attack. She can spend an Interact action to use her tail to fetch objects stowed on her person, such as potions.

Ink Drowning Vats.name: Ink Drowning Vats
Ink Drowning Vats.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:40|name:Seal an Ink Spout|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to seal an ink spout, @Check[thievery|dc:48|name:Unlock a Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] (master) to unlock a steel hatch door, or @Check[athletics|dc:45|name:Force Open a Door|traits:action:force-open] (master) to Force Open a steel hatch door
Ink Drowning Vats.hazarddescription: Steel hatch doors automatically lock shut in each of the four vats labeled J2. Four ink spouts (one per vat) jut through a narrow aperture in the ceiling of each vat, 20 feet above.
Ink Drowning Vats.reset: The trap can be reset by refilling the ink storage tanks above the vats.
Ink Drowning Vats.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action for each disabled ink spout. On each of the trap's actions, a spout pours ink, increasing the depth of the ink in that vat by 2 feet. Creatures standing in the ink are exposed to a dose of poison ink. Once the vat is full of ink, the trap stops using actions, but creatures in the vat might start drowning.

Fill Tank.name: Fill Tank
Fill Tank.description:
Trigger The switch outside the vats is pulled

Effect The trap rolls initiative.

Poison Ink.name: Poison Ink
Poison Ink.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 3d6 poison damage and sickened 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 4d6 poison damage and sickened 2 (1 round)

Inky Tendrils.name: Inky Tendrils
Inky Tendrils.disable:
@Check[athletics|dc:48|name:Disable Athletics] (legendary) or @Check[acrobatics|dc:45|name:Disable Acrobatics] (master) to tie one tentacle into a knot, rendering it useless, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th rank; counteract DC 44) to counteract one tentacle.

The death of the Daemonic Rumormonger permanently dispels all the inky tendrils.
Inky Tendrils.hazarddescription: Six giant tentacles reach up from the ink lake, grabbing any foes in reach and dragging them underwater.
Inky Tendrils.routine: (6 actions) The hazard loses 1 action for every tentacle that is disabled or destroyed. The tentacles can combine their actions to use the hazard's Inky Imitator ability. A broken tentacle can still Strike, but it can't Grab. This hazard takes no multiple attack penalty.

Black Ink Delirium.name: Black Ink Delirium
Black Ink Delirium.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)

Inky Imitator.name: Inky Imitator
Inky Imitator.description:
The inky tendrils cast a 10th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.73rToy0v5Ra9NvL6]{Duplicate Foe} spell (@Check[fortitude|dc:40|name:Duplicate Foe]) on the target; on a failed save, a simulacrum of the target made from dripping ink and clockwork scraps emerges from any other spot (tendrils' choice) in the lake.

The tendrils don't need to Sustain the Spell; the duplicate exists for 1 minute or until it is destroyed before collapsing into a puddle of ink and scrap metal.

Tendrils Come Alive.name: Tendrils Come Alive
Tendrils Come Alive.description:
Trigger A non-daemonic creature moves within 15 feet of the shoreline

Effect The hazard makes a tentacle Strike against the triggering creature and the hazard rolls initiative.

Iron Maiden Trap.name: 铁处女陷阱 Iron Maiden Trap
Iron Maiden Trap.hazarddescription: 触发隐藏在铁处女前的地面上的压力板，折磨装置会突然合拢并将触发的生物困在里面。

Slam Shut.name: 突然合拢 Slam Shut
Slam Shut.description:
触发 一个生物走上陷阱的压力板（如地图上所示）

效果 铁处女的前部以令人难以置信的力量关闭，并自己锁住了。触发生物会遭受@Damage[(4d10+10)[piercing]]和@Damage[2d6[bleed]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic]豁免；如果该生物大成功，可以完全避开陷阱）。触发它的生物被禁足。只有当铁处女外的生物解锁装着（需要两次成功的[[/act disable-device dc=28]]{DC28贼活}检定才能解除装置）或打破铁处女，之后被困的生物再通过DC25的检定以逃脱陷阱内部的尖刺，才能免除禁足。

Iroran Skeleton.name: 义洛理僧众的骷髅 Iroran Skeleton

Collapse.name: 崩溃 Collapse
Collapse.description:
触发 义洛理僧众的骷髅被重击

效果 义洛理僧众的骷髅崩溃成了一摊骨头，触发的攻击造成命中的伤害，而不是重击的伤害。

骷髅可以花费一个动作重新进入站立姿态，但直到这么做之前，它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Flurry of Claws.name: 疾风连抓 Flurry of Claws
Flurry of Claws.description:
义洛理僧众的骷髅进行两次爪击打击。若2次都命中了同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

每次打击正常应用多次攻击减值。

Wall Run.name: 游墙功 Wall Run
Wall Run.description: 义洛理僧众的骷髅能在例如墙壁的竖直平面上行走，只要开始和结束移动时处于水平平面上。

Water Step.name: 渡水步 Water Step
Water Step.description: 义洛理僧众的骷髅能在液体表面行走。如果移动在一个液体表面上结束，它正常坠落。

Whirlwind Kick.name: 旋风踢 Whirlwind Kick
Whirlwind Kick.description: 义洛理僧众的骷髅进行单一的一次打击，将结果与它触及内的所有生物的AC作比较，并对每个命中的生物造成伤害。

Ixusoth.name: Ixusoth
Ixusoth.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

Eye Probe.name: Eye Probe
Eye Probe.description:
Frequency once per day

Up to six of Ixusoth's eyes detach from her body. Each eye has AC 26, HP 1, and a fly speed of 40 feet. Ixusoth can see through all of her eye probes. She can move the probes all in separate directions using a single action. Ixusoth can have no more than six eye probes active at a time; using this ability to create more eyes causes the eye or eyes farthest away to shrivel and die.

Ixusoth can deliver touch spells through her eye probes and make melee spell attacks through them. In addition, she can Steal Memories through an eye probe using a single action by touching the target with the eye.

Scatterbrain Palm.name: Scatterbrain Palm
Scatterbrain Palm.description:
A creature hit by Ixusoth's fist Strike must attempt a @Check[will|dc:36|options:inflicts:stunned] save. The creature is then temporarily immune until the start of its next turn.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}, and the hyakume can use Steal Memories on the target as part of this action.

Steal Memories.name: Steal Memories
Steal Memories.description: Ixusoth reaches out with her mind and attempts to steal memories from a creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:40] saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} and have some of its memories stolen. When Ixusoth steals memories, she learns some of the creature's memories (chosen by the GM). These memories are then lost to that creature.

equipment-Robe of Eyes.name: Robe of Eyes
equipment-Robe of Eyes.description:
This garment appears to be an ordinary robe until donned, at which point numerous strange and alien eyes of varied shapes and colors open and blink across its fabric. While wearing the robe, you gain a +3 item bonus to Perception checks, and you constantly benefit from the effects of a 2nd-rank see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell.

You can also see powerful magic auras. The highest-level magic aura within 30 feet of you glows in a color that reveals its school to you and allows you to determine where the effect originates. This can narrow down the origin point of the effect to a 5-foot-cube, but not more precisely than that.

The robe of eyes is not without its dangers. If any spell with the light trait is cast on you or your square while you are wearing the robe, you are blinded for a number of rounds equal to the spell's rank unless you succeed at a Fortitude save against the spell's DC.

Activate A Interact

Effect You pluck an eye from the robe and toss it into the air, where it turns invisible and floats to a destination you choose, with the same effect as a 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Scouting Eye} spell. You can Sustain the Activation just as you would be able to Sustain the Spell.

Lore Master.description: Ixusoth retains a vast amount of knowledge. She can use her Bardic Lore skill to Recall Knowledge on any topic, and she knows any languages common to an area she has spent a day or more in.
Lore Master.name: Lore Master

Izfiitar.name: Izfiitar
Izfiitar.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet.description:
A Izfiitar can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the izflitar the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The izflitar's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Veil of Privacy} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Kiss of the Speakers.name: Kiss of the Speakers
Kiss of the Speakers.description:
The izfiitar continuously tinkers with the myriad possibilities in which it can move or manipulate magic.

The izfiitar is always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action only to Cast a Spell, Step, or Stride.

Prescient Revision.description:
Trigger The izfiitar fails a check

Effect The izfiitar rerolls the triggering check and takes the better result.

For [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, it loses the effects of Kiss of the Speakers and can't use Reshape Reality.
Prescient Revision.name: Prescient Revision

Protean Anatomy 25.name: Protean Anatomy 25
Protean Anatomy 25.description:
A izfiitar's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the izfiitar takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The izfiitar is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the izfiitar automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{Effect: Protean Anatomy}

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The izfiitar takes the appearance of any Huge or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Storm of Claws.name: Storm of Claws
Storm of Claws.description: The izfiitar makes up to six claw Strikes, each against a different target.

Greater Warpwave Strike.name: Greater Warpwave Strike
Greater Warpwave Strike.description:
Any creature struck and damaged by an izfiitar's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:42] save or be subject to a particularly powerful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

Roll twice and apply both affects, rerolling any duplicates.

Reshape Reality.name: Reshape Reality
Reshape Reality.description: When the izfiitar casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage}, it infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance. Creatures that do not disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on.

Jonis Flakfatter.name: Jonis Flakfatter

Call Toxins.name: Call Toxins
Call Toxins.description: 30 feet. Flakfatter exudes an aura that makes poisons more potent. His melee Strikes deal an additional @Damage[2d8[persistent,poison]]. Creatures in the aura attempting a flat check to remove persistent poison damage must roll twice and take the lower result. Flakfatter can suppress or resume this aura as a free action.

Infector.name: Infector
Infector.description: Flakfatter targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Flakfatter's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

equipment-+1 Spell Storing Dagger (conta.name: +1 Spell Storing Dagger (contains crisis of faith)
equipment-+1 Spell Storing Dagger (conta.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-Religious Symbol (Norgorber).name: Religious Symbol (Norgorber)
equipment-Religious Symbol (Norgorber).description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.

Jonis Flakfatter.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. disease and poison

equipment-+2 Striking Staff.name: +2 Striking Staff
equipment-+2 Striking Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

equipment-Healing Potion (Moderate).name: Healing Potion (Moderate)
equipment-Healing Potion (Moderate).description: A healing potion is a vial of a ruby-red liquid that imparts a tingling sensation as the drinker's wounds heal rapidly. When you drink a healing potion, you regain @Damage[(3d8+10)[healing]] Hit Points.

Contingency Plan.name: Contingency Plan
Contingency Plan.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Kapral is targeted by an attack

Effect Kapral casts blink on herself.

equipment-Disguise Kit (Elite).name: Disguise Kit (Elite)
equipment-Disguise Kit (Elite).description: This small wooden box contains cosmetics, false facial hair, spirit gum, and a few simple wigs. You usually need a disguise kit to set up a disguise in order to Impersonate someone using the Deception skill. An elite disguise kit adds a +1 item bonus to relevant checks. If you've crafted a large number of disguises, you can replenish your cosmetics supply with replacement cosmetics suitable for the type of your disguise kit.

equipment-Bracers of Armor II.name: Bracers of Armor II
equipment-Bracers of Armor II.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Cheek Pouches.name: 颊囊 Cheek Pouches
Cheek Pouches.description: 鼠族生有带弹性的颊囊，可以储存至多1立方尺的物体（或者不超过4个轻量物品）。鼠族能够通过交互动作从中取出或存储1 件物品。只要颊囊内有至少一件物品，鼠族说的话就会变得难以理解。

Katar Specialist.name: 拳刃专家 Katar Specialist
Katar Specialist.description: 走私者对拳刃进行了广泛的训练。他们使用的任何拳刃获得娴熟特征。

Quick Stow.name: 快速存储 Quick Stow
Quick Stow.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 鼠族将一件手持的物品存入颊囊，该物品的负载需要为轻量或者忽略不计。

Swarming.name: 成群结队 Swarming
Swarming.description:
鼠族在结束移动时，可以与同样具有该能力的盟友共享相同的方格。

只有2名此类生物可以共享相同的空间。

Eschew Materials.name: 施法免材 Eschew Materials
Eschew Materials.description:
你用巧妙的方法复制某些材料的奥法精华。在需要材料成分的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]行动中，你可以借由在大气中绘制复杂用以取代的法印，在没有法术材料包的情况提供材料成分。

不同于提供姿势成分，你必须有一只完全自由的手。但这无法取代任何在法术花费项目上列出的材料。

Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.name: Kharnas's Lesser Glyph
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.disable: Disable @Check[thievery|dc:46|name:Destroy Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to destroy the glyph, @Check[arcana|dc:42|name:Divert Glyph's Power] (master) to harmlessly divert the glyph's power, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th rank; counteract DC 38) to counteract the glyph
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.hazarddescription: A hidden glyph suddenly lights up and dominates the mind of any creature not bearing the sigil of Kharnas the Angel-Binder.
Kharnas's Lesser Glyph.reset: The glyph can affect two creatures before it deactivates for 5 minutes and automatically resets.

Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.description:
Trigger A creature who doesn't bear the sigil of Kharnas attempts to open the door

Effect A surge of the Radiant Spark's latent power courses through the glyph and washes over the triggering creature. If the creature is undead, it takes @Damage[10d10[vitality]] damage. If it's living, it instead regains @Damage[10d10[healing]] Hit Points. It then must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:40|traits:incapacitation,mental] save or be affected by a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} spell.

The spell commands the affected creature to attack the nearest creature who doesn't bear the sigil of Kharnas.

Scurry.name: 飞跑 Scurry
Scurry.description:
触发 一个生物在邻接科洛的地方停止移动

效果 科洛快步。

Upward Stab.name: 以小博大 Upward Stab
Upward Stab.description: 科洛对中型或更大的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

Lie-Master.name: Lie-Master
Lie-Master.publicNotes:
Glabrezus are looming behemoths who revel in the act of twisting mortal desires into their ultimate ruin, betraying and manipulating as easily as they breathe. Desires granted by a glabrezu always come to fruition in the most destructive way possible, turning a wish or hope into a potent and devastating act of betrayal-although the long-term repercussions are not always immediately apparent. For example, a struggling weapon smith might wish for fame and skill at their craft, only to find that their best patron is a cruel and sadistic murderer who uses the weapons in bloody sprees. Or a lonely widower might have his desire granted in the form of a lost love returned to "life" as a vampire. Glabrezus are nothing if not creative in addressing a mortal's needs.

These massive demons have enormous pincers and a pair of smaller humanoid arms sprouting from their chests, but their size belies their skill at magic, and they possess formidable innate spells. Treachery demons arise from the souls of mortals engaged in treason and deception.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: When a reaction would disrupt a glabrezu's spell, the demon can attempt a @Check[flat|dc:17] check, avoiding the disruption on a success.

Sudden Betrayal.name: Sudden Betrayal
Sudden Betrayal.description: A glabrezu can always use Deception when rolling initiative as long as they're aware of at least one opponent before initiative is rolled. When using Deception for initiative, the demon gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception.

Tentacle Trip.name: Tentacle Trip
Tentacle Trip.description:
Trigger A creature within 15 feet of the lie-master uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect The creature must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:34] save or be knocked prone by the lie-master's clockwork tentacles.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Truth Vulnerability.name: Truth Vulnerability
Truth Vulnerability.description: A glabrezu's lies sustain them, and the truth can destroy them. Whenever a revelation effect counteracts or reveals the glabrezu's illusions or the glabrezu fails a save against an effect that would prevent them from lying (such as zone of truth), the demon takes @Damage[(3d6+4)[mental]] damage. They take this damage only once per effect, even if the effect reveals multiple illusions or prevents multiple lies.

Captive Rake.name: Captive Rake
Captive Rake.description:
Requirements A creature is grabbed in the glabrezu's pincer.

Effect The glabrezu pulls the grabbed creature up to 5 feet closer, then makes two claw Strikes against it. Those Strikes count as one attack when determining a treachery demon's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.

Treacherous Veil.name: Treacherous Veil
Treacherous Veil.description: A glabrezu's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} can allow it to appear as a creature of any size.

Twisted Desires.name: Twisted Desires
Twisted Desires.description: Once per month, a glabrezu can grant a mortal humanoid the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle} spell granted by an Abyssal patron, though the glabrezu always perverts the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle} according to their own treacherous nature.

Lie-Master.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Life Magnet.name: 生物磁体 Life Magnet
Life Magnet.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:29|name:Deactivate Panel|traits:action:disable-a-device]（专家）以拆除嵌板，或使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（4环级；反制DC22）来反制嵌板上的魔法
Life Magnet.hazarddescription: 隐藏在房间角落的嵌板后有一块神奇的磁体，会将生物而不是金属拉向它，并忽略途中的任何障碍。
Life Magnet.reset: 在铁栅栏没有接触任何生物1分钟后，陷阱解除并重置。
Life Magnet.routine:
（1动作）陷阱将至多四个已经触发了它生物磁化能力的生物拉向房间的一个角落，可能会将他们压到铁栅栏上。如果受影响的生物和磁板间的所有铁栅栏还保持完好，该生物受到@Damage[(2d10+10)[bludgeoning]]伤害，需要通过@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic|options:inflicts:restrained]豁免，失败则被束缚（[[/act escape dc=23]]）。

如果一根铁栅破损了，则生物只会受到@Damage[(1d10+5)[bludgeoning]]伤害，如果连续的两根铁栅都破损了，则生物不会受到任何伤害（但豁免失败仍会被束缚）。

Magnetize the Living.name: 生物磁化 Magnetize the Living
Magnetize the Living.description:
触发 生物接触这个区域的任何铁栅或接触已经受到陷阱影响的生物

效果 隐藏在房间的远端角落的魔法嵌板（西方或东方的角落，取决于触发陷阱时生物最接近房间的哪一边）“磁化”触发的生物，暴力地把它拉向角落，自动对生物造成@Damage[(2d10+10)[bludgeoning]]伤害。

陷阱如果还未骰先攻就骰。

Backdrop.name: Backdrop
Backdrop.description: When a creature attempts to Strike a living mural and critically misses, the attacker hits the surface (a wall, canvas, or so on) behind the living mural. This can damage or break the weapon or surface.

Surface-Bound.name: Surface-Bound
Surface-Bound.description:
A living mural can move only along flat surfaces such as floors and walls. This allows it to end its movement wrapped around corners when on a continuous surface.

If the surface it's on is destroyed (such as a portrait hit by a fireball spell or a puddle being splashed), the mural takes [[/r {10d6}]]{10d6 damage} and is shunted to the nearest flat surface. If there is no flat surface within 5 feet, the living mural is destroyed.

Collective Attack.name: Collective Attack
Collective Attack.description:
The subjects depicted within the living mural all reach out at once to attack. The living mural makes a fist Strike against each target within range.

These attacks count toward the living mural's multiple attack penalty, but this penalty doesn't increase until after all of the attacks are made.

Paint the Masses.name: Paint the Masses
Paint the Masses.description:
The living mural expels a @Template[cone|distance:15] of paint.

Creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:41] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

The living mural can't use Paint the Masses again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Paint the Masses]]{1d4 rounds}.

Splash of Color.name: Splash of Color
Splash of Color.description: When the living mural hits with a splatter attack, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Living Paints.name: Living Paints
Living Paints.disable: @Check[crafting|dc:41|name:Crafting Disable] (master) to mix the paints into bland, useless colors, @Check[thievery|dc:41|name:Thievery Disable] (legendary) to dismantle the animated brushes, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th rank; counteract DC 41) to counteract the magic within the paint.
Living Paints.hazarddescription: A mass of brushes use magical paint to convert creatures into art.

Capture Subject.name: Capture Subject
Capture Subject.description:
Trigger A creature steps into the same space as the paints

Effect The brushes animate and attempt to paint all creatures within 30 feet. The creatures must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:41] save to avoid the brushes and splashes from paint cans or be converted into living artwork for 1 hour.

A creature that becomes living artwork is immediately bound to the nearest flat surface of its size or larger within 30 feet. The creature can move only along flat surfaces such as floors and walls. This allows it to end its movement wrapped around corners when on a continuous surface.

While bound to a surface, the creature can attack from its space as normal, including against other creatures bound to the same surface.

If the surface it's on is destroyed (such as a portrait hit by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} spell or a wall being demolished), the creature takes [[/r {10d6}]]{10d6 damage} and is shunted to the nearest flat surface. If there is no flat surface within 5 feet, the creature is destroyed.

equipment-+3 Greater Striking speed Hand.name: +3 Greater Striking speed Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+3 Greater Striking speed Hand.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Double Punch.name: Double Punch
Double Punch.description: Lord Guirden makes two fist Strikes, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after both Strikes.

Hurl.name: Hurl
Hurl.description:
Requirements Lord Guirden has a Medium or smaller creature grabbed

Effect Lord Guirden hurls the grabbed creature into a target adjacent to him. He makes a fist Strike against the adjacent target. On a success, the target and hurled creature both take 3d10+14 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone. On a failure, only the thrown creature takes the damage and is knocked prone.

Master Brawler.name: Master Brawler
Master Brawler.description: Whenever Lord Guirden makes a fist Strike and hits, he can choose to apply either the Grab, Knockdown, or Push ability to his attack.

Lusca.name: Lusca
Lusca.publicNotes: A lusca is a predatory sea monster that resembles a three-headed shark with the body of an octopus. Ferocious electrical storms usually herald a lusca's arrival; such violent bursts of electricity result from the creature's superconductive flesh, which allows the lusca to store energy from lightning strikes that it can then discharge at foes.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
The lusca gains 2 extra reactions at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with its jaws. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action.

Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Capsize.name: Capsize
Capsize.description: The lusca tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the lusca) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

Lusca Venom.name: Lusca Venom
Lusca Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 6d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

Ravenous Jaws.description: The lusca makes three jaws Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the lusca's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the lusca makes all of these attacks. If the lusca subsequently uses the Grab action, it Grabs any number of creatures it hit with Ravenous Jaws.
Ravenous Jaws.name: Ravenous Jaws

Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: The lusca can smell blood in the water up to 1 mile away.

Storm Bringer.name: Storm Bringer
Storm Bringer.description: When the lusca is near the surface for more than 1 hour, clouds appear and deliver a thunderstorm with a 2-mile radius centered on its location. The weather returns to normal 1 hour after the lusca departs.

Lyrma Swampwalker.name: 莱玛·沼泽行者 Lyrma Swampwalker

Maurrisa Jonne.name: 毛丽萨·琼恩 Maurrisa Jonne
Maurrisa Jonne.allSaves: 对抗推撞和摔绊全豁免+2状态加值，对抗失能效果全豁免+1状态加值

yzzm5eV3r1RGpar6.name: 对抗失能效果全豁免+1状态加值

7vOzE1FHZEotvswQ.name: 对抗推撞全豁免+2状态加值

hhg7o2qV6JntAswy.name: 对抗摔绊全豁免+2状态加值

Duck and Weave.name: 腾挪 Duck and Weave
Duck and Weave.description:
触发 一个生物对毛丽萨连续两次近战打击都失手

效果 毛丽萨利用敌人的破绽创造优势，她可以选择进行一次快步，或对触发的生物进行一次近战打击。

Rabbit Punch.name: 兔拳 Rabbit Punch
Rabbit Punch.description:
触发 毛丽萨可以进行一次反应打击

效果 毛丽萨猛击对手的后脑勺或脖子，甚至可能造成脑震荡。

目标必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:26]豁免检定。如果失败，该生物将受到毛丽萨的拳击打击的伤害，并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。如果大失败，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

+1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Incapacitat.name: +1 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Incapacitation Effects

+2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Shove.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Shove

+2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Trip.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Trip

Fast Swallow.name: Fast Swallow
Fast Swallow.description:
Trigger The minchgorm Grabs a creature in its jaws

Effect The minchgorm uses Swallow Whole.

Riptide.name: Riptide
Riptide.description: Tentacles of water rise up and attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} all enemies within 15 feet of the minchgorm. The minchgorm attempts an @Check[athletics] check against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. On a success, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} ([[/act escape dc=40]]). On a critical success, or a success against a creature that is already grabbed, the target begins to drown.

Watery Simulacra.name: Watery Simulacra
Watery Simulacra.description: The minchgorm raises up to eight figures from nearby water, each appearing in an empty space within 60 feet of the minchgorm. A simulacrum can take any shape of size Medium or smaller that the minchgorm desires, including that of a specific individual or object, but is always plainly made of water. The minchgorm can speak, cast spells, and use its senses through its simulacra, spending actions for a simulacrum on a one-for-one basis. By using a single action with the concentrate trait, the minchgorm can cause any number of simulacra to Fly, Step, Stride, or Swim up to 60 feet. A simulacrum uses the minchgorm's AC and saving throws and has 30 Hit Points. A minchgorm can have up to eight simulacra in existence at once. Simulacra dissolve immediately when more than 60 feet from the minchgorm, or if the minchgorm dies or falls unconscious. The minchgorm can dismiss any number of its simulacra as a free action.

Miogimo.name: Miogimo

+1 Status to Will Saves vs. Mental.name: +1 Status to Will Saves vs. Mental

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When Miogimo is destroyed, he re-forms, fully healed, near a follower of his choice in [[/gmr 1d10 #Rejuvenation]]{1d10 days}. For the purposes of rejuvenation, a follower is defined as an intelligent creature who's well acquainted with Miogimo and is a true believer in Miogimo's mission, not merely a lukewarm supporter. Miogimo can be permanently destroyed only if he has no current followers or can be convinced to end his own life.

Trickster's Ace.description:
Trigger An effect would cause Miogimo to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} or would slow his movement

Effect Miogimo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement} on himself.
Trickster's Ace.name: Trickster's Ace

Little Favors.description: Each time a creature willingly performs a service, quest, or task for the zealborn, the creature takes a cumulative -1 status penalty to saving throws against the zealborn's mental spells and abilities (maximum -4).
Little Favors.name: Little Favors

Zealous Restoration.name: Zealous Restoration
Zealous Restoration.description: Miogimo can't regain Hit Points through resting or void healing; he feeds only on the idealism of his supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Q690d3mw3TUrKX7E]{Geas} cast by Miogimo. Creatures under Miogimo's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under Miogimo's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 spirit and 1d6 void damage with their attacks.

Miogimo.allSaves: +1 status bonus to Will saves vs. mental effects

Supersonic Hearing.name: 超声听觉 Supersonic Hearing
Supersonic Hearing.description: 莫巴娜多年来一直靠近她身边的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.k9BYXA4b7Z4Hy6lZ]，对它的影响免疫。她还在对抗音波或赋予耳聋状态的效果时获得+2环境加值。

Swift Sneak.name: 迅速潜行 Swift Sneak
Swift Sneak.description: 莫巴娜在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]时使用满速度移动。

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 莫巴娜面对9级或9级以下的、且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]、进行夹击或使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]的生物时，不会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]状态。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧闪避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 莫巴娜是近战或远程攻击的目标，且可以看见攻击者

效果 莫巴娜对触发条件的攻击，在AC上获得+2环境加值。

Poison Weapon.name: 武器涂毒 Poison Weapon
Poison Weapon.description:
需求 莫巴娜持握一把穿刺或挥砍武器，并且另一只手空着

效果 莫巴娜将涂药涂抹在武器上。

Quick Draw.name: 即时备战 Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: 莫巴娜以一个交互动作拔出武器，然后用该武器进行一次打击。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 莫巴娜对陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的敌人额外造成2d6精准伤害。

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 在战斗的第一轮中，如果莫巴娜以欺骗或隐秘进行先攻检定，尚未行动的生物都会对刺客@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Ooze Tendril.name: Ooze Tendril
Ooze Tendril.description: Mother Venom can command her minions and the oozes that cover her dungeon to attack foes. As long as she's conscious, she can make melee ooze tendril Strikes that originate from any slime-covered terrain in her dungeon, including the dungeon's walls and doors, or from a space occupied by one of her children of venom.

Mother Venom Poison.name: Mother Venom Poison
Mother Venom Poison.description:
DC 38

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} (1 round).

Spit.name: Spit
Spit.description: A creature hit by Mother Venom's spit attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface ([[/act escape dc=38]]).

Mr. Snips.name: Mr. Snips
Mr. Snips.publicNotes: Traditionally crafted into the forms of giant suits of armor or powerful animals, iron golems are products of exquisite artistry and skill. Their articulated joints and sturdy armored bodies require great care and mathematical precision to craft, and regular cleaning and oiling ensure they don't rust over the ages.
