With proper care, iron golems can remain in good shape for thousands of years, being passed down for generations, as long as they aren't destroyed by meddlesome adventurers. In addition to their incredible strength, iron golems possess a potent toxic breath weapon that is often more than enough to dispatch entire groups of opponents.

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
Harmed by acid (@Damage[(6d10+4)[untyped]], @Damage[(2d8+4)[untyped]] from areas and persistent damage); healed by fire (area @Damage[(2d8+4)[healing]] HP); slowed by electricity

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.name: Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison
Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} on the golem deactivates its Breath Weapon for 1 minute.

Vulnerable to Rust.name: Vulnerable to Rust
Vulnerable to Rust.description: Magical rusting effects, like a rust monster's antennae, affect the iron golem normally.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The iron golem exhales poisonous gas in a @Template[burst|distance:10]{10-foot radius} centered on the corner of one of the iron golem's squares.

The gas persists for 1 round. Any creature in the area (or that later enters the area) is exposed to the iron golem's poison.

The golem can't use its Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Iron Golem Poison.name: Iron Golem Poison
Iron Golem Poison.description:
Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} value from this poison is reduced by 1 every hour.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:35]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round)

Dismember.name: Dismember
Dismember.description:
Whenever Mr. Snips rolls a critical hit with a scissors Strike, in addition to dealing extra damage, the golem has a chance to dismember its victim. The target must roll a @Check[reflex|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect.

Failure The target takes @Damage[2d10[bleed]].

Critical Failure As failure, and one of the targets extremities is severed (the effects of this are up to the GM's discretion).

Inexorable March.name: Inexorable March
Inexorable March.description: The iron golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a @Check[fortitude|dc:39] save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it is damaged as if hit by the golem's fist.

equipment-Heartstone.name: Heartstone
equipment-Heartstone.description:
This gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Each heartstone is powered by the spirit of a specific night hag. If it's separated from her for 24 hours (or she's been dead for 24 hours), it becomes a nonmagical gemstone. A heartstone allows the hag to use additional occult innate spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Seize Soul} at will, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} twice per day.

Activate A command

Requirements You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract rank 5, counteract modifier +18).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.

Abyssal Plague.description:
A creature can't recover from drained until Abyssal plague is cured

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:41]

Stage 1 drained 1 (1 day)

Stage 2 drained 3 (1 day)
Abyssal Plague.name: Abyssal Plague

Spell Ambush.name: Spell Ambush
Spell Ambush.description: A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the night hag takes a -2 circumstance penalty to checks and DCs to defend against her spells.

equipment-Cloak of the Bat (Greater).name: Cloak of the Bat (Greater)
equipment-Cloak of the Bat (Greater).description:
Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to Climb in order to move around while inverted.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency any number of times per day

Effect You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell on you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.ioGzmVSmMGXWWBYb]{Effect: Cloak of the Bat}

Nightmare Rider.name: Nightmare Rider
Nightmare Rider.description: When a night hag rides a nightmare, the nightmare also gains the night hag's status bonus to saves against magic, and both the hag and rider benefit when the night hag uses her heartstone's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} innate spell.

Planar Coven.name: Planar Coven
Planar Coven.description: As long as at least one other member of Myrna's coven is on the demiplane of Stormholt, the coven members add chain lightning, lightning bolt, plane shift, and punishing winds to their spells, each of which can be cast at up to 8th level.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The night hag can take on the appearance of any Medium female humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage bonuses with her Strikes, but might change the damage type her Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Dream Haunting.name: Dream Haunting
Dream Haunting.description: If a night hag is ethereal and hovering over a sleeping chaotic or evil creature, she can ride the victim's back until dawn. The creature endures tormenting dreams as the hag casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} on it, and is exposed to abyssal plague. Any drained caused by dream haunting is cumulative. Only an ethereal being can confront the night hag and stop her dream haunting.

Illusory Persona.description: The illusion created by the myrucarx's project image can resemble any Medium humanoid, including any specific individual it has seen, and has appropriate voice, scent, and mannerisms, allowing the myrucarx to use its Deception check to Impersonate that humanoid if it chooses.
Illusory Persona.name: Illusory Persona

Twisting Reach.name: Twisting Reach
Twisting Reach.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The fanged mouths at the ends of a myrucarx's tendrils twist around obstacles. The myrucarx makes two jaws Strikes against the same target, ignoring the target's cover. Both attacks count toward the myrucarx's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks are made. The myrucarx can't Grab as its next action after Twisting Reach.

Odorless.name: Odorless
Odorless.description: A myrucarx emits no smell and can't be detected by scent.

Painful Light.name: Painful Light
Painful Light.description: When attempting a save against a light effect, a myrucarx gets a result one degree of success lower than it rolled. A myrucarx caught in sunlight is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}.

Shared Diversion.name: 共享分神 Shared Diversion
Shared Diversion.description:
触发 纳杰拉蜥蜴占据方格中的另一个生物成功通一次欺骗检定进行分神动作

效果 纳杰拉蜥蜴自动对目标生物成功进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]动作。

Najra Lizard Venom.name: 纳杰拉蜥蜴毒液 Najra Lizard Venom
Najra Lizard Venom.description:
中毒的生物会感觉生物非常口渴，在中毒时无法解渴

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:21|traits:poison]

最大持续时间 4小时

阶段1 @Damage[1d4[poison]]伤害、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]，外加无法恢复的[[/r 1d4]]伤害，直到目标解渴（1轮）

阶段2 如同阶段1（1小时）

Najra Swarm Attack.name: 纳杰拉集群攻击 Najra Swarm Attack
Najra Swarm Attack.description: 如果目标生物与多个纳杰拉蜥蜴位于同一方格内，则纳杰拉蜥蜴的近战打击能造成额外1d6精准伤害。

Needling Stairs.name: 针刺楼梯 Needling Stairs
Needling Stairs.hp: 以击断一级楼梯下的弹簧，使得可以安全站立在这一级上
Needling Stairs.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:33|name:Disable Stair Spring|traits:action:disable-a-device]（大师）来解除任意一级楼梯内的弹簧，或关闭C8区的开关以关闭整个陷阱。切断连接楼梯和楼梯最顶端的控制开关之间的导线（@Check[thievery|dc:35|name:Cut Wire on Top-Most Stair|traits:action:disable-a-device]解除装置），可以防止控制开关激活或关闭陷阱。
Needling Stairs.hazarddescription: 这条楼梯上每一级台阶下都有弹簧，当有人踩上时，毒针会从木头微小的洞里射出。每一级楼梯占了一个5尺平方的格子，总共有6级。
Needling Stairs.reset: 如果陷阱是通过C8区域的开关解除的，那也能由开关重新启动。
Needling Stairs.routine: （1动作）陷阱会以一个单动作，对处于某级激活的楼梯上的任一生物各自使用毒针打击。因为任何有负重的台级上会不断有针刺出，所以它也可以使用流血的脚自由动作，在一个生物的回合中攻击某一级上的生物。

First Step.name: 第一步 First Step
First Step.description:
触发 一个生物在一级楼梯上结束了它的移动

效果 陷阱对触发的生物使用毒针打击，接着骰先攻。

Bloody Feet.name: 流血的脚 Bloody Feet
Bloody Feet.description:
触发 一个生物移动到一级启动的楼梯上

效果 陷阱对触发的生物使用毒针打击。

No MAP.name: 无多重攻击减值 No MAP

Nenchuuj.name: Nenchuuj

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: The sahkil is considered 2 levels lower for the purposes of being summoned by rituals (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Binding Circle}), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description: The sahkil can move itself between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt}, except that this ability has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed.

Distort Magic.description:
Trigger A creature targets the nenchuuj with a spell

Effect The nenchuuj warps the creature's magic, attempting an Arcana check to counteract the spell. If successful, the nenchuuj can instead redirect the spell, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning}, onto the caster or onto a different target within range from the caster.
Distort Magic.name: Distort Magic

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Tainted Backlash.name: Tainted Backlash
Tainted Backlash.description:
A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by the sahkil's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} is gripped with fear of the ways magic can go wrong.

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for as long as it is frightened. If the creature Casts a Spell during its turn, it can't reduce its frightened condition at the end of that turn.

Nenchuuj.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-+1 Striking Shortsword.name: +1 Striking Shortsword
equipment-+1 Striking Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The poisoner deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures the poisoner hits with a critical hit are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against their attacks until the end of their next turn.

equipment-Bloodseeker Beak.name: Bloodseeker Beak
equipment-Bloodseeker Beak.description:
This long, hollow proboscis is harvested from the notorious bloodseeker beast and drips a trickle of blood.

Activate F Envision

Trigger You hit an off-guard creature with the affixed weapon

When you activate the beak, you deal an extra 1d4 precision damage on your damage roll. If you deal sneak attack damage to the creature, you also deal @Damage[1d4[bleed]].

Deny Advantage.name: Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: The poisoner isn't off-guard to creatures of 11th level or lower that are hidden, undetected, flanking, or using surprise attack.

Nimble Dodge.name: Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger The poisoner is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see

Effect The poisoner gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Impromptu Toxin.name: Impromptu Toxin
Impromptu Toxin.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect The poisoner dribbles a few experimental chemicals over a melee weapon. Until the start of their next turn, Strikes with the weapon deal an additional @Damage[2d8[poison]] damage, and targets hit by Strikes with the weapon must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27|traits:damaging-effect] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (the poisoner's choice) for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: The obrousian can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This increases their Speed to 25 feet. It doesn't change their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

Waves of Sorrow.name: Waves of Sorrow
Waves of Sorrow.description: 30 feet. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it is overwhelmed by the sorrow that suffuses the obrousian's being. The creature must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Drowning Grasp.name: Drowning Grasp
Drowning Grasp.description: When a creature is grabbed by the obrousian, its lungs magically fill with water. A creature that can't breathe water is suffocating while it is grabbed.

Corpse Wallow.name: 尸坑打滚 Corpse Wallow
Corpse Wallow.description: 当处于大墓穴或其他尸体大量聚集的环境中时，残渣怪丧尸获得快速治疗2。

Rotting Aura.name: 腐败灵光 Rotting Aura
Rotting Aura.description:
10尺。丧尸散发出充盈着腐败与疾病的灵光，使伤口溃烂腐坏。任意活物若在回合开始时位于丧尸10尺范围内，且生命值不满时，便会由于伤口溃烂而受到@Damage[2d6[untyped]]伤害。

若有生物遭到丧尸重击，也会立即受到该伤害。

Note: This ability lists a DC 24 in the source, but the glossary ability lacks a save to make.

Slow.name: 缓慢 Slow
Slow.description: 残渣怪丧尸永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且不能使用反应。

Bury in Offal.name: 用残渣埋葬 Bury in Offal
Bury in Offal.description:
残渣怪丧尸进行了抛掷残渣打击，将攻击骰的结果与从残渣怪丧尸发出的@Template[cone|distance:15]区域内的任何敌人的AC进行比较。这在计算多次攻击减值时被记作两次攻击。

直到残渣怪丧尸移动至少10尺到达不同的空间后才能再次使用用残渣埋葬。

Wretched Weeps.name: 悲恸脓血症 Wretched Weeps
Wretched Weeps.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:22]

阶段1 携带疾病但无效果（1天）

阶段2 每小时@Damage[2d8[bleed]]伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1天）

阶段3 每小时@Damage[2d8[bleed]]伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1天）

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Olansa's true form is that of a monstrous spiderlike daemon. Olansa can still take on her former human appearance. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage modifiers with her Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Hidden Paragon.name: Hidden Paragon
Hidden Paragon.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger Olansa successfully uses Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and become hidden from all of her current foes, or she uses Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} and become undetected to all her current foes

Effect Olansa becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 minute, even if she uses a hostile action. Not even @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Revealing Light}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}, or similar effects can reveal her, though creatures can still use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to locate her.

Opportune Backstab.name: Opportune Backstab
Opportune Backstab.description:
Trigger A creature within Olansa's melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of her allies

Effect Olansa Strikes the triggering creature.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Olansa deals 4d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Overdrive Imentesh.name: Overdrive Imentesh

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description:
An overdrive imentesh can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the overdrive imentesh the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The overdrive imentesh's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Veil of Privacy} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Protean Anatomy 19.name: Protean Anatomy 19
Protean Anatomy 19.description:
A overdrive imentesh's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly.

Immediately after the hegessik takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The overdrive imentesh is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the overdrive imentesh automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{Effect: Protean Anatomy}

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The imentesh takes the appearance of any Large or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but it might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Inflict Warpwave.name: Inflict Warpwave
Inflict Warpwave.description: An imentesh inflicts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave} on a creature within 100 feet (@Check[fortitude|dc:38] to resist).

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: An imentesh's Strikes deal an additional 4d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} targets.

Warpwave Strike.name: Warpwave Strike
Warpwave Strike.description: Any creature struck and damaged by an imentesh's jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:38] save or be subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

Overdrive Imentesh.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Pelmo.name: 佩尔莫 Pelmo
Pelmo.publicNotes:
牠们是哥布林部落的前线战士，偏好大团队作战，最好是人数可以超过敌人的三倍之多。

这些小型的类人生物有着绿或灰色的皮肤，大大的头颅与招风耳。虽然有些哥布林有教养，工作勤奋被类人社群承认为优秀的一员，但大部分的哥布林是冲动又邪恶的生物，为了愉悦而发洩破坏欲。这些哥布林为了刹那间的愉悦去屠宰家畜、偷小孩或烧房子没什么问题。牠们热衷对高大的人类生物(牠们称这些人为「长脚」)恶劣的恶作剧。

哥布林十分迷信，对魔法有强烈的畏怯，对火十分着迷；能掌握魔法或火焰的哥布林，会得到族类的尊敬。其他类人生物很难理解哥布林的想法：牠们很讨厌犬科动物，但又很喜欢把巢穴与牠们称之为「地精犬」的生物共享，牠们无惧比牠们大的生物的攻击，却非常害怕马，牠们讨厌蔬菜却觉得泡菜超棒。当然，对哥布林来说，这些全都是聪明哥布林的完美选择。

strike-Lesser Alchemist's Fire.name: 次等炽火胶 Lesser Alchemist's Fire
strike-Lesser Alchemist's Fire.description:
[[/r (1)[persistent,fire]]] 持续火焰伤害

[[/r (1)[splash,fire]]]{1火焰溅射伤害}

Goblin Scuttle.name: 哥布林快跑 Goblin Scuttle
Goblin Scuttle.description:
触发 一个哥布林盟友在佩尔莫旁结束一个移动动作。

效果 佩尔莫@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]。

Penqual.name: Penqual
Penqual.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: The sahkil is considered 2 levels lower for the purposes of being summoned by rituals (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Binding Circle}), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.

Frantic Grasp.description: Each enemy in the penqual's space takes @Damage[4d12[slashing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic] save).
Frantic Grasp.name: Frantic Grasp

Mob Rush.name: Mob Rush
Mob Rush.description: The penqual Strides twice, ignoring difficult terrain, and then uses Frantic Grasp. If it moves at least 20 feet away from its starting position, the DC of Frantic Grasp increases by 2.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Crush of Hundreds.name: Crush of Hundreds
Crush of Hundreds.description:
A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by the sahkil's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} feels the press of a suffocating crowd.

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and takes a –10-foot penalty to all Speeds for as long as it is frightened.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.R8clbf7gtIlU3fIj]{Effect: Crush of Hundreds}

Crowded Mob.name: Crowded Mob
Crowded Mob.description: The penqual is a swarm of Medium figures that can squeeze supernaturally close to other creatures. Though its component creatures are larger than those of a typical swarm, a penqual can nevertheless share the spaces of other creatures.

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description: The sahkil can move itself between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt}, except that this ability has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed

Combustible.name: 易燃 Combustible
Combustible.description: 罐中畸胎第一次受到火焰伤害时，它的烟雾会燃烧，对其窒息烟雾灵光内的所有其他生物造成@Damage[5[fire]]伤害。

Suffocating Fumes.name: 窒息烟雾 Suffocating Fumes
Suffocating Fumes.description:
5尺。进入灵光或在灵光中开始它的回合的生物必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:14]检定，如果罐中畸胎附着了他则DC为@Check[fortitude|dc:17]。

豁免失败的生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，大失败则额外获得1分钟的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

Attach.name: 附着 Attach
Attach.description:
当一个罐中畸胎击中一个比自己大的目标时，它会用古怪的排泄物黏附在那个生物身上。这类似于擒抱了这个生物，但罐中畸胎不会造成措手不及，且它会跟随目标一起移动，而不是把目标困在原地。

在附着时，罐中畸胎在它的每个回合都会自动对目标造成下颚打击所能造成的伤害。它也在挣扎，只要不被抓住或限制，AC就能获得+2环境加值。

Plunger Chute.name: 液压滑道 Plunger Chute
Plunger Chute.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:23|name:Jam the Trapdoor Shut|traits:action:disable-a-device]（专家）以堵塞活板门；或通过扭转煤气灯上的一个配件关闭。
Plunger Chute.hazarddescription: 地板上的活板门隐藏着一个隐藏的滑道，一堵可移动的墙会把受害者推进去。

Pitfall and Plunger.name: 陷坑与液压 Pitfall and Plunger
Pitfall and Plunger.description:
触发 一个生物走到活板门上

效果 离房间北墙10 尺以内的人都从滑道坠落40尺到E33区，受到@Damage[20[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage]伤害，坠落在赭冻怪的坑里。

受害者可以尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]以避免掉落。

抓住边缘动作的DC是20，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]墙壁动作的DC是22。

Toxin-Inured.name: Toxin-Inured
Toxin-Inured.description: A poison eater can't gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition from poisons.

Consume Poison.name: Consume Poison
Consume Poison.description:
The poison eater uses an Interact action to draw a dose of poison and eats it, gaining strength.

The poison-eater's Strikes deal two weapon dice of damage rather than one. The poison eater is affected by the consumed poison normally and, therefore, usually chooses poisons mitigated by their poison resistance and toxin-inured ability.

At the end of each of their turns, the poison eater attempts a @Check[flat|dc:17|name:Consumed Poison Metabolizes] check; on a success, this ability ends.

Poison Frenzy.name: Poison Frenzy
Poison Frenzy.description:
Requirements The poison eater isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or already in a frenzy

Trigger the poison eater damages a creature while Consume Poison is in effect

Effect The poison eater flies into a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. While in a frenzy, the poison eater gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with melee Strikes, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with melee Strikes, gains 20 temporary Hit Points until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The poison eater can't voluntarily end their frenzy. After their frenzy, the poison eater is fatigued.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.u2z1BgpZsxl7Zc2z]{Effect: Poison Frenzy}

Poisoned Dart Statue.name: Poisoned Dart Statue
Poisoned Dart Statue.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:34|name:Disable Trap|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on the control panel deactivates the trap.
Poisoned Dart Statue.hazarddescription: Countless poison darts fire from holes in the statues and walls of this hall.
Poisoned Dart Statue.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.
Poisoned Dart Statue.routine: (1 action) The trap launches one dart against every creature in the hall as 1 action. Because it launches darts continuously, the trap can also use the Continuous Barrage free action (see below) to launch darts at each creature during that creature's turn. The trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty.
Poisoned Dart Statue.stealthdetails: (expert) or @Check[perception|dc:39|traits:action:seek] (master) to notice the control panel. Anyone specifically searching the name plate of Abresha Tallow-Hands locates the control panel automatically.

Dart Volley.name: Dart Volley
Dart Volley.description:
Trigger A creature makes noise in the hall, which can be avoided with a successful @Check[stealth|dc:28|name:Avoid Notice|traits:action:sneak,move,secret] check

Effect The trap makes a poisoned dart Strike against the triggering creature, then rolls initiative.

Continuous Barrage.description:
Trigger A creature within the hallway finishes an action while the trap is active

Effect The trap makes a poisoned dart Strike against the triggering creature.
Continuous Barrage.name: Continuous Barrage

Terinav Root Poison.name: Terinav Root Poison
Terinav Root Poison.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:28]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

Stage 2 5d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and –5-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 round)

Stage 3 7d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 round)

equipment-+1 Striking Composite Shortbow.name: +1 Striking Composite Shortbow
equipment-+1 Striking Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

equipment-+1 Leather Armor.name: +1 Leather Armor
equipment-+1 Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows
equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Toxic Mastery.name: Toxic Mastery
Toxic Mastery.description: Kalyn can masterfully manipulate vile, poisonous energy and increase its potency. Her melee and ranged Strikes deal an additional 2d6 poison damage, and a target that takes this poison damage has a -1 status penalty to saving throws against Kalyn's divine spells for 1 round. Poisons delivered by Kalyn have the virulent trait.

equipment-Religious Symbol (norgorber).name: Religious Symbol (norgorber)
equipment-Religious Symbol (norgorber).description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.

equipment-Arrows With Shadow Essence.name: Arrows With Shadow Essence
equipment-Arrows With Shadow Essence.description:
These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Infused with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wjkw0lEUOhypYvzo]{Shadow Essence}

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Prospecti Statue.name: 前程者雕像 Prospecti Statue
Prospecti Statue.publicNotes: 与那些中体型的人形活化雕像类似，巨型雕像通常用来守护更为重要的区域，被增强了体型和力量的它们尤其适用在大型金库、宽阔的大厅、或是室外区域。这种尺寸和强度的活化物体的理想岗位通常都会被魔像取代，因此，那些更为强大的活化物体几乎是闻所未闻。

Construct Armor.name: 构装护甲 Construct Armor
Construct Armor.description: 与普通的物体一样，前程者雕像同样拥有硬度。硬度可以减少其所受到的任何伤害，其数值等同于硬度的数值。一旦前程者雕像的生命值降低至一半以下，或是受到重击伤害后，其构装护甲将会破损，其AC降低至22。

Stone Robes.name: 石袍 Stone Robes
Stone Robes.description:
前程者雕像突然转身，导致尽管它的长袍像石头一样坚硬，但还是像织物一样流动，伤害对手。

与活化雕像相邻的生物会遭受@Damage[(2d6+6)[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic]豁免；在大失败时，该生物同时被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]）。

Construct Armor (Hardness 10).name: Construct Armor (Hardness 10)
Construct Armor (Hardness 10).description: Like normal objects, a giant animated statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a giant animated statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 22.

Pulping Golem.name: Pulping Golem
Pulping Golem.publicNotes: Traditionally crafted into the forms of giant suits of armor or powerful animals, iron golems are products of exquisite artistry and skill. Their articulated joints and sturdy armored bodies require great care and mathematical precision to craft, and regular cleaning and oiling ensure they don't rust over the ages. With proper care, iron golems can remain in good shape for thousands of years, being passed down for generations, as long as they aren't destroyed by meddlesome adventurers. In addition to their incredible strength, iron golems possess a potent toxic breath weapon that is often more than enough to dispatch entire groups of opponents.

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
Harmed by acid (@Damage[(6d10+4)[untyped]], @Damage[(2d8+4)[untyped]] from areas and persistent damage); healed by fire (area @Damage[(2d8+4)[healing]] HP); slowed by electricity

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.GolemAntimagic]

Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.name: Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison
Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} on the golem deactivates its Breath Weapon for 1 minute.

Breath Weapon.description:
The pulping golem spills its cauldron stomach to the floor, dealing @Damage[9d12[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to creatures within 10 feet (@Check[reflex|dc:33|basic] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.
Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon

Iron Golem Poison.name: Iron Golem Poison
Iron Golem Poison.description:
Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} value from this poison is reduced by 1 every hour.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:35]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[(2d6+4)[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[(4d6+4)[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[(8d6+4)[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round)

Vulnerable to Rust.name: Vulnerable to Rust
Vulnerable to Rust.description: Magical rusting effects, like a rust monster's antennae, affect the iron golem normally.

Extend Legs.description: The pulping golem extends its legs up to a height of 40 feet, raising its body high into the air. While its legs are extended, its movement speed is halved, and it takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude save DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempts.
Extend Legs.name: Extend Legs

Inexorable March.name: Inexorable March
Inexorable March.description: The iron golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a @Check[fortitude|dc:39] save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it is damaged as if hit by the golem's fist.

Double Stab.name: 双重戳刺 Double Stab
Double Stab.description:
需求 蕾瑟持用着两把穿刺武器

频率 每轮一次

效果 蕾瑟对触及的一个生物进行两次打击，每件武器攻击一次。

这些攻击计入蕾瑟的多次攻击惩罚，但减值直到两次攻击之后才会增加。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 蕾瑟对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成额外1d6穿刺伤害。

Ravenile Rager.name: 狂蜥人狂暴者 Ravenile Rager

Forced Regeneration.name: 强制再生 Forced Regeneration
Forced Regeneration.description:
需求 狂蜥人的再生能力当前可用

狂蜥人回复@Damage[20[healing]]生命值。

Furious Wallop.name: 绝技猛突 Furious Wallop
Furious Wallop.description:
需求 狂蜥人的再生能力当前失效

效果 狂蜥人进行一次近战打击。

这在计算狂蜥人多重攻击减值时视为两次攻击。

如果打击命中，狂蜥人造成一个额外的武器伤害骰，并且目标被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Clockwork Reconstruction.name: Clockwork Reconstruction
Clockwork Reconstruction.description: Each time Reginald is reborn in his lair, his machines graft him with a new clockwork modification. He chooses one of his abilities with the clockwork trait. He gains access to this ability but can't use any of his other clockwork abilities. He can't choose the same ability twice in a row. He begins with Ink Blood active.

Ink Blood.name: Ink Blood
Ink Blood.description:
Reginald's body is filled with toxic ink

Trigger An adjacent creature Strikes Reginald with a melee weapon or unarmed attack and deals damage

Effect The creature is exposed to Reginald's poison ink.

Secret of Rebirth.name: Secret of Rebirth
Secret of Rebirth.description: If a creature with less than 5 Secret Knowledge points reduces Reginald to 0 HP (or dealt the last damage to him before he dies from using Overdrive Engine), Reginald's body dissipates into a puddle of ink and releases a black wave of psychic energy. Each creature within 30 feet is bathed in a torrent of forbidden secrets and gains 1 Secret Knowledge point. Reginald's body reforms [[/gmr 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6 rounds} later in his sanctum at full health at a location of his choosing (typically the Pool of Secrets, area L11). This ability activates automatically with no action necessary on Vancaskerkin's behalf.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: Reginald's lungs are equipped with ink canisters, allowing him to spew a @Template[line|distance:60] of ink that deals @Damage[9d6[poison]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:39|basic|options:area-effect] save; on a failure, the creature is also subjected to Reginald's poison ink).

Overdrive Engine.name: Overdrive Engine
Overdrive Engine.description:
Reginald is equipped with clockwork organs to power his body

Requirements Reginald has 175 Hit Points or fewer

Effect Reginald gains 200 temporary Hit Points, a +15-foot status bonus to Speed, and a +2 status bonus to melee attack rolls. His body begins to overheat, spewing steam that deals @Damage[9d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage at the beginning of his turn to all creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic|options:area-effect] save). After 2 rounds, Reginald explodes, dealing @Damage[19d6[fire]] damage to all creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save). Reginald dies. For the purposes of his Secret of Rebirth ability, the last creature to damage Reginald counts as killing him.

Poison Ink.name: Poison Ink
Poison Ink.description:
Reginald is immune to the toxic ink that flows through his veins

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round).

Reflective Plating.name: Reflective Plating
Reflective Plating.description: Reginald engages his defensive plating, which casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning} on him (counteract modifier +32).

Slither.name: Slither
Slither.description: With his body composed of ink and gears, Reginald can move through tight spaces as if he were a Tiny creature, treating them as difficult terrain.

Quill Cannon.name: Quill Cannon
Quill Cannon.description: Reginald is equipped with a cannon and hundreds of steel quills. He makes two steel quill attacks against every creature in a @Template[cone|distance:60], ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all attacks are made. He can't use Quill Cannon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Quill Cannon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Rhevanna.name: Rhevanna
Rhevanna.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Plunder Life.name: Plunder Life
Plunder Life.description:
60 feet. When a healing effect restores Hit Points to a non-fiend creature in the aura, the amount of Hit Points restored is halved. The rhevanna gains temporary Hit Points equal to the amount of Hit Points restored.

The rhevanna loses any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Detaining Strike.name: Detaining Strike
Detaining Strike.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger The rhevanna hits a creature with a weapon Strike

Effect The rhevanna casts an innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Planar Tether} spell on the creature.

Lifedrinker.name: Lifedrinker
Lifedrinker.description:
Trigger The rhevanna kills a living creature of at least 16th level

Effect The rhevanna drinks the triggering creature's life force and regains @Damage[40[healing]] Hit Points. If the triggering creature is a celestial, the rhevanna instead regains @Damage[80[healing]] Hit Points.

Malefic Binding.description:
The rhevanna can target celestials with their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Seize Soul} ability, and a gem containing a celestial bound by a rhevanna has Hardness 40.

If the rhevanna destroys a gem in which they placed a celestial, the celestial is destroyed forever.
Malefic Binding.name: Malefic Binding

Rigged Cubby.name: 机关隔间 Rigged Cubby
Rigged Cubby.hazarddescription: 一根隐藏的绳子连接在堆叠的石砖上，当被拉动时会导致隔间塌陷。

Collapse.name: 塌陷 Collapse
Collapse.description:
触发 一个生物碰到了隔间里的镰刀；

效果 隔间上方沉重的砖块塌陷，镰刀完好无损，但对触发生物造成@Damage[(4d6+10)[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic]豁免）。

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-+2 Greater Striking War Razor.name: +2 Greater Striking War Razor
equipment-+2 Greater Striking War Razor.description: A war razor is an exaggerated version of the barbers' tool. It is a brittle but extremely sharp weapon that is very easy to slip into a pocket or sleeve.

Close Cutter.name: Close Cutter
Close Cutter.description: Whenever Sad Liza deals slashing damage, the target takes an additional 2d10 persistent bleed damage.

Knife Thrower.description: Sad Liza's ranged dagger Strikes have a range increment of 20 feet instead of 10 feet.
Knife Thrower.name: Knife Thrower

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Sad Liza deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} targets.

equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor
equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Necklace of Fireballs VI.name: Necklace of Fireballs VI
equipment-Necklace of Fireballs VI.description:
This string of beads appears to be a hemp string with lustrous red beads of various sizes hanging from it. When activated, it briefly appears in its true form: a golden chain with golden spheres attached by fine threads.

This necklace has one @Damage[16d6[fire]] damage, three @Damage[14d6[fire]] damage and four @Damage[12d6[fire]] damage beads with a Reflex save DC of 36. When all the beads are gone, the necklace becomes a non-magical hemp string.

Activate A Interact

Effect You detach a sphere from the necklace, causing it to glow with orange light. After you activate a sphere, if you or anyone else hurls it (an Interact action with the ranged trait), it detonates as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} where it lands. Your toss can place the center of the fireball anywhere within 70 feet, though at the GM's discretion you might need to make an attack roll if the throw is unusually challenging. If no one hurls the sphere by the start of your next turn, it turns into a non-magical red bead.

Bloody Mayhem.name: Bloody Mayhem
Bloody Mayhem.description: Sad Liza Strides three times. Once per Stride, she can attempt a war razor Strike against a creature in her reach at any point during the Stride; she must make each Strike against a different creature, but she doesn't apply her multiple attack penalty until after making all her Strikes. If any of the Strikes are a critical failure, Bloody Mayhem immediately ends.

Fan of Daggers.name: Fan of Daggers
Fan of Daggers.description: Sad Liza makes three ranged dagger Strikes, each against a separate target; she ignores the multiple attack penalty until after making all three Strikes. On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[2d10[bleed]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Drain Wand.name: 汲取魔杖 Drain Wand
Drain Wand.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 斯喀忒卡在他的回合还没有行动

效果 在他的回合中，斯喀忒卡释放了一个有准备并且已经释放过的法术，并且无须使用法术位。斯喀忒卡还是需要使用施法动作并满足法术的其他需求。

Throw Shadow Blade.name: 掷出暗影匕首 Throw Shadow Blade
Throw Shadow Blade.description:
需求 斯喀忒卡持握着一个匕首

效果 斯喀忒卡用匕首的刃划出一道暗影沟壑，并将其挥向一个附近的敌人。斯喀忒卡以匕首进行一次远程打击，具有30尺的射程增量。

如果打击命中，会造成@Damage[8d6[cold]]伤害（大成功则伤害翻倍），并且目标必须成功通过@Check[fortitude|dc:32]豁免，否则直到其下回合结束获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（大失败则持续[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}）。

当攻击结束时，匕首不再具有幽影魔法的效应。

Secret-Keeper.name: Secret-Keeper

Sturdy Shield (Moderate).description:
With a superior design and excellent craftsmanship, this steel shield has higher Hardness than its non-magical counterparts, making it harder to break and destroy.

The shield has Hardness 13, HP 104, and BT 52.
Sturdy Shield (Moderate).name: Sturdy Shield (Moderate)

equipment-Religious Symbol of Norgorber.name: Religious Symbol of Norgorber
equipment-Religious Symbol of Norgorber.description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

Designate Apostate.name: Designate Apostate
Designate Apostate.description: Velberi designates one creature she can see within 30 feet as an apostate to the church of Norgorber, regardless of the creature's actual religious leanings. She can have up to four apostates designated at a time; any additional apostate removes another apostate of her choice. Velberi treats all Perception checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} against an apostate as one degree of success better, and her Strikes deal an additional 2d8 mental damage to apostates.

equipment-+2 Striking Dagger.name: +2 Striking Dagger
equipment-+2 Striking Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-Cape of the Mountebank.description:
This bright red-and-gold cape is often interlaced with glittery threads and serves as a distraction. While wearing the cape, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate}. The space you leave and the one you appear in are filled with puffs of smoke that make anyone within concealed until they leave the smoke or the end of your next turn, at which point the smoke dissipates. Strong winds immediately disperse the smoke.
equipment-Cape of the Mountebank.name: Cape of the Mountebank

equipment-Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
equipment-Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

Secret-Keeper.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. mental

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Divert Strike.name: Divert Strike
Divert Strike.description:
Trigger A shatterling takes non-bludgeoning damage and there's an unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide within 100 feet of the shatterling

Effect The nearest mirror to the shatterling at least 1 foot wide breaks, and the damage to the shatterling is reduced to 0.

Mirror Senses.name: Mirror Senses
Mirror Senses.description: A shatterling can see and hear through any unbroken mirror within 100 feet.

Blood-Fueled Titter.name: Blood-Fueled Titter
Blood-Fueled Titter.description: If the shatterling attempts an Intimidation check to [[/act demoralize]] a target within 30 feet of a creature with persistent bleed damage, the shatterling has +4 circumstance bonus to the Intimidation check. In addition, the shatterling takes no penalty to the check for not speaking a language the target can hear, and the target isn't temporarily immune to the shatterling's attempts to Demoralize it unless the shatterling critically fails its Intimidation check.

Mirror Jump.name: Mirror Jump
Mirror Jump.description: During this Stride, the shatterling can move into any unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide and out of another unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide within 100 feet of the first mirror, treating the mirrors as connected. The shatterling can move through any number of pairs of foot-wide mirrors during its mirror jump, requiring each pair to be within 100 feet of each other while doing so.

Extra Reaction.name: Extra Reaction
Extra Reaction.description: A shatterling gains an additional reaction each turn, but can use this extra reaction only for Divert Strike.

Vanish in Reflections.name: Vanish in Reflections
Vanish in Reflections.description: The shatterling doesn't appear in reflective surfaces if it doesn't want to. When it's within 100 feet of an unbroken mirror at least 1 foot wide, a shatterling can Hide and Sneak even without cover or without being concealed.

Wipe Away Cracks.name: Wipe Away Cracks
Wipe Away Cracks.description: The shatterling touches a broken mirror, instantly repairing it.

Shikwashim Mercenary.name: 希克瓦希姆佣兵 Shikwashim Mercenary

Deep Breath.name: 闭气 Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: 希克瓦希姆佣兵能憋气20分钟。

Coordinated Distraction.name: 合作干扰 Coordinated Distraction
Coordinated Distraction.description:
佣兵发出尖锐的哨声或作出手势，来分散对手的注意力，佣兵的盟友就能借此出击。

佣兵选择一个目标和一个盟友，他们都必须在佣兵30尺以内。目标对于佣兵的盟友的下一回合中的第一次攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]；如果盟友不攻击那个目标，效果消失。

根据佣兵如何分散敌人的注意力，这种行动会获得听觉或视觉特征。

Human Hunter.name: 人类猎手 Human Hunter
Human Hunter.description: 希克瓦希姆佣兵对于人类的每回合的第二次攻击的多次攻击减值为-3（如果是灵巧武器则为-2），第三次及以后的攻击的多次攻击减值为-6（如果是灵巧武器则为-4）。

Powerful Swipe.name: 猛力打击 Powerful Swipe
Powerful Swipe.description:
希克瓦希姆佣兵进行一次近战打击。如果攻击命中，额外造成一个骰子的伤害。

在计算佣兵的多次攻击减值时，这被当作两次攻击。

Terrain Advantage.name: 地形优势 Terrain Advantage
Terrain Advantage.description: 位于困难地形的非蜥蜴人、位于水域的没有游泳速度的非蜥蜴人对希克瓦希姆佣兵@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

Compression.name: 压缩 Compression
Compression.description: 当撕皮魔成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]时，它可以以全速穿过狭小的空间。狭窄的范围对撕皮魔来说并不是一个困难的地形。

Control Body.name: 控制尸体 Control Body
Control Body.description:
需求 撕皮魔邻接一具中型或小型的人形生物的尸体

效果 撕皮魔覆盖并控制了尸体，在控制目标的同时，撕皮魔使用目标的速度，但使用它自己的攻击，它失去擒拿和包裹的能力。

在撕皮魔控制目标时，针对它的攻击只会对撕皮魔造成一半伤害，对目标尸体的造成一半伤害。针对区域的攻击会正常地对撕皮魔和目标身体造成伤害。

撕皮魔可以在它的回合开始时以自由动作放开目标的尸体。如果目标被摧毁，撕皮魔将自动放开尸体并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]1轮。一个中等生物的尸体体通常有15的HP，一个小型生物的尸体通常有10的HP。

成功对抗撕皮魔的欺骗DC的察觉检定的生物可以注意到，尸体正由撕皮魔控制。

Enshroud.name: 包裹 Enshroud
Enshroud.description:
需求 撕皮魔擒抱了一个生物

效果 撕皮魔试图压住目标，像衬衫一样把自己包在生物周围。撕皮魔以@Check[athletics|against:fortitude]检定对抗目标的强韧DC。

成功后，目标生物被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]，撕皮魔像控制尸体一样控制目标生物。

在它的回合开始时，撕皮魔可以以一个自由动作紧勒被包裹的生物。

被包裹的生物可以尝试[[/act escape dc=16]]检定以挣脱（如果撕皮魔在包裹的运动检定中大成功，则改为[[/act escape dc=18]]）。

Shristi Melipdra.name: 什里斯蒂·梅利普德拉 Shristi Melipdra

equipment-Foreign Guard Uniform.name: 无眠之阳制服 Foreign Guard Uniform

equipment-Victor's Medallion from the Ch.name: 诸天涅槃之战冠军大奖章 Victor's Medallion from the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
什里斯蒂进行两次非武装打击，如果同时命中同一个生物，合计伤害后再计算目标的抗力和弱点。这些打击正常计算多重攻击减值。

由于具有绝技特征，什里斯蒂每轮只能使用一次疾风连击。

Heaven's Thunder.name: 天堂之雷 Heaven's Thunder
Heaven's Thunder.description:
频率 每天两次

效果 随着一声大吼，什里斯蒂催动真气，噼里啪啦的雷电包裹着他的身体。直到他的下一回合结束，他的非武装打击和拥有武僧特征的武器的打击造额外3电击伤害和3音波伤害。

Sky and Heaven Stance.name: 诸天涅槃架势 Sky and Heaven Stance
Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
什里斯蒂摆出诸天涅槃战冠军的架势。他能做出的唯一打击是天空劈无武装攻击。这些无武装攻击造成1d10挥砍伤害；属于搏击武器组，并且拥有非致命、无武装、多用P特征。

在诸天涅槃架势下，什里斯蒂获得2点电击抗力和2点音波抗力。

Exorcism.name: 驱邪 Exorcism
Exorcism.description:
心灵伤害无视围城碎片的硬度。

此外，通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ma93dpT4K7JbP9gu]动作能立刻让围城碎片变成石头。

Surreptitious Siege.name: 鬼祟围城 Surreptitious Siege
Surreptitious Siege.description: 当围城碎片使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]融入建筑时，建筑和它内部所有物品需要双倍时间修理。

Overwhelming Anguish.name: 痛苦淹没 Overwhelming Anguish
Overwhelming Anguish.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 围城碎片发射一道让人迷惑的精神能量波。@Template[emanation|distance:15]内的所有生物受到@Damage[4d6[mental]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:20|basic|options:area-effect]豁免）。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
当围城碎片在建筑的100尺范围内被摧毁时，它在[[/br 2d4 #days]]天之后会在最近的建筑上重新形成，并且生命值回满。

建筑里的围城碎片可以通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.QW2gYIKce3W31xXf]动作永久性摧毁。

Distracting Shadows.name: 潜于暗影 Distracting Shadows
Distracting Shadows.description: 斯凯布斯可以使用至少比他们自己大一个体型的生物作为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]动作所需要的掩护。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 斯凯布斯对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成1d6额外精准伤害。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 锯皮杀手对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成1d6额外精准伤害。

Twin Takedown.name: 双重攻击 Twin Takedown
Twin Takedown.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 分别用不同的手持用两把近战武器。

效果 锯皮杀手快速用两把武器攻击猎杀目标。使用如需求中所述的两把武器，各对猎杀目标进行一次打击。如果两次攻击击中了同一猎物，则将攻击伤害加总后计算抗力和弱点。锯皮杀手每次打击正常承受多重攻击减值。

equipment-Assorted Rags and Textiles.name: 各种布料和纺织品 Assorted Rags and Textiles

Wire Catch.name: 用线抓住 Wire Catch
Wire Catch.description:
锯皮缝纫师把缝纫针固定在一个厚丝绸环上，松散地包裹在手上，不拿武器，他们可以在战斗中用它来捆住或缴械攻击者

触发 生物用近战攻击击中缝纫师

效果 缝纫师试图对触发生物进行[[/act grapple]]或[[/act disarm]]的运动检定。

Flay.name: 剥皮 Flay
Flay.description:
需求 锯皮缝纫师在上一次动作中使用战剃以外的近战武器造成伤害

效果 缝纫师对他们刚刚造成伤害的同一种生物进行战剃打击。若击中，缝纫师从目标身上切下一条肉，除了战剃造成的常规损伤外，还会造成@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。

Quick Stitch.name: 快速缝纫 Quick Stitch
Quick Stitch.description:
需求 锯皮缝纫师正擒拿一个生物

效果 缝纫师把一块布缝在他的手臂、脸或腿上，这可能会造成阻碍。该生物必须尝试@Check[reflex|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect]豁免；如果缝纫师在过去一分钟内成功对其使用过剥皮能力，那么该生物的豁免结果向更差偏移一阶。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[1d4[piercing]]伤害。

失败 该生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]（由缝纫师选择）。这个效果持续到该生物花费一个动作把针线扯下来，这将造成@Damage[1d6[piercing]]伤害。

大失败 该生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}或措手不及（由缝纫师选择）。这个效果持续到该生物花费两个动作把针线扯下来，这将造成@Damage[2d6[piercing]]伤害。

Pest Haven.name: 害虫乐园 Pest Haven
Pest Haven.description:
腐烂的兽皮和稻草填充物是虫群理想的巢穴。任何与缝皮迅兽共享占据空间的动物集群都能获得快速治疗3。

此外，如果一个生物对缝皮迅兽造成至少10点穿刺或挥砍伤害，集群可以以一个反应动作对攻击者进行一次噬咬打击（或类似的攻击手段）。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.CM14G9kLI97aIC5h]

Spider Swarm Host.name: 蛛群之家 Spider Swarm Host
Spider Swarm Host.description: 缝皮迅兽内住着一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.NcYbJS5PWBGdNDqh]，当缝皮迅兽被摧毁时灰爆发出来。

Flay.name: 剥皮 Flay
Flay.description: 缝皮迅兽对一个动物或类人生物进行一次利刃打击。一旦成功，缝皮迅兽能从目标身上撕下一长条皮肤来。如果缝皮迅兽造成伤害，则额外造成1d6持续流血伤害。

Skitterstitch Venom.name: 缝皮迅兽毒液 Skitterstitch Venom
Skitterstitch Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:23|traits:poison]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害、措手不及和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}（1轮）

Stitch Skin.name: 缝皮 Stitch Skin
Stitch Skin.description:
需求 缝皮迅兽在之前成功使用剥皮能力，但是尚未使用此能力

效果 缝皮迅兽把剥下来的皮缝在了自己身上，它恢复8点生命值。

equipment-Sap.name: Sap
equipment-Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

equipment-+1 Striking Temple Sword.name: +1 Striking Temple Sword
equipment-+1 Striking Temple Sword.description: This heavy blade is favored by guardians of religious sites. It has a distinctive, crescent-shaped blade that seems to be a mix of a sickle and sword. It often has holes drilled into the blade or the pommel so that bells or other holy trinkets can be affixed to the weapon as an aid for prayer or mediation.

Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.
equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows

Wary.name: Wary
Wary.description: The veteran isn't off-guard to hidden creatures and always gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their Perception DC against creatures attempting to Create a Diversion or Lie to the veteran.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the veteran's multiple attack penalty.

equipment-Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
equipment-Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

equipment-Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
equipment-Chain Mail.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Power Attack.name: Power Attack
Power Attack.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike that counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this strike hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.

Flurry of Pods.name: Flurry of Pods
Flurry of Pods.description:
The slithering rift makes a single pseudopod Strike against each target within range it hasn't already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

These attacks count toward the slithering rift's multiple attack penalty, but this penalty doesn't increase until after all of these attacks.

Out You Go.name: Out You Go
Out You Go.description:
The slithering rift closes all pit spaces it created using Dimensional Pit, ejecting all its occupants onto the ground into random free spaces where the opening of the pit was.

Each occupant takes @Damage[9d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save).

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description:
A slithering rift is so clear that it's difficult to spot. A successful @Check[perception|dc:48] check is required to notice a stationary slithering rift, and a creature must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching} to attempt this check.

A creature that walks into the rift's space might fall into any pit currently in effect due to Dimensional Pit.

Breach Vulnerability.name: Breach Vulnerability
Breach Vulnerability.description:
Ingesting an extradimensional space like that found in a bag of holding deals @Damage[12d8[force]] damage to the slithering rift and its occupants.

The slithering rift then immediately uses Out You Go.

Dimensional Pit.name: Dimensional Pit
Dimensional Pit.description:
The slithering rift opens an extradimensional, 20-foot-deep pit that covers its own space and all adjacent squares unless they are walls or similarly blocking terrain.

Any other creature occupying spaces in the pit must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:40|traits:damaging-effect] save or fall into the pit, taking damage from the fall (typically @Damage[10[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage). Any creature grabbed by the ooze is released from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Grab} and falls in, even if it was outside the pit squares.

While the pit is open, the slithering rift is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and can't be forced to move. It can make pseudopod Strikes originating from the walls of the pit. A creature that starts its turn at the bottom of the pit takes @Damage[5d6[acid]] damage.

Creatures can climb the walls with a @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Climb Out of the Rift|traits:action:climb] check. When the slithering rift dies, the pit closes and creatures inside are ejected, as Out you Go.

Sordesdaemon.name: Sordesdaemon

Retch of Foulness.name: Retch of Foulness
Retch of Foulness.description:
The sordesdaemon exhales a spray of sewage that deals @Damage[8d6[acid],8d6[poison]|options:area-damage]{8d6 acid damage and 8d6 poison damage} in a @Template[cone|distance:30] (@Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic|options:area-effect] save).

It can't use Retch of Foulness again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Retch of Foulness]]{1d4 rounds}.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Miasma of Pollution.name: Miasma of Pollution
Miasma of Pollution.description:
30 feet. Creatures in the aura can't reduce the value of the sickened condition.

A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn in it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:34] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as long as it is sickened on a critical failure).

A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their save.

Pollution Infusion.name: Pollution Infusion
Pollution Infusion.description:
Non-fiend creatures adjacent to the afflicted creature take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against disease

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 week)

Stage 5 dead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.gORyINQLvplfthlm]{Effect: Pollution Infusion}

Sordesdaemon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

equipment-+1 Striking Crossbow.name: +1 Striking Crossbow
equipment-+1 Striking Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

equipment-Thunderstone (Greater).name: Thunderstone (Greater)
equipment-Thunderstone (Greater).description:
When this stone hits a creature or a hard surface, it explodes with a deafening bang. A thunderstone deals the listed sonic damage and sonic splash damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the space in which the stone exploded must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw with the listed DC or be deafened until the end of its next turn. Many types of thunderstone grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 sonic damage and 3 sonic splash damage, and the DC is 28.

equipment-+1 Striking Longsword.name: +1 Striking Longsword
equipment-+1 Striking Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

equipment-Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
equipment-Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

equipment-Bolts.name: Bolts
equipment-Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Target Culprit.name: Target Culprit
Target Culprit.description: The commando designates a single creature as their culprit. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} their culprit and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} their culprit. The commando's attacks deal an additional 2d8 precision damage to the culprit. This designation lasts for 24 hours or until the commando targets another creature with this ability.

Binding Blast.name: Binding Blast
Binding Blast.description: A commando's thunderstone is infused with special reagents to produce a blinding flash of light. In addition to the thunderstone's normal effects, creatures that fail the saving throw against the thunderstone are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. Creatures that critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round. Creatures who protect their eyes, such as by wearing tinted goggles, are immune to the infused thunderstone's blinding effect.

Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).name: 召唤符文-胡须魔 Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil)
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).disable: @Check[perception|dc:18|name:Notice the Trap's Magic|traits:action:seek]以接近而不触发陷阱，接着@Check[thievery|dc:21|name:Break Summoning Circle|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以抹除符文；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（3环级；反制DC23）以反制符文
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).hazarddescription: 嵌入地板的召唤圈一旦探测到活着的生物，就召唤一个暴力的魔鬼。
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).reset: 陷阱会在每天的黎明时重新准备好。

Summon Devil.name: 召唤魔鬼 Summon Devil
Summon Devil.description:
触发 一个活着的生物踏上地板的任何未被召唤圈包围的部分

效果 在一个生物触摸触发区域一轮后，房间的门突然关上并锁起来（两次[[/act pick-a-lock dc=20]]{贼活}检定以开锁），一只@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.FIoRPHaHdYUPVKdT]出现在召唤圈内。

魔鬼骰先攻并停留[[/br 3d6 #rounds]]{3d6轮}，之后因咒语结束而消失。如果有人在持续时间结束前解除了该陷阱，那么魔鬼也会消失。

被召唤的魔鬼与大多数被召唤的生物不同，每轮可以使用3个动作，也可以使用反应。

Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).name: 召唤符文-煤渣鼠 Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat)
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).disable: @Check[acrobatics|dc:22|name:Approach Rune]（受训）以接近而不触发陷阱，接着@Check[thievery|dc:22|name:Erase Summoning Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device]（受训）以抹除符文；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]（3环级；反制DC20）以反制符文
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).hazarddescription: 一团不可见的云状魔法探测器一旦探测到房间里活着的生物，就召唤火元素杀死这些生物。
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).reset: 陷阱会在每天的黎明时重新准备好。

Summon Elementals.name: 召唤元素 Summon Elementals
Summon Elementals.description:
触发 一个活着的生物进入了房间

效果 在一个生物进入房间的两轮后，房间的门突然关上并锁起来（两次[[/act pick-a-lock dc=20]]{贼活}检定以开锁），两只@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.hiGwRWdxAsoCII4f]火元素从地板上冒出。

元素骰先攻并停留[[/gmr 3d6 #rounds]]{3d6轮}，之后因咒语结束而消失。如果有人在持续时间结束前解除了该陷阱，那么这些元素也会消失。

被召唤的元素与大多数被召唤的生物不同，每轮可以使用3个动作，也可以使用反应。

Supplicant Statues.name: Supplicant Statues
Supplicant Statues.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:34|name:Disable Statue Rollers|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable a specific statue's rollers, or @Check[thievery|dc:39|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on the control panel in A4 deactivates the whole trap. For each statue disabled, the trap loses 1 action from its routine and the DC for its predictive impediment ability decreases by 4. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th rank, counteract DC 32) doesn't harm the statues but removes the predictive impediment ability. Breaking the control panel prevents the trap from resetting.
Supplicant Statues.hazarddescription: Six statues rapidly slide around the room on rollers, slowing down intruders and striking at them with spring-loaded sword arms.
Supplicant Statues.reset: The trap deactivates and resets one minute after the room is empty.
Supplicant Statues.routine: (6 actions) On the trap's initiative, each functioning statue slides up to 40 feet around the room and makes a statue shortsword Strike against an adjacent creature. The trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty, and the statues' movements don't trigger reactions.

Animated Statues.name: Animated Statues
Animated Statues.description:
Trigger A creature enters a square adjacent to a statue

Effect The trap makes a statue shortsword Strike against the triggering creature, activates its predictive impediment ability, and then rolls initiative.

Predictive Impediment.name: Predictive Impediment
Predictive Impediment.description: The statues continually slide around to bump into creatures and block their passage through the room. The first time on its turn that a creature attempts to move within the room, it must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:36] save or treat the entire room as difficult terrain for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is also knocked prone.

Shadow Step.name: 暗影步 Shadow Step
Shadow Step.description:
黑灵杀手融入阴影，以最大速度行走两次，然后重聚成型。

此移动不会触发反应动作，但是幽灵杀手每次移动的起始点和结束点都必须位于低光或黑暗环境中。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 黑灵杀手对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的目标造成额外2d6精准伤害。

Spell-Imbued Blade.name: 妖法之刃 Spell-Imbued Blade
Spell-Imbued Blade.description:
黑灵杀手选择@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]，然后进行一次近战打击。

如果黑灵杀手命中，他们能通过武器对目标施放所选择的法术，以打击的攻击骰结果作为其法术攻击骰。

Obscuring Grab.name: 盲目擒获 Obscuring Grab
Obscuring Grab.description: 当手之目擒获目标的时候，其他所有生物对于手之目处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态。

Bone Drink.name: 饮骨 Bone Drink
Bone Drink.description:
需求 一个生物被手之目擒抱或束缚

效果 手之目对被它擒抱或束缚的生物进行一次啃咬打击。如果打击命中，目标必须通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:18]检定否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，如果目标已经陷入流失状态则状态值+1，最大达到流失4。

每次成功使用该能力，手之目恢复@Damage[1d8[healing]]生命值。

Burst of Speed.name: 速度爆发 Burst of Speed
Burst of Speed.description:
手之目行走两次、快步两次、或行走之后接快步（或顺序相反）。

它在[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用该能力。

Terrifying Gaze.name: 惊惧凝视 Terrifying Gaze
Terrifying Gaze.description:
1或2动作

手之目展示手掌心的一只眼睛，用它凝视30尺内的一个生物。目标必须通过@Check[will|dc:21]检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。如果手之目花费两个动作来展示两只掌心里的眼睛，目标如果豁免失败还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]。

通过豁免的生物在24小时内对该能力临时免疫。

Teraphant.name: 三角象 Teraphant
Teraphant.senses: 情绪感知120 尺, 昏暗视觉

Emotion Sense 120 feet.name: 情绪感知120 尺
Emotion Sense 120 feet.description: 三角象能感受到120尺内生物的情绪，作为模糊感官。当范围内的生物受到一种情绪效果影响时，情绪感知对这种状态的目标时作为精确感官。受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]效果影响的目标无法被情绪感知。

Empathetic Response.name: 共情反应 Empathetic Response
Empathetic Response.description:
触发 一个三角象60尺内的生物，被带有情绪特征的法术或能力作为目标

效果 三角象也能作为一个额外目标，从这些法术或效果中获得好处，效果持续1分钟或直到法术或能力的效果结束。

Impale.name: 刺穿 Impale
Impale.description:
需求 三角象擒抱一个目标

效果 三角象用额头上的角猛击目标。目标必须成功尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:27|basic]豁免，否则受到@Damage[(3d6+9)[piercing]]和@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害（大失败则受到@Damage[(6d6+18)[piercing]]伤害）。

Psychokinetic Trumpet.name: 灵能尖啸 Psychokinetic Trumpet
Psychokinetic Trumpet.description:
三角象对@Template[cone|distance:30]范围发出一阵刺耳的尖啸，造成@Damage[8d8[mental]|options:area-damage]伤害（@Check[will|dc:27|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物还会被推离15尺（大失败则为30尺）。

如果被推离的生物撞上固体障碍，还会受到@Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]]伤害并且停住。

三角象在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Psychokinetic Trumpet]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用灵能尖啸。

Grabbing Trunk.name: 象鼻卷绕 Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: 被三角象象鼻击中的中型或更小体型生物会被擒抱。如果三角象移动，被擒抱的生物会随着它一起行动。

The Inkmaster.name: The Inkmaster
The Inkmaster.publicNotes:
Shemhazians rise from the souls of torturers and those who reveled in mutilating the physical bodies of their victims. Standing 35 feet tall, a shemhazian is well equipped with a wide range of talons, claws, and fangs to continue inflicting such torments on those it encounters.

Shemhazians delight in visiting torment upon mortals, of course, but more than most demons, these fiends revel in sharing the pain with their own kind. Other demons fear and hate shemhazians for this reason, with only the most powerful willing to work with a shemhazian to achieve a shared goal. Even then, the shemhazian is always on the watch for an opportunity to bring pain and suffering to its allies along with any foe.
The Inkmaster.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Clockwork Brain.name: Clockwork Brain
Clockwork Brain.description: A second brain, made of clockwork, is implanted in the Inkmaster's skull. Any time he makes a Will save, he rolls twice and takes the higher result.

Paralyzing Gaze.name: Paralyzing Gaze
Paralyzing Gaze.description: 30 feet. A non-evil creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save. If it fails, it's slowed 1 for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is instead paralyzed for 1 round.

Succor Vulnerability.name: Succor Vulnerability
Succor Vulnerability.description: A shemhazian's mutilation is a part of them, and they can't bear to see it reversed. The first time each round that a creature heals from damage the shemhazian dealt on their last turn, the demon takes @Damage[3d6[mental]] damage.

Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
Tail Whip.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the shemhazian's tail leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The shemhazian attempts to Trip the triggering creature. On a success, the creature also takes damage as if the shemhazian had hit with a tail Strike, and if the creature was flying, it falls 30 feet.

Enfeebling Bite.name: Enfeebling Bite
Enfeebling Bite.description: If the shemhazian's jaws Strike damages a creature, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}. The target can attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:37] save to reduce this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (or be unaffected on a critical success).

Focused Gaze.name: Focused Gaze
Focused Gaze.description: The shemhazian focuses their gaze on a non-evil creature they can see within 30 feet. If that creature isn't already slowed by the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze, it must attempt a save against the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze. If that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. A shemhazian can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per round.

The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.name: The Laughing Fiend's Greeting
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:44|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to obscure or mar the magical runes set into the mural, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th rank; counteract DC 42) to counteract the mural
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.hazarddescription: Subtle but deadly magical runes link this mural to Kharnas's master. Good- or neutral-aligned creatures who examine the mural witness the castle's drawbridge silently descend, revealing an endless darkness.

Tegresin's Greeting.name: Tegresin's Greeting
Tegresin's Greeting.description:
Trigger A creature capable of casting divine magic examines the mural

Effect The mural casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qDjeG6dxT4aEEC6J]{Weird} (@Check[will|dc:43|traits:death,emotion,fear,illusion,mental,damaging-effect] save) on all creatures in the gallery. A snarl fills the creatures' minds.

equipment-Hardened Harrow Deck.name: Hardened Harrow Deck
equipment-Hardened Harrow Deck.description:
The harrow is a traditional fortunetelling deck used by Varisian soothsayers. The hardened harrow deck is a magical version of the deck with cards made of thin metallic plates adorned with all the imagery common in standard harrow decks, but with more angular designs. You can hurl cards from the hardened harrow deck as +2 greater striking darts with the deadly d10 trait. A card used as a weapon isn't destroyed and can be recovered with 1 minute of searching if it can't be recalled back to the deck (see the deck's Activate entry below). However, if even a single card is missing from the deck, the deck can't be used to perform a traditional harrow reading.

As long as you carry more than half the cards in the hardened harrow deck, when you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead; if you already have an ability that would make a successful saving throw against a fear effect a critical success, you instead gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect All cards from the hardened harrow deck within 60 feet that you can see fly back into the deck.

Superior Senses.description: The Rabbit Prince automatically critically succeeds at Seek actions to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet and at flat checks to target creatures within 30 feet that are concealed or hidden from him.
Superior Senses.name: Superior Senses

Bloody Jab.name: Bloody Jab
Bloody Jab.description: Whenever the Rabbit Prince deals piercing damage, he also deals 2d10 persistent bleed damage.

equipment-Blade of the Rabbit Prince.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince
equipment-Blade of the Rabbit Prince.description:
This +2 greater striking dancing shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.
