Halfling Luck.name: Halfling Luck
Halfling Luck.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The Rabbit Prince fails a skill check or a saving throw

Effect The Rabbit Prince rerolls the triggering check, but he must use the new result, even if it's worse.

Perfect Will.name: Perfect Will
Perfect Will.description: If the Rabbit Prince rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead, and if he rolls a critical failure, he gets a failure instead.

Darting Flurry.name: Darting Flurry
Darting Flurry.description: The Rabbit Prince Strides and makes a blade of the Rabbit Prince Strike and a harrow card Strike at any point during the Stride. His multiple attack penalty increases only after both attacks.

Quick Movements.name: Quick Movements
Quick Movements.description: The Rabbit Prince doesn't trigger reactions with his movement or with any use of the Thievery skill.

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

True Appearance.name: True Appearance
True Appearance.description:
Trigger The Stabbing Beast is transformed with Change Shape and rolls for initiative

Effect The Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.

Blinding Stream.name: Blinding Stream
Blinding Stream.description: A creature hit by the Stabbing Beast's venom stream must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for [[/gmr 1d4 #Blinded Duration]]{1d4 rounds}.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: The Stabbing Beast takes on the appearance of a Medium humanoid with a scorpion's tail and chitinous, full-body plate armor. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes, except that their reach becomes 5 feet and they can't make pincer Strikes.

Conjure Swords.name: Conjure Swords
Conjure Swords.description:
Requirements The Stabbing Beast is using Change Shape

Effect The Stabbing Beast summons one or two +2 greater striking keen shortswords into their hands. These weapons disappear if they leave the Stabbing Beast's grasp or if the Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.

Stabbing Beast Venom.name: Stabbing Beast Venom
Stabbing Beast Venom.description:
While a creature is enfeebled from this poison, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} (1 round)

The Winder.name: The Winder
The Winder.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:50|name:Deactivate System|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to deactivate the system, or @Check[athletics|dc:40|name:Jam Gears] (legendary) to jam the gears for 1 round
The Winder.hazarddescription: A large metallic arm, 20 feet long, is set into the floor. It rotates around the room to wind up nearby clockwork creatures.
The Winder.reset: The Winder resets as soon as no creatures remain in the room.
The Winder.routine: (1, 2, or 4 actions, depending on the encounter's threat level) The Winder uses each of its actions to Wind clockwork assassins in the room, starting with inactive ones.

Wind Up.name: Wind Up
Wind Up.description:
Trigger A creature other than the Rumormonger enters the room, or the Rumormonger commands the device to activate

Effect The Winder rolls initiative.

Wind.name: Wind
Wind.description: The Winder winds a clockwork creature in the room. If the creature is currently inactive, this activates the creature, allowing it to act normally for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. If already active, this instead increases the number of rounds the clockwork creature remains active by 1d4.

Tiderunner Aquamancer.name: Tiderunner Aquamancer
Tiderunner Aquamancer.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. enchantments, -2 to all saves vs. aboleth effects

equipment-+2 Striking Spear.name: +2 Striking Spear
equipment-+2 Striking Spear.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

Water Shield.name: Water Shield
Water Shield.description: The aquamancer is surrounded by a bubble of water that buffers attacks. Each round, the shield absorbs the first 25 damage that would be dealt to the aquamancer. The shield can absorb only bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, acid, cold, and fire damage types. The aquamancer can dismiss or raise their shield by spending a single action.

Knife Thrower.name: Knife Thrower
Knife Thrower.description: Twisted Jack's ranged dagger Strikes have a range increment of 20 feet instead of 10 feet.

Bloody Mayhem.name: Bloody Mayhem
Bloody Mayhem.description: Twisted Jack Strides three times. Once per Stride, he can attempt a war razor Strike against a creature in his reach at any point during the Stride; he must make each Strike against a different creature, but he doesn't apply his multiple attack penalty until after making all his Strikes. If any of the Strikes are a critical failure, Bloody Mayhem immediately ends.

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-+2 Greater Striking War Razor.name: +2 Greater Striking War Razor
equipment-+2 Greater Striking War Razor.description: A war razor is an exaggerated version of the barbers' tool. It is a brittle but extremely sharp weapon that is very easy to slip into a pocket or sleeve.

equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor
equipment-+2 Resilient Studded Leather A.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

Close Cutter.name: Close Cutter
Close Cutter.description: Whenever Twisted Jack deals slashing damage, the target takes an additional 2d10 persistent bleed damage.

Fan of Daggers.name: Fan of Daggers
Fan of Daggers.description: Twisted Jack makes three ranged dagger Strikes, each against a separate target; he ignores the multiple attack penalty until after making all three Strikes. On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[2d10[bleed]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Twisted Jack deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} targets.

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 泰洛奇丝可以通过振动与空气的流动感知附近发生的运动。

Pseudopod Burst.name: 伪足爆发 Pseudopod Burst
Pseudopod Burst.description:
泰洛奇丝进行至多三次伪足攻击，每一次都需要针对不同的生物。

泰洛奇丝的多次攻击惩罚直到所有这些攻击执行后才会增加。

Rallying Call.name: 集结呼唤 Rallying Call
Rallying Call.description:
在泰洛奇丝纳入奎迪因下士时，它获得了指挥官召集盟友能力的腐化版本。

在泰洛奇丝第一次使用这种能力时，它会召唤了一只@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]，从D13区的天花板上漏下来掉在在泰洛奇丝旁边的地面上加入战斗。

此后，当泰洛奇丝使用这个能力时，任何60尺内的泥怪都会获得持续1轮的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]（泥怪只能使用这个额外动作进行打击），并且如果它们没有与警探结盟，就会与泰洛奇丝结盟。

Stretching Step.name: 伸展快步 Stretching Step
Stretching Step.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 泰洛奇丝有力地伸展它的粘性伪足，将其种植在45尺内的墙上，然后收缩肌肉。

泰洛奇丝跃到靠近墙的空间，正常地穿过途中的方格，但忽略任何困难或极端困难的地形。

Subsume.name: 纳入 Subsume
Subsume.description:
泰洛奇丝用伪足举起邻近的濒死生物，将其纳入自己的血肉中。被纳入的生物的濒死状态不会增加，也不会减少。

泰洛奇丝恢复@Damage[30[healing]]HP，还能够使用一到两个被纳入的生物的特殊能力或专长，这取决于GM的决定。

靠近泰洛奇丝的生物可以通过花费2个动作尝试@Check[athletics|dc:29|name:Extract Subsumed Creature]检定来扯出一个被纳入的生物。

成功后，被纳入的生物从泰洛奇丝中脱出，落入最近的可行空间。

Ulressia The Blessed.name: Ulressia The Blessed
Ulressia The Blessed.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Crystallize Blood.name: Crystallize Blood
Crystallize Blood.description:
Ulressia channels her warped powers over crystals through her blade and into a creature's body, partially crystallizing its blood.

Ulressia makes a melee dagger Strike. On a hit, the creature takes damage as normal and must also roll a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Stunning Strike.name: Stunning Strike
Stunning Strike.description:
Requirements Ulressia hit a foe earlier this turn with a weapon Strike

Effect Ulressia makes a weapon Strike against the foe. On a success, the foe must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} instead.

Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: Ulressia automatically detects crystals or crystalline items within 30 feet.

Aura of Angry Crystals.name: Aura of Angry Crystals
Aura of Angry Crystals.description:
60 feet. Any creature that ends its turn in the aura while in possession of any crystals, gemstones, or other precious stones must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the aura for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature's crystals reverberate with Ulressia's vengeful aura, sharpening at every corner and digging, as if powerfully magnetized, into the creature's flesh.

The creature takes @Damage[4d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[5[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp the crystals are cumulatively worth (maximum 40 damage).

The creature can't discard the crystals until they leave the aura or roll a successful save against it.

Critical Failure As failure, but @Damage[8d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[10[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp of the crystals' value (maximum 80 damage).

Ulressia can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Kiss.name: 亲吻 Kiss
Kiss.description: 飞头蛮亲吻附近一个睡着、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]的生物，使其暴露在飞头蛮转化疾病中。

Shriek.name: 尖叫 Shriek
Shriek.description:
飞头蛮的尖叫如此可怕，以至于所有60尺内的非飞头蛮必须成功通过@Check[fortitude|dc:16]检定，否则将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]3轮。

如果瓦尔格耶离开了一个生物的视线、或远离该生物60尺、或用尖牙攻击了该生物，效果将更早结束。

豁免后，一个生物对飞头蛮的尖叫免疫24小时。

Vargouille Transformation.name: 飞头蛮转化 Vargouille Transformation
Vargouille Transformation.description:
当受害者暴露在阳光或任何3环级及更高的法术制造的光下会暂停疾病的发展，直到受害者不再受到这类光照。

豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果 ([[/gmr 1d6 #hours]]小时)

阶段2 受害者的头发掉光 ([[/gmr 1d6 #hours]]小时)

阶段3 受害者的耳朵长成了坚韧的翅膀，触须在下巴和头皮上发芽，牙齿长得又长又尖（1天）

阶段4 受害者的心灵剥开了原有的自我，变得邪恶而愚昧（[[/gmr 1d6 #hours]]小时）

阶段5 受害者的头从身体中挣脱出来（而身体已经死亡），转变成一个新的飞头蛮。

Vargouille Venom.name: 飞头蛮毒素 Vargouille Venom
Vargouille Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:18|name:Vargouile Venom]

阶段1 受害者受到的尖牙造成的伤害无法被魔法治疗。

一旦所有的尖牙造成的伤害被非魔法地治愈，毒素就结束了。

Vaultbreaker Ooze.name: 破壁泥怪 Vaultbreaker Ooze
Vaultbreaker Ooze.senses: 运动感知 60 尺; 宝藏感知（模糊） 30 尺

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 破壁泥怪能通过振动和空气的流动来感知附近的行动。

Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: 宝藏感知（模糊）30尺
Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: 破壁泥怪的金属体液能让它感知到附近30尺内的贵金属（包括黄金和白金）。

Metallify.name: 金属化 Metallify
Metallify.description:
触发 一个生物对破壁泥怪进行打击

效果 软泥的外层物质硬化成一层贵金属保护层。直到它的下一回合开始，它获得5点物理抗力（除了精金）。它的速度受到-5尺减值，并且它的触手打击获得多用S或P武器特性。

Engulf.name: 包卷 Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[reflex|dc:23|traits:damaging-effect]，@Damage[(2d8+9)[acid]]伤害，[[/act escape dc=23]]，破裂14（金属化时为19）

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Form Tool.name: 变成工具 Form Tool
Form Tool.description: 破壁泥怪本能地把它的触手变成一把钥匙或撬锁工具的样子；它可以利用该触须作为盗贼工具来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]。

Veksciralenix.name: Veksciralenix

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Alien Presence.name: Alien Presence
Alien Presence.description:
90 feet. A creature that first enters the area must attempt a @Check[will|dc:42] save.

Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to the Veksciralenix's Alien Presence for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The time dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Storm The dragon breathes a burst of lightning in a @Template[cone|distance:50] that deals @Damage[20d6[electricity]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:42|basic|name:Storm Breath|options:area-effect] save).

Time Displacement (arcane, transmutation) The dragon breathes a time storm. Each creature within a @Template[cone|distance:50] must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:42|name:Time Displacement Breath|traits:transmutation] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 6}.

Draconic Frenzy.name: Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: Veksciralenix makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.

Draconic Momentum.name: Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: Veksciralenix recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.

Second Chance.name: Second Chance
Second Chance.description:
Frequency three times per day

Trigger Veksciralenix or a creature that Veksciralenix can see attempts a check and learns the results

Effect The triggering creature rerolls the triggering check and takes the second result.

Veksciralenix.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger
equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Poisoner's Staff.name: Poisoner's Staff
equipment-Poisoner's Staff.description:
This gnarled staff is covered with thorns and coated with a glistening lacquer that acts as a minor irritant. While holding the staff, you aren't affected by its coating or thorns, and you reduce the DC of your flat checks to overcome persistent poison damage from 15 to 13.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrips @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.QqxwHeYEVylkYjsO]{Detect Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}

Venom Explosion.name: Venom Explosion
Venom Explosion.description:
Trigger The venom mage is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect The venom mage explodes into a cloud of poison within a @Template[burst|distance:20]. The venom mage then reforms at a point they choose within the burst, avoids being knocked out, and remains at 1 Hit Point. The venom mage's wounded value increases by 1 when they use this ability, and they can't use this ability when they're wounded 3 or more. Creatures other than the venom mage within the burst must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is sickened 1.

Failure The creature is sickened 2 and cannot recover from the sickened condition while within 20 feet of the venom mage.

Critical Failure As failure, but sickened 4.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If another creature's reaction would disrupt the venom mage's spellcasting action, the venom mage attempts a @Check[flat|dc:15] check. If the venom mage succeeds, their action isn't disrupted.

Washboard Dog Tough.name: 搓衣板狗的暴徒 Washboard Dog Tough

Bullyrag Beatdown.name: 威吓猛击 Bullyrag Beatdown
Bullyrag Beatdown.description: 每当帮派暴徒对一个惊惧的生物进行了一次成功的近战打击，打击额外造成一个武器伤害骰的伤害。

Frightening Critical.name: 恐惧重击 Frightening Critical
Frightening Critical.description: 每当帮派暴徒使用一个钝击武器达成重击并造成伤害，目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

Scraping Clamor.name: 刮擦喧闹 Scraping Clamor
Scraping Clamor.description:
这名搓衣板狗用武器在搓衣板盾牌上刮擦，发出响声，在这种喧闹中很难听到其他任何声音。直到搓衣板狗的暴徒的下一个回合开始，所有30尺以内的生物都能在抵抗听觉特征的法术或能力的豁免上获得+1环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.wcNGbhwn3AuamtsX]

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel
Water Elemental Vessel.publicNotes: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

Dispel Vulnerability.name: Dispel Vulnerability
Dispel Vulnerability.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 × the spell's rank. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.

Inhabit Vessel.name: Inhabit Vessel
Inhabit Vessel.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[reflex|dc:35] save, no damage, [[/act escape dc=35]], Rupture 28

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Internal Spell Strike.name: Internal Spell Strike
Internal Spell Strike.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

Spell Circle.name: Spell Circle
Spell Circle.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's rank and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell rank. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.

Water Elemental Vessel (I2).name: Water Elemental Vessel (I2)
Water Elemental Vessel (I2).publicNotes: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

Spell Circle.name: Spell Circle
Spell Circle.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's rank and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell rank. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.

Inhabit Vessel.name: Inhabit Vessel
Inhabit Vessel.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[reflex|dc:35] save, no damage, [[/act escape dc=35]], Rupture 28

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Internal Spell Strike.name: Internal Spell Strike
Internal Spell Strike.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

Waxworks Onslaught Trap.name: Waxworks Onslaught Trap
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:43|name:Drain Wax from a Tub|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the wax from a tub or @Check[athletics|dc:45|name:Push Through Wax|traits:action:force-open] (master) to push through the wax blocking a sealed door and escape (other creatures must push their own way through, as the wax reseals)
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazarddescription: Four huge tubs containing congealed wax, enchanted to melt and envelop unwary intruders, each sit atop a cold fire.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.reset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour. At that time, the wax in the tubs cools and congeals, and any wax elsewhere in the room magically goes back into the tubs.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.routine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn per drained or destroyed tub. On each action, a different tub spews hot wax at a random creature in the room, dealing @Damage[3d12[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to the target and all adjacent creatures (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic|options:area-effect] save). On a failure or critical failure, the creature is also encased in hot wax. A creature that starts its turn encased in wax takes @Damage[8d12[fire]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it [[/act escape dc=35]]{Escapes} the hardening wax. Each turn it remains encased, the damage dealt by the hot wax decreases by 2d12 but the DC to Escape increases by 2 (minimum 0 damage, maximum DC 43). A creature that can't get free from the wax might suffocate.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hp: to destroy a tub and prevent it from making any further attacks; Door Seal Hardness 18; Door Seal HP 72 (BT 36) to destroy the wax on a sealed door and allow anyone to escape through the door

Seal Room.name: Seal Room
Seal Room.description:
Trigger A creature comes within 5 feet of a tub

Effect The fires beneath the vats blaze to life, magically melting the wax in the tubs. The tubs emit gouts of wax over the room's exits, sealing them shut. The trap then rolls initiative.

Wrent Dicaspiron.name: 温特·迪卡斯皮隆 Wrent Dicaspiron

equipment-Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Vau.name: 锯皮圣所宝库钥匙 Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Vault

Bloody Sneak Attack.name: 嗜血偷袭 Bloody Sneak Attack
Bloody Sneak Attack.description: 承受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}的生物在面对剥皮人的攻击时视作措手不及。当剥皮人攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物时，剥皮人造成额外2d6精准伤害。

Chain Expert.name: 刺链专家 Chain Expert
Chain Expert.description: 剥皮人只需要一只手就能有效地挥舞长长的刺链。

Chain Up.name: 锁住 Chain Up
Chain Up.description:
需求 剥皮人和被她刺链擒抱的生物相邻

效果 剥皮人尝试一次@Check[athletics|defense:reflex]检定对抗目标生物的反射豁免DC。如果成功，剥皮人用刺链缠住目标，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]状态（逃脱DC=10 + 剥皮人的运动检定结果）；如果大成功，目标生物还陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

无论剥皮人是否成功，她丢下手中的一条刺链。

Flay.name: 剥皮 Flay
Flay.description: 无论何时剥皮人对被擒抱的生物进行一次成功的斩肉刀打击，她造成@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害（重击则@Damage[2d6[bleed]]伤害）。

Hook and Flay.name: 肉钩剥皮 Hook and Flay
Hook and Flay.description:
需求 剥皮人以刺链擒抱一个生物

效果 剥皮人将该生物拖到相邻的可用空间，并对其进行一次斩肉刀打击。

equipment-+2 Greater Striking Longsword.name: +2 Greater Striking Longsword
equipment-+2 Greater Striking Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

equipment-Whisper Briolette.name: Whisper Briolette
equipment-Whisper Briolette.description:
Activate 2 Envision

Requirements You are an expert in Stealth

This teardrop-shaped gemstone has triangular facets and looks suitable for fancy attire, although close inspection shows that it's hollow. When it's activated, you can instantly impart up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words) telepathically to any creatures you choose within 100 feet. You can impart this instantaneous telepathic message to creatures that you perceive and creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you, but you can't do so to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures. Once used, the whisper briolette becomes unusable and subtly vanishes within the next few minutes, rather than crumbling to dust.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Tactical Aura.name: Tactical Aura
Tactical Aura.description: 60 feet. Allies of lower level than Wynsal in the aura gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]{Attack of Opportunity} reaction. Allies who already have the Attack of Opportunity reaction can use it when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to normal triggers, and they disrupt a triggering concentrate action on a critical hit.

Demanding Orders.name: Demanding Orders
Demanding Orders.description: Wynsal commands his allies to take action. Allies within 120 feet who hear and understand his order are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round and can use this extra action to Stride, Strike, or Step.

equipment-+2 Resilient Full Plate.name: +2 Resilient Full Plate
equipment-+2 Resilient Full Plate.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see below) and a pair of gauntlets.

equipment-Ring of Sustenance.name: Ring of Sustenance
equipment-Ring of Sustenance.description: This polished wooden ring constantly refreshes your body and mind. You don't need to eat or drink while wearing it, and you need only 2 hours of sleep per day to gain the benefits of 8 hours of sleep. A ring of sustenance doesn't function until it's been worn and invested continuously for a week. Removing it resets this interval.

Determination.name: Determination
Determination.description: Wynsal either ends a nonpermanent condition affecting him or counteracts a nonpermanent spell affecting him (counteract rank 17th, counteract check [[/r 1d20+30 #Counteract]]{+30}). This doesn't remove Hit Point damage or prevent the spell or effect from affecting others. It can't remove an ongoing affliction or conditions from a situation outside his control (such as being grappled or flanked).

Formation Attack.name: Formation Attack
Formation Attack.description: Wynsal deals 3d8 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of his allies.

Hampering Strike.name: Hampering Strike
Hampering Strike.description: A foe that takes damage from Wynsal's melee Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If it's already slowed, the value of the slowed condition increases by 1.

Consume Flesh.name: Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description:
Requirements The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of an evil or chaotic creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains @Damage[6d6[healing]] Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

Ghoul Fever.name: Ghoul Fever
Ghoul Fever.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:27]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a zeal-damned ghoul the next midnight.

Paralysis.name: Paralysis
Paralysis.description: Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

Swift Leap.name: Swift Leap
Swift Leap.description: The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

equipment-+1 Striking Morningstar.name: +1 Striking Morningstar
equipment-+1 Striking Morningstar.description: This weapon has a short shaft ending in a metal ball studded with spikes.

equipment-Breastplate.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half-plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.
equipment-Breastplate.name: Breastplate

equipment-Sling Bullets.name: Sling Bullets
equipment-Sling Bullets.description: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

Little Favors.name: Little Favors
Little Favors.description: Each time a creature willingly performs a service, quest, or task for the zealborn, the creature takes a cumulative -1 status penalty to saving throws against the zealborn's mental spells and abilities (maximum -4).

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When a zealborn is destroyed, it re-forms, fully healed, near a follower of its choice in [[/gmr 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}. For the purposes of rejuvenation, a follower is defined as an intelligent creature who's well acquainted with the zealborn and is a true believer in the zealborn's mission, not merely a lukewarm supporter. A zealborn can be permanently destroyed only if they have no current followers or can be convinced to end their own life.

Zealous Restoration.name: Zealous Restoration
Zealous Restoration.description: A zealborn can't regain Hit Points through resting or void healing; they feed only on the idealism of their supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a geas cast by the zealborn. Creatures under a zealborn's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under the zealborn's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 spirit and 1d6 void damage with their attacks.

equipment-Sling.name: Sling
equipment-Sling.description: Little more than a leather cup attached to a pair of straps, a sling can be used to fling smooth stones or sling bullets at a range.

Dubious Shifting.name: 可疑变形 Dubious Shifting
Dubious Shifting.description:
祖克蝠精能模仿任何小型物品或装饰物的样子，虽然祖克蝠精所伪装的物品通常带有一些不真实或令人怀疑的特征。

这不会改变祖克蝠精的体型，但会改变他们的颜色和视觉外观。

他们模仿物品时的欺骗检定结果和DC自动取23。

Go for the Eyes.name: 瞄准双眼 Go for the Eyes
Go for the Eyes.description:
祖克蝠精以满速度飞行，在移动结束后进行一次爪抓打击。

如果爪抓攻击命中，目标必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:15]豁免否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]1轮（大失败则目盲1分钟）。如果打击造成重击，则受害者的豁免检定结果自动下降一级。

equipment-Shortbow.description: This smaller bow is made of a single piece of wood and favored by skirmishers and cavalry.
equipment-Shortbow.name: Shortbow

No Escape.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.
No Escape.name: No Escape

Nightmare Assault.name: Nightmare Assault
Nightmare Assault.description:
Frequency Once per day

The prison guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, the target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:36] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is plagued by nightmarish visions and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Critical Failure The target becomes fatigued and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until no longer fatigued

equipment-Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
equipment-Chain Mail.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

Hammering Flurry.name: Hammering Flurry
Hammering Flurry.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.

equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows
equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Clobber.name: Clobber
Clobber.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:33|options:inflicts:stunned] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Shatter Defenses.name: Shatter Defenses
Shatter Defenses.description:
Requirements A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} as long as it's frightened. If the target is already off-guard, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.

Joro Spider Venom.name: Joro Spider Venom
Joro Spider Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d8[poison]] (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d8[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[1d8[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 4 @Damage[2d8[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} ([[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds})

Web Trap.name: Web Trap
Web Trap.description: A creature hit by the joro spider's web Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface until it [[/act escape dc=25]]{Escapes}.
